column3:
/>

The Catrub ONE is the world’s first modular multifunctional cat furniture that includes all of the important features along with a modern design.
column4: >The Catrub ONE is super easy to clean, because of it‘s modular system.
column5:
> 

The ONE combines all of the feline-approved features from cat trees, cat beds, and scratching posts into one ultra sleek and modern package. With the Catrub ONE in your home, you’ll save space and, more importantly, keep your cat happy as can be.
column6: >Also available in Charcoal Black
column7:
>

We know that cleaning cat furniture can be an issue. It was important for us to develop the product so that it could be easily and quickly cleaned at any time without much effort.

 

 

Due to the material used, no bacteria or dirt can settle on the furniture, as it does on conventional plush furniture. Because of the modular design and the smooth surfaces, bacteria and dirt have no chance.
column8: >The pillow has a moisture-repellent inlet and the cover is washable at 60°C.
column9:
>

Let's be honest: there is some ugly plush furniture which nobody wants to have in their home. They often appear as foreign objects and do not fit in with the furnishings. With the ONE, we have chosen a modern design which will fit perfectly into your interior design! 

 

Whether you have one or more cats, the ONE offers enough space for sleep and play opportunities for all of your four-legged friends.

 

The ONE is made of a durable material and designed for longevity so that your cat and you truly enjoy it. All parts are available separately and easy to change.
column10: >You can easily change the sisal
column11:
>

We've been looking for the right size and shape for a long time, and the ONE has been designed to really suit any cat, big or small. The Oval shape of the ONE saves you living space without compromising the comfort of your four-legged friends.

 

Our goal was to combine all the important functions in a single piece of furniture. No matter if it is a place to sleep, to play, or for claw sharpening or grooming. We have EVERYTHING in ONE.
column12: >Playground with replaceable scratching cardboard
column13:
>

Due to the modular design it is possible to put the modules together according to your wishes in order to create the perfect cat furniture that matches your style of living. In addition, you can adapt the ONE to the individual needs of your cat and constantly change or expand it. This is a truly unique cat furniture!
column14: >Matt White Edition | Charcoal Black Edition
column15: >
column17:
>

 

For most of us, pets are part of our family. We have a special bond with them, they bring love, happiness and health into our lives. But they also need time and affection to be happy.

Our founder Patrick grew up with cats and these wonderful animals have accompanied his life to this day. There are currently seven cats in the family. With more than 20 years of pet ownership and countless conversations with other cat owners, he knows what cats and owners really need. So with the support of many international experts, he developed Catrub ONE.

The founding team is proud that Catrub ONE is awarded with the German Design Award 2021. 

 

Das Catrub ONE ist das erste modulare, multifunktionale Katzenmöbel der Welt, welches alle wichtigen Funktionen in Einklang mit einem modernen Design bringt.
column18:
>Durch das modulare System ist das Catrub ONE super einfach zu reinigen.

 

Das ONE kombiniert alle von Katzen bewährten Funktionen von Kratzbäumen, Katzenbetten und Katzenspielzeug in einem ultra komfortablen und modernen Möbelstück. Mit dem Catrub ONE in Deinem Zuhause sparst du Platz und, was noch wichtiger ist, machst Deine Katze so glücklich wie nur möglich.
column21:
>

Wir wissen, dass die Reinigung von Katzenmöbeln ein sehr wichtiges Thema ist. Uns war es wichtig, das Produkt so zu entwickeln, dass es jederzeit ohne großen Aufwand leicht und schnell gereinigt werden kann.

 

 

Aufgrund des verwendeten Materials können sich keine Bakterien und kein Schmutz im Möbel festsetzen, wie es oft bei üblichen Plüschmöbeln der Fall ist. Durch das modulare Design und die glatten Oberflächen haben Bakterien und Schmutz keine Chance.
column22:
>Das Kissen hat ein feuchtigkeitsabweisendes Inlett und der Bezug ist bei 60°C waschbar.

Seien wir ehrlich: Die unschönen Plüschmöbel möchte niemand in seinem Zuhause stehen haben. Sie wirken oft als Fremdkörper in den eigenen vier Wänden und passen nicht zur Einrichtung. Mit dem ONE haben wir ein modernes Design gewählt, welches super in das Gesamtbild Deiner Einrichtung passen wird.

 

Egal ob Du eine oder mehrere Katzen hast, das ONE bietet genug Platz für Schlaf- und Spielmöglichkeiten für Deine Vierbeiner.

 

Das ONE ist aus einem robusten Material und auf Langlebigkeit ausgelegt, damit Deine Katze und auch Du viel Freude daran haben. Alle Verschleiß- und Verbrauchsteile sind separat verfügbar und leicht zu wechseln.
column23: >Die Sisalelemente sind leicht austauschbar
column24:
>

Wir haben lange nach der richtigen Größe und Form gesucht und das ONE so konzipiert, dass die Größe wirklich für jede Katze geeignet ist, egal ob klein oder groß. Durch die ovale Form des ONE sparst Du außerdem Wohnraum, ohne Einschränkungen beim Komfort Deiner Vierbeiner.

 

Unser Ziel war es, alle wichtigen Funktionen in einem Möbel zu vereinen. Egal ob Schlafplatz, Spielmöglichkeiten, Möglichkeiten zum Krallenschärfen oder der Fellpflege. Wir haben ALLES im ONE.
column26:
>

Durch das modulare Design ist es möglich, aus den verschiedenen Bausteinen das perfekte Katzenmöbel passend zu Deinem Wohnraum zusammenzustellen. Zudem kannst Du das ONE den individuellen Bedürfnissen Deiner Katze anpassen und immer wieder verändern oder erweitern. So bekommst Du von uns ein einzigartiges Katzenmöbel.
column27: >Matt Weiss Edition | Anthrazit Edition
column28:
>

Für die meisten von uns sind Haustiere ein Teil unserer Familie. Wir haben eine besondere Bindung zu Ihnen, sie bringen Liebe, Glück und Gesundheit in unser Leben. Aber sie benötigen viel Zeit und Zuneigung, um glücklich zu sein.

Unser Gründer Patrick ist mit Katzen aufgewachsen und diese wunderbaren Tiere begleiten sein Leben bis heute. Derzeit gibt es sieben Katzen in der Familie. Mit mehr als 20 Jahren Erfahrung als Katzenhalter und unzähligen Gesprächen mit anderen Katzenbesitzern weiß er, was Katzen und Besitzer wirklich brauchen. So entwickelte er mit der Unterstützung vieler internationaler Experten das Catrub ONE.

column2: >World’s First Hands-Free Interior Barn Door Opener
>The modern farmhouse look is a popular and sought-after aesthetic. If you are into the rustic look of barn doors and loves technology, RoomTec is your best choice.

column1: In the middle of video games and someone’s knocking the door?
Your pet wants to play but was stuck behind a door?

Our smart barn door opener allow people to open doors using voice command or a smartphone app - so you don't have to touch potentially contaminated surfaces or handles with your hands and fingers. Saving time cleaning and sanitizing door handles, too.

Whether you want to prevent the spread of germs or simply couldn’t do so because your hands are full, just say “Alexa/Google, open the door.” Now the door in front of you can be opened with voice control.

Maintain full control of your barn door from anywhere. You can now open and close your door from the comfort of your bedroom, or even when you are away from the house on vacation, all with just a tap on your smartphone.
Designed with Your Safety in Mind

Worried about painful finger pinch and jamming injuries for your kids and pets? We’ve thought about this too. Designed with your safety in mind, our door will automatically stop when a child or pet is blocking the door - keeping your kids and pets safe and preventing them from getting locked in a room.

column3: >Great for People with Disabilities and Mobility Issues

column1: Disabilities can change the way we operate in day-to-day life, even in spaces as familiar as our home. We understand that many styles of doors are cumbersome and hard to use for those who have a hard time gripping. This smart hands-free barn door opener is ideal for handicap or elders with mobility issues. The system works with voice control or a push of a button in the app - seniors with walkers or wheelchairs don’t have to struggle to open and close doors.

After countless mechanical testing and adjustment, we are pleased to present this smart barn door opener kit featuring a small yet powerful motor that drives the door open smoothly while producing no noise. Plus, enjoy the ease-of-use to just plug it in and forget about it. Loaded with energy-efficient features, this low-maintenance opener is engineered to withstand a lifetime of use and offers peace of mind that your door will remain beautiful and functional for years to come.

Worry no more about door slamming noises! Our smart door opener is designed with the hall-effect sensor to deliver a quiet and soft door closing experience for you and your family. Included in the set, you will also get a barn door remote control which comes with 3M tape for easy installation. Whether you want to use voice control, phone app, or just pressing a button on the remote, we've got you covered.

Your barn door coupled with our smart hands-free opener is an easy way to add separation and style to bathrooms, closets, kitchens, and more. Rustic enough to highlight that charming vintage vibe but modern enough to add textures and patterns that give your room just enough punch. Plus, it takes up less floor space than a traditional swinging door – the perfect solution for a tight space.
Founded in 2018, RoomTec is a forward-looking company focused on R&
column2: D and innovation of smart home devices and IoT solutions that are needed for the 21st century. Committed to creating a smart and convenient life for people all around the world, our team is made up of mechanical and electrical engineers, graphic designers, and product designers. Our mission is to provide solutions and products that enhance the lives of people by improving the convenience, aesthetics, and safety of their homes.

Worry no more about door slamming noises! Our smart door opener is designed with the hall-effect sensor to deliver a quiet and soft door closing experience for you and your family. Included in the set, you will also get a barn door remote control which comes with 3M tape for easy installation. Whether you want to use voice control, phone app, or just pressing a button on the remote, we've got you covered.

Your barn door coupled with our smart hands-free opener is an easy way to add separation and style to bathrooms, closets, kitchens, and more. Rustic enough to highlight that charming vintage vibe but modern enough to add textures and patterns that give your room just enough punch. Plus, it takes up less floor space than a traditional swinging door – the perfect solution for a tight space.

Founded in 2018, RoomTec is a forward-looking company focused on R&D and innovation of smart home devices and IoT solutions that are needed for the 21st century. Committed to creating a smart and convenient life for people all around the world, our team is made up of mechanical and electrical engineers, graphic designers, and product designers. Our mission is to provide solutions and products that enhance the lives of people by improving the convenience, aesthetics, and safety of their homes.

A house with the strength of reinforced concrete and the beauty of carved limestone.  A house that water doesn't damage, that winds don't destroy.  A house that is astoundingly beautiful and enduring.  A house that looks like an old world mansion and will last for generations, yet is still affordable.
column3:
/>

The Challenge

       Currently, the design process for these homes is tedious and complex.  This makes them expensive and time-consuming to produce.  Like carved limestone, the blocks have to be designed individually.  Then a mold has to be made for each block.  Finally, the blocks can be poured, labeled, and shipped to the site.

column1: Because of the complex and time-consuming nature of the process, until now these homes have only been available to the wealthy.   All of the homes constructed to date use proprietary designs that belong to the homeowners.

We want to design and build a series of homes and townhouses that can be poured repeatedly from the same molds.  This will reduce the cost of the initial design and the cost of building the molds, which will make these homes affordable to middle income families.

column5: >        You will be able to simply order one of these homes and have the blocks shipped to the site, ready to be assembled.

column15:
/>

 

Why Are We Doing This?

          We love beautiful and enduring things and
column19: > we want to provide homes that are

column1: elegant, enduring, and affordable. We want to raise the bar for residential  architecture in America from one that is somewhat disposable and uninspiring to one of elegance and permanence.  We can imagine a future where homes last for many generations.

Meeting our goal will allow us to create one standard design.  This will include having the house designed, the molds for each block constructed and a working prototype built.  From there we will gradually add additional designs.   Once the homes are completed we will be ready to ship anywhere in the contiguous United States.  

        if we surpass our goal we will be able to develop a variety of models in different sizes and styles more quickly.
• The walls are extremely strong:  They are made from interlocking reinforced concrete block about 2 feet thick.
• They are able to withstand hurricanes, tornadoes, floods, fires, termites, etc...
• They are very low maintenance: There is no need to paint, no siding to replace,  no rotten window sills, etc.

• Unlike most of our  current construction materials, concrete does not give off harmful vapors (low VOC).  Portland cement is also naturally anti fungal so molds do not feed on it as they do wood, drywall, and latex.  This all means that the indoor air is much cleaner.
• These structures are simple to assemble.  Many homeowners build these homes themselves.
• The block can serve as both the exterior and interior finish on the walls.  Once the block are assembled, there is no need for additional finishes.
• The insulation is built into the block.
• The concrete in the block can be stained to resemble different colors of limestone.
• They are made from a sustainable resource.
• Their longevity reduces the costs of maintenance, long term construction, and environmental impact.
• Did we mention that they are really beautiful, really low maintenance, and last a really long time?  We love these homes!

Imagine living in a home that inspires you.  Imagine being able to pass it on for generations.   Imagine the freedom that comes from not having to maintain it. Imagine a home designed to withstand fire, hurricanes, tornadoes, water and termites.
Imagine being able to build your home yourself.  Imagine ordering a home and the important detailing is already finished.  The process is simple
column2: the results are elegant and beautiful.

column1: Imagine what this could do for you, the developer/builder.  A subdivision built in such a classic, elegant, majestic style would stand out against all other neighborhoods.  You could include a variety of home sizes and still maintain the elegance and quality of the neighborhood.  This would increase your target market to include those who wish to live in a nice place without having to maintain a large home.  And these homes could be shipped to the site and stacked in place without the need for highly skilled workers.  Imagine not having to have masons, framers, siding contractors, window contractors, insulation contractors, drywall installers, drywall finishers, painters, etc just to get your walls finished.

column2: >     Imagine being able to offer these houses to your customers.   They choose a house and it is shipped to their site.
>We will provide floor plans, but the interior walls (location and style) are customizable and can be finished however you wish.
>Electrical conduit can be run through the hollow block.
column3: > Plumbing and electrical lines can be run through interior walls just as in standard construction.

column2: >     3.  Who builds this when I get it?
>Assembly of the block is straightforward. We can provide training to you or your contractor.  The foundation, the floor systems, and the roof can  all use standard construction details.
>     4.   Can I paint over the interior walls if I want to?
>Yes.  Prime the walls with a masonry primer.  Or plaster (or joint compound*) the walls for a smoother finish prior to painting.
>     5.  How much will these houses cost?
>This will depend on size of course.  Here is a sample:  the stonework for a 2400 square foot house would cost about $140,000.
> Shipping is via flatbed trailer and the cost will depend on the distance from the fabrication facility ( Mobile, Alabama).  These have been shipped all over the continental US.

Because of the complex and time-consuming nature of the process, until now these homes have only been available to the wealthy.   All of the homes constructed to date use proprietary designs that belong to the homeowners.

You will be able to simply order one of these homes and have the blocks shipped to the site, ready to be assembled.

elegant, enduring, and affordable.  We want to raise the bar for residential  architecture in America from one that is somewhat disposable and uninspiring to one of elegance and permanence.  We can imagine a future where homes last for many generations.

The walls are extremely strong:  They are made from interlocking reinforced concrete block about 2 feet thick.
They are able to withstand hurricanes, tornadoes, floods, fires, termites, etc...
They are very low maintenance: There is no need to paint, no siding to replace,  no rotten window sills, etc.

Unlike most of our  current construction materials, concrete does not give off harmful vapors (low VOC).  Portland cement is also naturally anti fungal so molds do not feed on it as they do wood, drywall, and latex.  This all means that the indoor air is much cleaner.
These structures are simple to assemble.  Many homeowners build these homes themselves.

The insulation is built into the block.
The concrete in the block can be stained to resemble different colors of limestone.
They are made from a sustainable resource.
Their longevity reduces the costs of maintenance, long term construction, and environmental impact.
Did we mention that they are really beautiful, really low maintenance, and last a really long time?  We love these homes!

column1: Imagine what this could do for you, the developer/builder.  A subdivision built in such a classic, elegant, majestic style would stand out against all other neighborhoods.  You could include a variety of home sizes and still maintain the elegance and quality of the neighborhood.  This would increase your target market to include those who wish to live in a nice place without having to maintain a large home.  And these homes could be shipped to the site and stacked in place without the need for highly skilled workers.  Imagine not having to have masons, framers, siding contractors, window contractors, insulation contractors, drywall installers, drywall finishers, painters, etc just to get your walls finished.
Building supply stores/ block supply companies
Imagine being able to offer these houses to your customers.   They choose a house and it is shipped to their site.
We will provide floor plans, but the interior walls (location and style) are customizable and can be finished however you wish.
Electrical conduit can be run through the hollow block.   Plumbing and electrical lines can be run through interior walls just as in standard construction.
3.  Who builds this when I get it?
Assembly of the block is straightforward. We can provide training to you or your contractor.  The foundation, the floor systems, and the roof can  all use standard construction details.
4.   Can I paint over the interior walls if I want to?
Yes.  Prime the walls with a masonry primer.  Or plaster (or joint compound*) the walls for a smoother finish prior to painting.
5.  How much will these houses cost?
This will depend on size of course.  Here is a sample:  the stonework for a 2400 square foot house would cost about $140,000.
Shipping is via flatbed trailer and the cost will depend on the distance from the fabrication facility ( Mobile, Alabama).  These have been shipped all over the continental US.

Delight House

We are building a home for teen girls ages 16-22 who are actively pursuing an area of the creative arts!  Whether it is dance, photography, theater, interior design, graphic design, videography, music, fashion. . .
WE are in need to raise funds to build the community that you wanted to be a part of when you were young.
Delight is blessed to have amazing leaders from across the United States  who invest in young women to help them discover their creativity, gifts and calling.
• over 500 actively involved young women between the ages of 14-21 online
• Lives changed through mentorship and personal growth
• 5 successful retreats across the nation to date
• 7 countries represented in our members and almost all 50 states
We have a house, God gave us a vision and now we need to follow through.

I opened Grills Steakhouse in 2009 serving quality British steak cooked the way people want it, About a year later we introduced homemade burgers and we have developed the recipe and the concept over the last 4 years. Burgers now account for 50% of the food served in the steakhouse to the point that we are fully booked two weeks in advance. Grills Steakhouse was totally self funded and is always developing and evolving. We are part of the local community and support local youth sports groups when we can and help host the occasional charity and fundraising events for community groups.

Grills Burger Shack is a concept that I have been developing with my team over the last 6 months. The whole concept is about using quality ingredients, quality local suppliers and hiring local people (usually unemployed) and giving them quality training. By starting Grills Burger Shack I will need to employ another 4-6 local people I usually source my staff from unemployed people that just haven't been able to get a job.

How many times for you gone to a popular well know burger franchise and walked away and 1/2 hour later your a little hungry. Every 6oz Grills burger is a minimum 5 1/2ozs of good quality minced beef, which is smothered in succulent cheddar cheese, add a good quality bun, fresh salad and a good squeeze of relish or sauce. Partner this with skinny fries or sweet potato fries and a side of onion rings or deep fried macaroni cheese there is almost no chance you would go away hungry, it's that simple.

As we all know not everybody likes simple, so we have different speciality burgers to suit most tastes, w

column3: >Our Aim with the Grills brand is to support our team and help everyone involved with us grow and develop, its not a short term plan its about growing the community together.

What we do: We are an emerging markets focused startup ,w
column5:
>e have been shipping several thousand smart devices (wifi routers) since the last 18 months of our inception.

We believe: Consumers no longer buy products but solutions and experiences.

Problem: Consumers the world over add  multiple devices to their home networks namely wifi routers, STB's , HDD's, battery banks &
column6: streaming devices that take precious real estate on wall units and on desks.
column10: >Each of these devices needs a dedicated power adaptor &amp
column11: power socket with wires hanging all over the place. This adds to the clutter and becomes an eyesore.

column1:
Solution: STCKBLE

The STCKBLE is a simple yet innovative way of growing your home network without adding to the clutter. 

It lets you simply stack devices that you wish to add to your home network in a simple, elegant and modular fashion, simplifying powering needs,  eliminating clutter of devices and wires and saving on precious real estate on desks and wall units.




The design: The STCKBLE is a designed around the principles of simplicity &
column2:
elegance.

The industrial design of the STCKBLE  impresses one and all all, it can be placed on any wall unit or desk , it comes with a unique  connector (similar to a docking station for laptops) that lets power &
column3:
data (USB 2.0) pass from one of the devices to the other in a seamless fashion thereby reducing the need for a dedicated power adaptor per device or the need to use a USB cable to transfer data between devices.



Where are we today with the STCKBLE:  We have completed the tooling for the STCKBLE and one of the 1st STCKBLE's is ready i.e a High Definition STB, we are currently toying with several front panels for different applications and also refining the design to accommodate more devices.


Why do we need your contribution: While we have been shipping thousands of smart devices , our company is still very small and has v limited resources to continue to invest on this project i.e add the wifi router, wifi extender , Storage et al especially given the commercial risks that may come along with building something revolutionary as the STCKBLE.

We would like your valuable contribution to help us further develop/enhance the STCKBLE thereby combining home entertainment , communication and storage into a simple, elegant modular package. 

Your contribution can help us expedite this project and  build the other stackable devices namely HDD, Wifi Routers, Cordless wifi extender et al in a couple of months.

YOUR CONTIBUTION WILL HELP US MAKE STCKBLE THE DEVICE EVERY HOME WOULD LOVE TO HAVE.

The purpose of God's Designs, Inc. is to enrich lives by making homes more pleasant
places for everyday living. We start by collecting donated household furnishings
which are stored in a warehouse and then furnish homes and apartments for those
in need at no cost to them.
Our motto is ""making a house a home"" and this is accomplished by adding additional
items, such as pictures, floral arrangements, curtains and other accessories.
The people we help are generally referred to us by different social agencies such
as Center for Women and Families, Salvation Army, Women's Choice, Network Center
for Community Change, Cabinet for Health and Family Services, Scholar House, Fuller
Center for Housing and many others as well as various churches. We also have helped
a number of seminary students who come from abroad with nothing but a suitcase and
The people we serve are usually coming out of a homeless state and have no resources
or alternatives to acquire items needed to furnish their homes. Many of our clients
are living with the barest of essentials, frequently sleeping on the floor and cooking
and eating with limited kitchen utensils.
After an initial visit with the client to determine their needs the home is completely
furnished. We like to work while they are out of the house and when they return,
having left in most cases an empty house to one completely furnished, they are somewhat
overwhelmed. We call it a mini ""extreme makeover"". We conclude with a house blessing.
We also have a mentoring team called Ambassadors on Assignment who follow up with
each family on a weekly basis.
God's Designs was actually started in 2008 but was incorporated in Nov. 2010.

We are a non- profit 501(C)(3) and all donations are tax deductible.

Presently We need A van to take items to our Clients Homes. The van would cost about $10,000.00.

","If you are concerned about the
environment, this project will be of interest to you as our objective is to
You know about the dangers of nuclear energy, as well as about the
greenhouse effect caused by internal combustion engines and coal-fired power
The energy that wind turbines and solar panels produce fluctuates and is
In order to limit the risks entailed in these energy sources, we are
To achieve this, we present one of our prototypes, designed like a child’s
It features a jointed fork in the middle.
At the same distance from the fork’s central pivot are two axles, each of
which bears a sort of wheel.
Each wheel has a mass fixed onto it. The wheels are interlinked by a chain
so that the masses always remain 180° apart from each other.
When the red mass falls, the white mass rises.
The left wheel pulls the fork upwards and the right wheel pulls the fork
These two forces combine and pull in alternation on the left and right of
the fork, thereby keeping it continually balanced.
Using this prototype, we can compare:
A) The energy consumed in order to make the wheels rotate at 140 rpm.
B) The energy produced by the balancing of the fork, under the influence of
To measure the energy consumed, we use an electronic torque meter which
gives us a reading of 4.24 Newton at 140 rpm. This represents power consumption
To measure the energy produced by the balancing of the fork, when the
wheels are rotating at 140 rpm, we use a Prony brake that provides a reading of
19.52 Newton at 140 rpm, amounting to power production of 286 Watts.
At this stage of the experiment, we have two measurements.
The power consumption for making the wheels rotate is 62 Watts.
The power production due to the balancing of the fork is 286 Watts.
So it may be thought we have a winner here and that we are producing more
energy than we are consuming. Well for the time being, the answer is “no”
because in order to maintain the wheels’ rotational speed at 140 rpm, when we
harness the energy produced, the drive power has to be increased and the
We have seen that the power produced comes only from the charge transfer
generated by the rotation of the wheels.
There is no mechanical link between the rotation of the wheels and the
balancing of the fork. To prove this, all you have to do is block the balancing

column2: you will note that the wheels continue to rotate.So this raises the question: “Why does the wheels’ rotational consumption

column1: increase when we harness the balancing of the fork?”
Our research has shown that the current harnessing of the energy produced
by the balancing of the fork breaks the kinetic energy of the masses on the
wheels. This made us come up with a new way of harnessing the energy, so as to
avoid any further impact on the kinetic energy of the masses.
In this case, the rotation of the masses should therefore always consume 62
If this technical development (which forms the subject of a new patent we
have filed) functions as foreseen, we will be able to supply the excitation of
the masses with the energy produced by the balancing of the fork. The energy
difference will be available for serving human activity without generating
Designing individual generators fitted with heavier masses that rotate
faster in order to produce the energy required for everyone’s needs is
Pulling this feat off would provide the world’s nations with real energy
independence and would offer a real solution for combating the greenhouse
effect.We have always financed our research with funds provided by the founders of
the project, but we now need your help!Further information: www.gravity-one.com",10.0,1,"1 Campaign

column4: >larLayer™ is the world’s first photovoltaic additive that can convert any pavemented road and any constructed surface into a solar energy generator.

column1: We love the idea of a green, sustainable world. But we know how hard to achieve that is. Power generation has some mayor difficulties and distribution too(being gigantic costs and energy loss over distance the main barrier).

We set out to invent a technology that although revolutionary would not disrupt the industrial processes already established in society. Distribution of energy through standard power lines is very expensive (from 300,000USD each mile of linear power-line), so something that would generate and distribute on every local area is a mayor advance. We work in the electric engineering sector designing high-voltage electric towers, engineering complete power lines, large-scale transformation stations and power generation plants.

We also inspect the construction of these works and know how complex it is. So we invented something that we knew it could be developed and installed hassle-free. It might sound simple, but it took us years of experimenting.
We are experts in the field with almost 40 years of experience and we know that once in the market, this will be huge and will empower humanity.

The system can be used as an additive for asphalt and for house paintings. If installed correctly it can generate enough electricity for a normal house. It is very easy to install. The basic electric components look very much like salt and must be mixed with the paintings before application. After the painting has been finished, a special wire, that will ship with the box, has to be installed 2 cm inside the limit of the paint all the way to the energy stabiliser.
The SOLARLAYER™ system consists of three basic components: The conductor fibre, photovoltaic cells and an energy stabiliser.
The conductor is a super thin 2µm (microns) copper-based alloy fibre that acts as the basic conducting surface. This fibre can be fabricated as a cloth(thicker but more efficient ) or as a powder.

column4: >he photovoltaic cells are the most innovative and revolutionary of the three components. They have the capacity to transform light sources to electricity, to work as an intelligent conductor and to sense the magnetic north. Cells surfaces have a series of conducting and non-conducting areas.

column1: Through a special process, each photovoltaic cell is able to use this areas to intelligently allow and stop energy flow from and to the fibre conductor avoiding a shortcut chaos.

Most importantly, each cell will re-route energy coming from the fibre to the magnetic north. This is the way by which the flow of energy always finds its way to the right place. At the top of the system, energy is recollected by a special copper wire.

The third component is the tension stabiliser. It receives electric current from different parts of the conductor fibre by the copper wire and it stabilises it before generating a useful current output.

It is important here to note that the copper wire and the tension stabiliser are always installed in the north and the whole system in the South.  This is the only reference the photovoltaic cells have for current re-routing.
The system has been designed to work in 3/12V.
Once the electrical output is obtained, this system is connected to the house grid.
The prototypes we have manufactured are super light and clear crystals, essential to absorb lots of light.

SolarLayer™ will go intro production in 2016 for standard paintings and for asphalt in 2017. We have a lot of work to do in order to take the painting from the Lab to the streets. Because of this, we invite manufacturers, chemical engineers, industrial engineers, councils, universities, governments and other scientific institutions to help us in this profound development.
2014 - 2015 - Component Development in Lab, Lab Testing and development of prototypes. Trademarks and Patents Registry
October - December 2015 - Prototypes presentation to scientific community and new development and manufacturing partnerships.
January 2016 - May 2016 - Lab hiring and testing of final products.

column1: T-SHIRT SOLAR - Ringspun cotton BLACK T-Shirt with cool design to help us spread the word.
T-SHIRT KEEP CALM - Ringspun cotton BLACK T-Shirt with cool design to help us spread the word
PHONE CASE - Available for the new Samsung Galaxy S5, as well as the Samsung Galaxy S3 and S4. (We will ask you)
ECO-FRIENDLY BAG - Take these eco-friendly bags everywhere to get the message seen.

DUAL CAR CHARGER - Dual auto plug adapter. Plug into accessory power outlet to charge two personal devices simultaneously. Compatible with smart phones and any device that provides USB cable for charging (including iPad® and tablet devices). Input: 12-24 Volts. Output: 5 Volts/2.1 Amps. USB cable not included.
GOLF TOWEL - Terry velour. Dobby hemmed heavyweight golf towel. Includes corner grommet and hook.

SLIM POWER BANK - This 3000 mAh rechargeable lithium polymer Grade A battery is enough to charge smartphones, MP3 players and more. Reusable power bank charges via USB cable (included) which can recharge the battery backup or be used to charge devices with micro-USB input like Android smartphones from Samsung, Motorola, HTC, Nokia, and others. Four blue LED lights illuminate to indicate charging level. Input: 5V 1000mA. Output: 5V 1000mA.

LIMITED EDITION TOUCHSCREEN GLOVES - Soft, knit gloves with touchscreen compatibility in thumb, middle and index fingers. Includes microfiber drawstring carry pouch that also functions as cleaning cloth.

column1: MOBILE PHONE SOLAR CHARGER - 7W Portable Foldable Solar Panel Charger for Apple iPhone 6 plus 5s 5c 5 4s 4, ipad 2/3/4 mini Air, Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge S5 S4 S3 Note 4 3, LG G4 G3 Vigor, HTC One M9, Blackberry, Sony, Other Android Phones and Tablets, Bluetooth Speaker, PSP, GPS, Gopro Camera and Other 5V USB-charged Devices
ON-SITE VISIT - You will be invited to participate on a Hands-On experience when a Road is being constructed and the first electrical bulbs with SolarLayer are light.
SOLAR LAYER PAINT - We will send you 12 Litres of White Paint with the SolarLayer Technology. Enough to Convert your Roof in a SolarPanel with the explanations on how to install it.
SOLAR LAYER PAINT BIGGER ROOF - We will send you 30 Litres of White Paint with the SolarLayer Technology. Enough to Convert your Roof in a SolarPanel with the explanations on how to install it.
MEET THE TEAM - Meet the team for lunch, discover the magic of the SolarLayer technologies and Taylor your House to a Solar Autonomous House. (ANALYSIS INCLUDED) - Location to be Arranged.
SOLAR LAYER TEAM TAYLOR MADE ANALYSIS - Meet the team via Skype and get a taylor made transformation of your complete house to an Autonomous Solar House. Roof Paint Included.

column2: UK - One member of the team can visit your school or university for an exclusive one to one presentation of solar energies and its infinite capabilities.

column1:
Risks and challenges

Our founders have extensive engineering backgrounds and expertise in Civil Works, Road Construction, Transformation, Distribution and Generation of Electricity in Large Scale as well as Managerial and Industrial Production knowledge. 

The team members have certified for more than 3 ISO Engineering Quality Standards. 

Our most senior partner has participated, directed and executed Electric Engineering Large Scale Projects over the world and is a member of CIGRE (The Council on Large Electric Systems, an international non-profit Association for promoting collaboration with experts from all around the world by sharing knowledge and joining forces to improve electric power systems of today and tomorrow.) 

Our Multi-disciplinary team have members with deep understanding of USA, European, Latin-American and Asian industrial markets and Chinese Electronics Production, Shipping and Product Distribution. 

Our Multi-disciplinary team has previously designed and produced electrical devices from scratch.

We have studied the SolarLayer product from start to finish in detail, from blueprint to installation and maintenance. We have succeeded to find suppliers and technology partners that can assist the Team in the manufacturing process 

The team has also studied possible alternatives to essential electrical and chemical components of the SolarLayer in case of industry discontinuation and to avoid delays, 

We have analysed the risks of governmental approvals and shipping authorisations for different countries. 

We have registered Trademarks in the USA, UK and Europe. 

As we include Talks and Travel as Gifts, we have planned dates and assigned proper team members for each Talk and House Analysis. Members will be in that country on expected delivery date. 

After strict risk-management analysis the team determined that the project is highly achievable in a short-term.

Founded in 2014, TRINUS was created out of a desire to act as a focal point for modern technology, design and user needs. PLANT’S JEWEL represents our first finalized product and featured on lots of Japanese media. It has already been sold to the public domestically in Japan. Our first crowd funding at indiegogo aims to deliver our products to markets out of Japan for the first time. We hope it proves to be the first of many.

 

Three Great Features
1. Transform an everyday container into a vase

Using PLANT'S JEWEL, even an ordinary container can become a vase that securely holds the stems of flowers and plants. The design makes it simple to make the most of cut flowers. PLANT’s JEWEL can be used with everyday containers such as bowls and wineglasses for a unique visual impact.
2. Showcase the beauty of solitary flowers

While cut flowers are beautiful and add so much color to everyday life, they're not always cheap. A display of just one or two cut flowers may look forlorn, but with PLANT'S JEWEL, even a single flower can be held securely to create an eye-catching display.
For larger displays, a PLANT'S JEWEL with multiple openings can fix each stem in place.
3. Anti-bacterial property that keeps water clean

Cut flowers can wilt very quickly if the water they stand in isn't changed. Even though the flowers have been cut and arranged, they will still take in water and are damaged by the bacteria that breed in it. If certain bacteria enter the cut stems, the flowers may be unable to draw water smoothly. That's why PLANT'S JEWEL utilizes an advanced antibacterial coating to keep flowers fresh.

Developed by Kobe Steel, Ltd., KENIFINE™ is a high-performance antibacterial electroplating technology that is 10 times more effective at controlling microorganism growth than conventional anti-microbial products. Simply putting it in a vase limits the growth of bacteria, keeping the water clean, which in turn helps flowers absorb water more easily.

column2:
>Kobe Steel began studying materials with antibacterial properties after a mass outbreak of food poisoning in the Osaka region in 1996, and developed KENIFINE™ in 2001. Now this life-saving technology is being put to work protecting your cut flowers and plants.

 

About each design

column1: The PLANT’S JEWEL line features four different designs to suit a range of different styles and designs.

The design bears a motif of fizzy bubbles. The piece is placed on a champagne glass or wine glass, and used to support flower stems in its holes. Holes of varied sizes accept stems of differing thicknesses.
NOTE: Cannot securely hold flowers when placed in a flat or shallow container.

The design bears a motif of bangles. The item can be placed on a dish or plate for use without a flower vase. It can also be used inside a large vase in which a small number of flowers would not be supported.
NOTE: As water would quickly evaporate in a dish or plate that is too shallow, a container with some depth is recommended.

The design bears a motif of rings. The item can be placed on a dish or plate and used without a flower vase. It can also be used inside a large vase in which flowers lacking volume would not be supported.
NOTE: As water would quickly evaporate in a dish or plate that is too shallow, a container with some depth is recommended.

The design bears a motif of a mirrored ball. A sphere of 85mm in diameter, the item is used like the kenzan (spiky frog) of ikebana when paired with a container or largish wine glass into which it just fits. Naturally, it can also be used with a single flower or single plant stem.
NOTE: Cannot support long flowers when placed in a flat plate or flower vase.
column2: >SIZE: Diameter 8.5cm While all the products are simple, they will be delivered wrapped and would make suitable gifts for friends and others.

column1: The PLANT'S JEWEL product concept was powered by the Trinus co-creation platform, which generates optimum value at the intersection of technology, design and user needs.
Three design teams were entrusted with the task of bringing the product concept to life for you. Each team normally designs jewelry for people. Let's find out more about them.
The first team, simmon, creates jewelry under the concept of ""threads of memory."" The designs hint at distant recollections.

Designer Shimon Sato first experienced the joy of creating things with his own hands at the age of 15 when his mother guided him to the art of metal carving. Sensing that he would pursue this kind of work for his whole life, he underwent training as a jewelry maker and launched his brand in 2012.
On this occasion, his designs are patterned after soap bubbles and fizzy bubbles.
The second team is Lamie, a brand offering bold, three-dimensional jewelry reminiscent of objets d'art and abstract sculpture: accessories that can be worn as art.

While working at an apparel-related company, designer Emi Nakamura studied how to craft metal into accessories at a jewelry studio. She left her job in 2014 to get Lamie going in earnest. The brand has been skyrocketing in popularity, and recently can be been seen worn by models and celebrities.
Lamie has provided designs patterned after leaves and bangles.
januka is a brand that explores somewhat offbeat concepts, unbound by preconceptions of the materials and techniques of jewelry.
Designer Jo Nakamura returned to Japan after studying product design at design academies in New York and the Netherlands, and launched the brand in 2012.
januka's designs on this occasion are patterned after mirrored balls and rings.

While we have encountered many unexpected hurdles, we have been working with some of the most experienced partners and manufacturers in the industry since we have successfully merchandised our products in Japan.

While your order will be shipped by orders we receive, it would be highly appreciated if you could place an order as soon as possible since your order might not be delivered to you prior to Christmas day in the case where we receive much more orders than expected.
And while there could be unexpected situation along the way, we will provide timely updates to our backers and do as much as we can to deliver the PLANT'S JEWEL to you on time.

","Founded in 2014, TRINUS was created out of a desire to act as a focal point for modern technology, design and user needs. PLANT’S JEWEL represents our first finalized product and featured on lots of Japanese media. It has already been sold to the public domestically in Japan. Our first crowd funding at indiegogo aims to deliver our products to markets out of Japan for the first time. We hope it proves to be the first of many. Three Great Features

This system can be easily installed anywhere in your home.

Those locations - the most attractive to use all features of the system.

You can connect any numbers of CategoryButton or ProductButton to the MainButton, and you can use as many Bases as you need.
• After you have made a decision on what objet to buy, press the appropriate button.
• Controller, that is part of MainButton, will process data and send the code of the pressed button to MasterHub.
• The MasterHub microcomputer will store the name of the object in the actual database of the needed objects.
• When our application is used for the next time with any authorized Smartphone it automatically receives the actual list of the needed objects by connecting to MasterHub via Internet.
• Install MasterHub, plug it in power network and connect it to WiFi.
• Start the application on your Smartphone, enter “settings” and choose “connection of new Base”.

• Allocate the first MainButton in a convenient place, name it «Bathroom» as an example, press MainButton button – new Base will be added to the system. Name it with «Bathroom» according to the location.
• Attach first CategoryButton, by pressing the button enter its name in your Smartphone, for example «Oral Care Products».
• Attach ProductButton at the top or at the bottom CategoryButton, by pressing the button enter appropriate name, for example «Toothpaste».
• Repeating the previous actions, attach and name the necessary number of CategoryButton and ProductButton.
• Further, you will have the opportunity to add new, remove needless, and change the names and locations of any CategoryButton and ProductButton.

We offer several options for the implementation of the system: 

We work on other options of implementation but according to the reviews of the people who take part in the testing of the first testing systems these three options meet the demand in 90%.

This size is ideally suitable for the installation of the system in most common places: on a fridge, cupboard or cabinet doors in the kitchen, bathroom etc. Taking into account the standard width of all these surfaces (60 cm), such size allows to install up to 11 CategoryButton wide and 10 ProductButton from the top and bottom of each CategoryButton. Thus, for instance, around 220 name buttons can be placed on the surface of a fridge, which totally meets the demand in terms of the products kept in the fridge.

We are aware of a cardinal difference in needs and demands of every particular family. That is why during the production of each Base, individual inscriptions, the list of which is stipulated with every customer, are applied on most of the buttons via laser etching. Subsequently, you can print any other name of an object on ""self-adhesive inkjet film"" (several sheets are included).

If there isn't an appropriate button for an item you need to buy due to rare importance of its buying, what you need to do is to press a button of a selected Category or the main Base button. When you need to use it again your smartphone will inform you to buy something for kitchen if you press the main Base 'Kitchen' button.

Our Team funds the development of the presented system using its own assets. Almost one year has been spent on the development of the principles of operation, design, system hardware and software. We need your support for the production and testing of pre-production prototype of the system, its improvement, promotion of our applications for iOS and Android on AppStore and GooglePlayMarket, and series production launch. 

How can Base be mounted on the surface?
column2:
>With the help of 3М adhesive tape. It securely keeps the system on any surface and enables to remove or add new buttons.

Will the electronics experience malfunction under high humidity?
column3:
>All buttons of the Base systems are water-proof, which guarantees its continuous functioning under high humidity in bathrooms, kitchens etc.

How often do batteries need to be replaced?
column4:
>Under average use, battery in MainButton needs to be replaced once a year.

The fact is that some things change, the friends, the roads we take, the places we live in... but some things remain, which never changes, our memories, our feelings, our shared moments ....

Lighting Balls are a warm symbol of sharing worldwide. 

Everywhere, different people, different ages, different cultures but the same feeling.
column2:
>

My name is Ekaterina Galera and I'm a France-based designer and creator of felted wool lights.

I always wanted to transform raw material into a beautiful object that makes our daily warm.

In that way, for long time ago I used to modify all my lights I had. With these luminaires, I tried to combine many different materials, and it is the wool that impressed me the most. I started experimenting with the exceptionally soft and luxurious merino wool and I discovered that its interaction with light gives a warm and gentle atmosphere.

column1: I worked for days and days to find the ideal shape and ideal size. Taking inspiration from everywhere, from everything but trying and making models in my studio. Each light is designed and created in my studio in Toulouse. I use an old traditional method of felting wool. Just handmade work and natural materials – wool, water, and organic soap - as it was hundreds and hundreds years ago. It is an ecological and animal-friendly way to produce in the textile industry. The material comes from sheep's brushed wool ribbon. When wool is mixed with water and soap it turns into a very soft and plastic texture. After – it is possible to give freedom to the imagination and to create any form of lamps.

column2: >

column1: For me, the ideal luminaire had to be an object that is both playful and luminous. This lighting decoration had to combine natural colored felted wool to sources of warm and golden light. This lighting object can be removed and installed everywhere you want. It could be on a coffee table, on a shelf or even hanging on a wall... .

column2: >And I found it - This is the Lighting ball.
column3:
>

It is a nice gift to yourself or to any person, whom you love. Warm and soft – lighting balls can be excellent declarations of delicate taste and peaceful nature. Whether on or off, they will find their place as well to give some warmth to any living spaces, as to illuminate exceptional events.
column4:
>

A garland lights is inside the lamp, with 10 bulbs mounted on a transparent LED cable with a button on the battery box (Operates with 2 x AA Batteries).
column5: >
column6: >
column7: >
column11: >
column12:
>

Now, I'm designing, I'm producing and I'm communicating myself my brand. I need to be more concentrate on the design part of my creations. Thus, I decided  to organize this campaign. Additional funds will help to expand production, and to delegate some parts of the job.

To begin with, this first campaign I need to receive enough funds to buy more raw materials. It will help me to produce more and to begin to be able to employ a collaborator, which will help me to organize my work.

For this, I need your help. To realize my business plan, I need to sell enough quantity of my creations. In partnership with you, I will move and develop my project and be able to create gifts for the people, who like to present gifts, who love warm feelings, who love people and who love good memories.
column13: >Support my project, become my sponsor,
column15: >
column16: >
column17: >
column23: >Specials and limited rewards are offered to you, to be shipped before Christmas, 25% off.
column30: >Other rewards are available, 20% off.
column36:
>Risks and challenges

I guarantee a high quality of my creations. I can ensure the timely delivery of your orders. Being very responsive to any issues that might arise, I guarantee real support to our backers. I will communicate with you and answer any questions. In the case of any unforeseen delay, I will notify backers immediately. In any case, be sure you will receive your order and get proper support. Thank you.
column37:
>[Version Française/French Version]

Le fait est que certaines choses changent, les amis, les chemins que nous prenons, les endroits où nous vivons ... mais certaines choses restent, qui ne changent jamais, nos souvenirs, nos sentiments, nos moments partagés ....

Les Boules de Lumière sont un symbole chaleureux de partage dans le monde entier.

Partout, des gens différents, des âges différents, des cultures différentes mais le même sentiment.

Mon nom est Ekaterina Galera, je suis un designer et une créatrice de luminaires en laine feutrée, situé en France.

J’ai toujours en envie de transformer la matière première, brute, en un joli objet qui rend notre quotidien plus chaleureux. Pour cette raison et depuis longtemps, j’ai l'habitude de modifier tous mes luminaires. J'ai essayé d'associer beaucoup de matériaux différents, et c'est la laine qui m'a le plus impressionnée. Ce matériau donne un effet très doux et chaleureux à la lumière qui le traverse.

J’ai travaillé pendant des jours et des jours pour trouver la forme idéale et la taille idéale. Je me suis inspiré de tous les lieux, de tous les objets, et j’ai essayé et crée de nombreux modèles dans mon atelier. Chaque lumière est conçue et créée dans mon atelier à Toulouse. J'utilise une vieille méthode traditionnelle de feutrage de la laine.

J'essaye de préserver un maximum l'aspect naturel et écologique dans mes créations, c'est pourquoi je pratique une méthode traditionnelle de feutrage à la main, utilisant seulement de l'eau et du savon de Marseille. La tonte des moutons étant obligatoire pour leur bien-être, je suis fière de collaborer avec les fermiers, qui vendent la laine.

Lorsque la laine est mélangée avec de l'eau et du savon, elle se transforme en une texture très douce et plastique. Ensuite - il est possible de donner libre court à son imagination pour créer toute forme de lampes.

Pour moi, le luminaire idéal doit être un objet qui est à la fois ludique et lumineux. Cette décoration doit combiner la laine feutrée naturelle à des sources de lumière chaude et dorée. Cet objet doit pouvoir être enlevé et installé partout où vous voulez. Il peut être sur une table basse, sur une étagère ou même accroché sur un mur ....
column38:
>Et je l'ai trouvé – C’est la Boule de Lumière !

C'est un beau cadeau pour soi-même ou pour une personne que l'on aime. Chaud et doux – les Boules de Lumière en laine feutrée peuvent être d'excellentes déclarations de goûts délicats et de nature pacifique. Que ce soit éteint ou allumé, les boules de lumière trouveront leur place aussi bien pour donner un peu de chaleur à tous les espaces de vie, que pour éclairer des événements exceptionnels. 

Aujourd’hui, je conçois, je produis et je communique moi-même ma marque. Je dois être plus concentrée sur la conception de mes créations. Ainsi, j'ai décidé d'organiser cette campagne. Ces fonds contribueront à accroître la production, et me permettront de déléguer certaines parties du travail à un collaborateur.

Pour cela, j’ai besoin de votre aide. Pour réaliser mon objectif, je dois vendre une quantité suffisante de mes créations. En partenariat avec vous, je vais développer mon projet et être en mesure de créer des cadeaux pour les gens, qui aiment offrir des cadeaux, qui aiment les sentiments chaleureux.

La tonte des moutons étant obligatoire pour leur bien-être, je suis fière de collaborer avec les fermiers, qui vendent la laine.Lorsque la laine est mélangée avec de l'eau et du savon, elle se transforme en une texture très douce et plastique. Ensuite - il est possible de donner libre court à son imagination pour créer toute forme de lampes.Pour moi, le luminaire idéal doit être un objet qui est à la fois ludique et lumineux. Cette décoration doit combiner la laine feutrée naturelle à des sources de lumière chaude et dorée. Cet objet doit pouvoir être enlevé et installé partout où vous voulez. Il peut être sur une table basse, sur une étagère ou même accroché sur un mur ....Et je l'ai trouvé – C’est la Boule de Lumière !C'est un beau cadeau pour soi-même ou pour une personne que l'on aime. Chaud et doux – les Boules de Lumière en laine feutrée peuvent être d'excellentes déclarations de goûts délicats et de nature pacifique. Que ce soit éteint ou allumé, les boules de lumière trouveront leur place aussi bien pour donner un peu de chaleur à tous les espaces de vie, que pour éclairer des événements exceptionnels. Aujourd’hui, je conçois, je produis et je communique moi-même ma marque. Je dois être plus concentrée sur la conception de mes créations. Ainsi, j'ai décidé d'organiser cette campagne. Ces fonds contribueront à accroître la production, et me permettront de déléguer certaines parties du travail à un collaborateur.Pour cela, j’ai besoin de votre aide. Pour réaliser mon objectif, je dois vendre une quantité suffisante de mes créations. En partenariat avec vous, je vais développer mon projet et être en mesure de créer des cadeaux pour les gens, qui aiment offrir des cadeaux, qui aiment les sentiments chaleureux.Soutenez mon projet,Merci !",26.0,1,"1 Campaign

column3: >We are excited to announce our new product – Playwuu. We make cat toy boxes from a solid, natural plywood. Our collection is built to evoke feline hunting instinct. Playwuu is a perfect gift for your pet. Our wooden boxes inspire cats to explore, scratch and sniff and keep curious animals mentally and physically sharp.
column5: >We tested our play box on different cats from various breeds and ages from 6 months up to 17 years. Both kittens and cats started actively playing with Playwuu and they loved it!

column1: • Quick assembly without any nails or screws
• Two variants: heavy (500 g birch box, recommended for adult cats) and light (300 g poplar box, recommended for kittens)

column4: >We are passionate about animal welfare. Laser cutting creates perfectly smooth edges.
column6:
>We include two balls that could be replaced by your cat’s favorite toy or even some snack. If you want to keep your box more robust we supply small tube of PVA glue (safe non-toxic glue for children and animals)

You can take a plain wood box or choose one of our “big cats patterns”.
column7:
>

All patterns are made by environmentally friendly UV-printing.

column2: >Plywood consists of several layers arranged in different directions. It makes our Playwuu box a strong and durable toy with long lifetime compared to other cardboard or MDF (Medium Density Fibreboard) toys.
>Plywood is one of the most environmentally friendly products.
>Plywood is more resistant to water damage than MDF, and will not soak up water and swell as quickly as MDF does.
>Plywood highlights the natural beauty of the wood. Choose it if you prefer it over any other material (plastic, rubber, silicone etc.).

column4: >10 percent of the profit will be donated to Helsinki Zoo to support wild cat protection programs:

column1: Will my cat play with it?  We tested our products on different cats from various breads and ages. Even 17 year old cat starts actively playing with it. You can always put your cat’s favorite toy inside.
Product lifetime. Our Playwuu game boxes are made from high-quality 6mm plywood. It has a longer lifetime compared to cardboard or MDF.

Working with the manufacturer and large volume orders. We are very proud about our manufacturer and that our box production is made in Finland. By having good relations with our manufacturer we will be able to control the quality of Playwuu boxes. Quality assurance is the main reason for producing locally.

Global ordering and shipping costs. One of our biggest challenges is to keep a reasonable price and a fast delivery time for worldwide shipping. We are able to lower shipping costs down to 18 EUR (worldwide) or just 14 EUR (EU countries). DHL global.

column2: >There is always a risk in manufacturing and shipping. Our team is working hard to ensure that everything is ready for accepting orders.
>Thanks to all cat owners and their cats who help us in testing all our prototypes.

","We are excited to announce our new product – Playwuu. We make cat toy boxes from a solid, natural plywood. Our collection is built to evoke feline hunting instinct. Playwuu is a perfect gift for your pet. Our wooden boxes inspire cats to explore, scratch and sniff and keep curious animals mentally and physically sharp.We tested our play box on different cats from various breeds and ages from 6 months up to 17 years. Both kittens and cats started actively playing with Playwuu and they loved it!

column1: Quick assembly without any nails or screws
Two variants: heavy (500 g birch box, recommended for adult cats) and light (300 g poplar box, recommended for kittens)

We are passionate about animal welfare. Laser cutting creates perfectly smooth edges.We include two balls that could be replaced by your cat’s favorite toy or even some snack. If you want to keep your box more robust we supply small tube of PVA glue (safe non-toxic glue for children and animals)You can take a plain wood box or choose one of our “big cats patterns”.All patterns are made by environmentally friendly UV-printing.

Plywood consists of several layers arranged in different directions. It makes our Playwuu box a strong and durable toy with long lifetime compared to other cardboard or MDF (Medium Density Fibreboard) toys.
Plywood is one of the most environmentally friendly products.
Plywood is more resistant to water damage than MDF, and will not soak up water and swell as quickly as MDF does.
Plywood highlights the natural beauty of the wood. Choose it if you prefer it over any other material (plastic, rubber, silicone etc.).
10 percent of the profit will be donated to Helsinki Zoo to support wild cat protection programs:
We promise timely and transparent communication throughout the entire process. Our team is working incredibly hard to successfully deliver the Playwuu boxes on time.

Will my cat play with it?  We tested our products on different cats from various breads and ages. Even 17 year old cat starts actively playing with it. You can always put your cat’s favorite toy inside.
Product lifetime. Our Playwuu game boxes are made from high-quality 6mm plywood. It has a longer lifetime compared to cardboard or MDF.

Working with the manufacturer and large volume orders. We are very proud about our manufacturer and that our box production is made in Finland. By having good relations with our manufacturer we will be able to control the quality of Playwuu boxes. Quality assurance is the main reason for producing locally.

Global ordering and shipping costs. One of our biggest challenges is to keep a reasonable price and a fast delivery time for worldwide shipping. We are able to lower shipping costs down to 18 EUR (worldwide) or just 14 EUR (EU countries). DHL global.
There is always a risk in manufacturing and shipping. Our team is working hard to ensure that everything is ready for accepting orders.
Thanks to all cat owners and their cats who help us in testing all our prototypes.
Big thanks to our manufacturer and a special to Frank.
We are truly grateful for the valuable support and backing of our faithful community.

We are looking to raise € 4,000 to help manufacture the first batch of Playwuu play boxes. If you like what you see please help us spread the word. Please share our campaign and product freely with your friends and family!",14.0,0,"1 Campaign

Cables are everywhere. All electronics and communication devices have cables. Our world is truly full of cables. Because electric power and communication are essential for our survival and civilization. Home, stores, offices, and industrial sites are full of electronics and have cable organization issues.They are in a chaotic state or are always longer unnecessarily.


Gamkki is an innovative cable roller for compact, easy, clean, and safe organization of small, short, large, or long cables.

It can serve cable bundling, rolling, and cable holding and takes a whole new ground than the cable tie through  1) flexible loop, 2) flexible body, 3) 360 ° rotating cable stretch prevention, and 4) one-touch lock/unlock system.

Versatile cable roller for compact, easy, safe, and organized storage of small, short, large, or long cables

 

Versatile for bundling, rolling, and holding ""gamkki""

 

 It enables easy and safe organization, storage, and portability of cables of earphones, chargers, USB, mouse, electronics, laptops, hair dryers, beauty devices, mixers, kitchenware, 10 m coaxial cables and phone lines, power strips, electric pads, fans, heaters, air conditioners, glue guns, tools, and lights.

 

 

A new dimension we’ve never seen before                                          

World's most effective cable organizer- gamkki

This product, born after 17 years of waiting, looks like a typical item, but a precious one.
Actually, we did not focus on this product area in the past.

We have devoted ourselves to developing and distributing an innovative product to save the standby power for the past 17 years. This is what we focus on, an energy saving power strip. We are well known for the specialization in saving the standby power in Korea and around the world. We won the Presidential Award in the Korea Patent Technology Exhibition for 'CHECKTAP,' a smart power strip equipped with software, and the Grand Prix in the International Exhibition of Invention Geneva, for the first time in Asia. We have certified many international electrical safety standards such as CE (Europe), ETL (U.S.), and PSE (Japan) and acquired special certificates such as WHQL (Microsoft) and several international patents. In addition, we won the Technology Grand Award of Hyundai E&
column2: C in 2017 for 'wall-mounted automatic standby power block socket.' Recently, we released the 'set-top box standby power KILLER).'

column1: Looking back into our history, we only stuck with one thing, developing standby power control technologies and distributing products with them to the world.
To let more people know our energy saving power strip, we exhibit it in about 50 international exhibitions. We exported it to about 20 nations.
For more information on our innovative energy saving products created with our devotions in sweat, blood, and tears, visit www.checktap.com and www.eco-brg.com.
Search our video clip, “INCASOLUTION” on YouTube. You can see various information on us such as the Grand prix in the International Exhibition of Invention Geneva.
However, it was not easy to distribute our energy saving - green products.
It was a long and rough journey.
We devoted ourselves, our youth, enthusiasm, time, and money, to create products for 17 years.

While continuing the arduous journey, we focused on and on the development and distribution of energy saving power strips, and paid much persistent attention to general ideas on energy saving and related issues. For example, we had much interest in cable arrangement and thought about related problems and resolutions for a long time.

Multiple power cables are connected to a power strip. Thus, it needs to arrange the cables. A power strip itself has a thick and long cable so that it is not easy to arrange it. Our world is full of cables because electric power and communication are essential for our survival and civilization. However, cables are longer than we need. In addition, their length and thickness are different and the use and arrangement of cables of electronics are also different.

‘With one small device, let people more easily, neatly, and safely arrange/store/use/carry various small, short, large, or long cables of earphones, chargers, mouses/keyboards, electronics, communication devices, standing signboards, lamps, etc. It looks like a small thing, but very beneficial to the lives of people around the world.’ This proposition was always one of the thoughts in our hearts.
To implement the proposition, we started to develop the item.
However, it is not an easy way to achieve our goal.

We stayed up all night thinking about the item. Even when the dawn is breaking, we concentrated on the development of the item. Lost weight by 10 kg. Fortunately, after the development, gained weight slowly.
We were very pleased when we found a clue of an invention.

However, during the product development process that looked like easy, it was hard to have high function and quality and implement good durability. Finally, we completed the development at a price. We did not compromise with knocking items together so that it takes long time to give this product to the world. There is nothing easy.
This product is born after severe pains, and we wait for your comments on this product.
We have had a tough journey while doing our business for a long time. However, we have continued to conduct research intensely.
We have never gone back against difficulties.
There is a proverb, heaven helps those who help themselves.
We have a lot of innovative ideas.
We would like to introduce the ideas to you and receive your evaluation in the future.
We are waiting for your strict evaluation. We gently request your support for our invention to be quickly proliferated in the world.

We ask for your continuous interest and support so that small companies like us or individuals can continue to bring out creative ideas created from painstaking efforts, resulting in making contributions to the world and people.

For US fulfilment, rewards will first be sea freight from our Korea manufacturing facility to LA, California or NY warehouse and thereafter be shipped to US addresses via insured USPS Priority Mail or FedEx Ground.
US based backers are expected to receive rewards within a week from shipping from USA warehouse.

For Rest of the World fulfilment, rewards will be air freight directly from our distribution center in Bucheon, Korea. Backers are also expected to receive rewards between 5-20 days from shipping. (Or, in case of EU fulfilment, rewards can be as follow
column2: first be sea freight from our Korea manufacturing facility to Germany warehouse and thereafter be shipped to EU addresses. In this case, EU based backers are expected to receive rewards within  a week from shipping from our, Germany warehouse. Or, rewards can be air freight directly from our distribution center in Bucheon, Korea. In this case - within a week from shipping.)

Our world is full of cables because electric power and communication are essential for our survival and civilization. However, cables are longer than we need. In addition, their length and thickness are different and the use and arrangement of cables of electronics are also different.

‘With one small device, let people more easily, neatly, and safely arrange/store/use/carry various small, short, large, or long cables of earphones, chargers, mouses/keyboards, electronics, communication devices, standing signboards, lamps, etc. It looks like a small thing, but very beneficial to the lives of people around the world.’ This proposition was always one of the thoughts in our hearts.
To implement the proposition, we started to develop the item.
However, it is not an easy way to achieve our goal.

We stayed up all night thinking about the item. Even when the dawn is breaking, we concentrated on the development of the item. Lost weight by 10 kg. Fortunately, after the development, gained weight slowly.
We were very pleased when we found a clue of an invention.

However, during the product development process that looked like easy, it was hard to have high function and quality and implement good durability. Finally, we completed the development at a price. We did not compromise with knocking items together so that it takes long time to give this product to the world. There is nothing easy.
This product is born after severe pains, and we wait for your comments on this product.
We have had a tough journey while doing our business for a long time. However, we have continued to conduct research intensely.
We have never gone back against difficulties.
There is a proverb, heaven helps those who help themselves.
We have a lot of innovative ideas.
We would like to introduce the ideas to you and receive your evaluation in the future.
We are waiting for your strict evaluation. We gently request your support for our invention to be quickly proliferated in the world.

We ask for your continuous interest and support so that small companies like us or individuals can continue to bring out creative ideas created from painstaking efforts, resulting in making contributions to the world and people.

For US fulfilment, rewards will first be sea freight from our Korea manufacturing facility to LA, California or NY warehouse and thereafter be shipped to US addresses via insured USPS Priority Mail or FedEx Ground.
US based backers are expected to receive rewards within a week from shipping from USA warehouse.

For Rest of the World fulfilment, rewards will be air freight directly from our distribution center in Bucheon, Korea. Backers are also expected to receive rewards between 5-20 days from shipping. (Or, in case of EU fulfilment, rewards can be as follow
column2: first be sea freight from our Korea manufacturing facility to Germany warehouse and thereafter be shipped to EU addresses. In this case, EU based backers are expected to receive rewards within  a week from shipping from our, Germany warehouse. Or, rewards can be air freight directly from our distribution center in Bucheon, Korea. In this case - within a week from shipping.)
