In 2017, we introduced the Firewalla Red on Kickstarter and Indiegogo,  giving you visibility and control to protect your network.

In 2018, we introduced the Firewalla Blue on Indiegogo, making cyber security more powerful at 500 Mbits.   We introduced VPN client, Safe Search, and Geo IP filtering free upgrades.
column16: >
column24: >With these new and exciting technologies coming up
column26: >You will need a security device that can handle more than Gigabit, and has more interfaces to protect your digital things at home and work.

column1: Deep Insight helps you see the network at up to 3+ Gigabits per second.
Control your network with intrusion prevention (IPS) and network segmentation, adding virtual walls around your connected devices and lock them down.
Active Protect Rules blocks malicious sites, mitigates hacks and enhances security.

column8: >Sophisticated security and networking features are a couple of taps away.
column9: >

column4: 3 Gigabits Performance For Now and the Future
column10:
>

The Firewalla Security Stack is the same software that’s been powering the Firewalla Red and Blue since 2017.  The same features will be brought over to power the Gold.
column12:
>Cyber Security

From smart speakers to baby monitor cameras, there is no shortage of technology in your home for hackers to exploit. Firewalla sends automatic alerts and protects your devices from cyber threats.

column1: • Detect, prevent and block active cyberattacks and intrusions
• Monitor for abnormal trends through intelligent behavior analytics
• Continuously scan your home for security vulnerabilities and risks

column3:
>Parenting with Ease

Parenting is a tough job, but Firewalla makes things easier.  With a simple tap of a button, you can:

column2: >Stop any devices from playing online games
>
column7:
>Bandwidth Usage Insights

Worried about Internet usage limits or network performance issues? Firewalla Deep Insight provides a summary of hourly, daily or monthly usage, allowing you to dig deep into any device and see the IP or domain address consuming bandwidth and stop it.

column1: • Hourly, daily, and monthly bandwidth usage summary
• Identify which domain is consuming the bandwidth

column6:
>Safe Search

Safe Search is a feature used by major search engines like Google Search, YouTube, Bing, and DuckDuckGo to filter adult content out of search results.   If anyone enters an inappropriate or suggestive phrase in the search bar, the results will be filtered for offensive content.
column8:
>Make Your Privacy a Priority with VPN

Are you comfortable sharing your data when using public Wi-Fi or traveling to regions where the internet is filtered or controlled? 

Introducing Firewalla OpenVPN server, a VPN server that runs inside of your home or business without charging a monthly fee.

column1: • Bypass internet filtering and monitoring when traveling

column3:
>VPN Client:  Securely Connect to Any Device

With Firewalla’s VPN Client, you can connect any device or devices in your network to many OpenVPN based services.

column1: • Connect any IoT devices like Apple TV to third-party VPNs
• Remotely connect your home devices to another Firewalla
• Connect two sites together with a site-to-site VPN and access devices securely both ways

column4:
>Say Goodbye to Annoying Ads

Website ads and trackers have been frustrating internet users for years. That’s why Firewalla's built-in ad blocker makes sure you don't see ads and the ads don't see you.

column1: • DNS cache to speed up all other lookups

column4:
>Advanced GEO-IP Filtering

Using GEO-IP Filtering, a technology that can block network traffic from entire countries, you can effectively stop hackers from remotely attacking your business or home network.
column7:
> Take Back Family Time

Firewalla is committed to taking back family time from social networks. The “Social Hour” feature blocks all social networks for one-hour increments, giving you more time to spend with family.

column1: Firewalla puts the power in your hands and gives you full control of your network. You can block web pages, cut off access to devices, and remove ads. You can even block sites by specific category types, like Gaming, Social, Video, Porn, Gambling, and P2P.
• Block activities such as gaming, social, video, porn, gambling, and p2p
• Get notified when devices are online or offline
Your Firewalla is an open platform!  Now, you can easily and safely extend Firewalla functionalities with applications running inside Docker containers.
The firewalla web interface will complement the mobile app on complex operations to help you manage and control your network.  A mobile device is required to activate and use the web interface.
Thanks to our worldwide supporters, we are able to offer Firewalla products localized to different languages.

column2:
>

Firewalla Gold can create secondary firewalls within your home network through ‘network segmentation’.  Network segmentation divides your network into regions with dynamic and static policies/rules.

column1: Create a network segment for kids and employees with their own rules and policies.  You can limit access to the internet, filter activities, and more.
Isolate critical devices into their own network.  Only permit devices like security cameras to talk to their own network.
Create a secure guest network, in order to apply a high level of protection to your guests, and manage their activities in real-time.

column3:
>Segment Lockdown

Actively quarantine any device and restrict its behavior on the network.  This feature works by blocking all traffic to and from any network segment, only allow selective sites or activities.  

Examples:

column1: • New devices connecting to the network will need approval
• Only allow school sites to be accessed
• Only allow access to the company network and email

column3:
>

Firewalla can be installed with most routers in Simple Mode (plug and play mode) without changing existing wiring, around 5 min.
column4:
>

In case you have multiple routers, you will be able to use the advanced simple mode to have the same Firewalla Gold monitor and manage multiple routers on your network.
column7:
>

In addition to the traditional Simple and DHCP modes, Firewalla Gold includes a third “Router” mode.  You now have the option to do a plug and play install complementing your current network or redesign your network with the Firewalla Gold as the main router using our mobile app.
column9:
> 

Firewalla Gold is a software-based router, managed by the same intuitive Firewalla app.  It has the capability to identify and shape your network based on rules you define, right at your fingertips.

column1: • Per Device and Per activity QoS / Rate Limit
• More router features are to be released in phases
Learn more about the Firewalla Security Stack

column6: >
column11:

The Firewalla team is made up of former Cisco engineers with a desire to use our experience in networking and cybersecurity to secure the world’s internet.  We believe powerful cybersecurity options should be accessible, affordable, and easy to use. We are a small team, with a shared passion for architecture, design, and keeping our customers happy.

This is our third crowdfunding.  We have delivered thousands of units in the two previous campaigns, on time and early.   We truly enjoy the journey of working with great customers like you.  Together, we secure the world.

When it comes to household chores, everyone dreads vacuuming. It’s noisy and difficult to use a cumbersome and heavy traditional vacuum. Tangled cords are a hassle and often it’s impossible to clean in hard to reach areas. Because of this, vacuuming often gets put off or ignored, leading to an untidy home.

Today ushers in a new era in convenience with an affordable, effective, automatic robot vacuum cleaner. The Puppyoo R6 Home brings a new level of intelligence and automation to vacuuming with the ability to learn, map and adapt to a home's floor plan, all while providing the most efficient floor cleaning solution. 





 

Latest Hands-on Review for Puppyoo R6 Home from OSREVIEWS
column12:
Mopping

Puppyoo R6 Home is a 3-in-1 robot that sweeps, vacuums and mops. It has edge-sweeping and main brushes to get the cleaning job done. And ultra-fine microfiber mop pads to guarantee its cleaning job done to perfection.
column26:
s=785b5c2cc7d0c5c17fd0f7b76424b5e1"" src=""""/>

 

Food spills, kids at play… the R6 Home robot can handle it all. Using a powerful and reliable Nidec motor for outstanding performance, Puppyoo R6 Home provides 2000 Pascals of suction that effortlessly takes care of dust, dirt, pet hair, food crumbs, etc.
column40:
s=43190add1c50ffafc15b18ad2df61df4"" src=""""/>


 

Your Entire Home Cleaned in a Single Charge

 

With its built-in 6400 mAh lithium battery, Puppyoo R6 Home can cover up to 3,230 square feet (300 square meters) and provides up to 240 minutes of non-stop cleaning power. The R6 Home can clean your whole home in a single charge.

column1:
Different flooring types and conditions are no problem for the R6 Home. It automatically detects and adjusts its cleaning method to effortlessly handle carpets, vinyl floors, wood floors, or tile.

When the Puppyoo R6 Home detects carpets, the robot employs its Carpet Boost technology to automatically increase suction. Then, when it detects a change to hard surfaces such as hardwood or tile, it sweeps efficiently without harming the floor.
column2: >Smart Navigation: LDS + SLAM
column4:
>Unlike the average robot vacuums that bounce randomly around a room, the R6 Home is equipped with Laser Direct Structuring (LDS) + SLAM dual smart mapping and navigating system. Puppyoo R6 Home is able to learn and record your entire home and create an effective cleaning plan that takes into consideration room size, objects, and floor type.  

 


 

Smart Home Compatible

Puppyoo R6 home is easily controlled by App and smartphone but is also your smart home ready, working with Google Home and Amazon Alexa. When a cleaning is needed, all you need to do is speak up!

 

 

Clean at Your Fingertips

Ushering in a new era of consumer robots, the Puppyoo R6 Home allows users to clean specific rooms in the home.  It gets to know the home's floor plan and any room or area can be chosen for cleaning at a predetermined time. 

 

 

 

Smart Sensors

With multiple smart sensors, the robot avoids obstacles and tackles rough terrain effortlessly. When it bumps into something, its ultra soft bumper keeps it safe from harm and the sensors tell the robot where to find a clear path.

Cliff sensors: It help the robot sense edges and elevation changes so it can avoid stairs or falling from heights.

Wall sensors: It let the robot follow very closely along walls and around objects without touching them so room perimeters stay clean and clear.

 

 

Safe Cleaning under Furniture

Other vacuums are too big to travel around furniture. The R6 Home uses a complex laser system and smart navigation for better awareness of its surroundings. It easily travels under certain chairs and tables for a more complete clean.


 

Stair Safety Technology

Have a two-story home? Don’t worry. The R6 Home recognizes dangerous areas (i.e. stairs) to safely navigate your home and concentrate on the most important areas while keeping itself upright and safe.

 

 

Whisper Quiet

At less than 65 decibels, the R6 Home is one of the quietest robot vacuums available. Its whisper quiet sound means that it won’t disturb movie night or study time. It quietly works away in the background, keeping your home, clean and serene.

 In today’s society, children seem to be more focused on instant gratification and that thought process carries over into everything that they do, including their eating habits. My goal is to teach kids, who may be at home alone, until their parents arrive, that there are healthier choices besides fast foods and microwavable dishes. I want to provide them with the opportunity to expand their culinary experiences with fresh fruits, vegetables, fresh herbs and spices. It’s a program geared toward giving children the nutrition they need for everyday healthy living. These kids will then be able to take these culinary skills into everyday life. If they decide to choose a career in the culinary industry they can take these skills around the world and work anywhere.

We will also have homework help from Board Of Education Teachers. This will help occupy a time period when many kids get into trouble after school.

I am looking to grow here with IndieGoGo.com because I want to be able to provide these services at no charge to parents. I hope to have earned enough funding through grants to keep the program running. If not then I will charge a minimum fee for cooking supplies only.
column2: > ( No Kids Will Be Turned Away ).

column1: Cooking for A Purpose is using the time during this pilot phase to fine tune the curriculum, and pursue our 501(c)3 status

One of my goals is to have a minimum of 10 cooking stations so the kids can get hands on lessons. Children from the inner city need exposure to different culinary options and my desire is that this afterschool program would do just that. Help children to understand the importance of good eating habits which will in turn become a healthy lifestyle. In order to accomplish this I will need capital to expand the kitchen and get supplies needed from local markets. We currently have about 5 kids learning and would like to expand to 20 or more kids daily. During our summer classes we have upwards to 15 kids daily. Your donations would go towards improving eating habits and at the same time the lives of our children….one child at a time!!!

Please If you have any questions please feel free to email me (CookingForAPurpose@Gmail.com). I will answer any and all questions.  When we are up and running site visits are welcome as well. I want people to see what their donation went towards.

At This Time We Don't Have any Perks To Give.  Budget has been really tight just working the program.

We will give you all a mention on our FB pages as well as Instagram and Twitter.

* Renovations of Larger Kitchen

** Kitchen Equipment
Video Equipment ( Video Feed Via Web So Funders and Parents Can View Progress )

column1: PS. Please allow me to clarify.. There are not any photos of kids because many of them are from a local shelter. They can't be put on Social Networks just incase they are being looked for...

","In today’s society, children seem to be more focused on instant gratification and that thought process carries over into everything that they do, including their eating habits. My goal is to teach kids, who may be at home alone, until their parents arrive, that there are healthier choices besides fast foods and microwavable dishes. I want to provide them with the opportunity to expand their culinary experiences with fresh fruits, vegetables, fresh herbs and spices. It’s a program geared toward giving children the nutrition they need for everyday healthy living. These kids will then be able to take these culinary skills into everyday life. If they decide to choose a career in the culinary industry they can take these skills around the world and work anywhere.We will also have homework help from Board Of Education Teachers. This will help occupy a time period when many kids get into trouble after school.

I am looking to grow here with IndieGoGo.com because I want to be able to provide these services at no charge to parents. I hope to have earned enough funding through grants to keep the program running. If not then I will charge a minimum fee for cooking supplies only. ( No Kids Will Be Turned Away ).
Cooking for A Purpose is using the time during this pilot phase to fine tune the curriculum, and pursue our 501(c)3 status

One of my goals is to have a minimum of 10 cooking stations so the kids can get hands on lessons. Children from the inner city need exposure to different culinary options and my desire is that this afterschool program would do just that. Help children to understand the importance of good eating habits which will in turn become a healthy lifestyle. In order to accomplish this I will need capital to expand the kitchen and get supplies needed from local markets. We currently have about 5 kids learning and would like to expand to 20 or more kids daily. During our summer classes we have upwards to 15 kids daily. Your donations would go towards improving eating habits and at the same time the lives of our children….one child at a time!!!

Please If you have any questions please feel free to email me (CookingForAPurpose@Gmail.com). I will answer any and all questions.  When we are up and running site visits are welcome as well. I want people to see what their donation went towards.
At This Time We Don't Have any Perks To Give.  Budget has been really tight just working the program. We will give you all a mention on our FB pages as well as Instagram and Twitter.
* Renovations of Larger Kitchen** Kitchen Equipment

column1: The Bulbh: The ‘Brighter’ LED For A ‘Brighter’ India""  -   GIZMODO

column3: >

column1: BULBH is ultra-portable. Just 35 grams and no bigger than a almond. Literally!

column4: >BULBH is very very bright. For the size, people are amazed by its power.

>BULBH is your truly tinkerable light, the no.of uses is only constrained to our thoughts. It's like your go-to light for any of your projects, from a highly efficient solar panel light to a auto-on garden light.

column1: Choose your own combination of body colour and the emitted light temperature colour. BULBH is extremely personal.

column8: >It’s an extension of you, that integrates with all aspects of your daily life.
column15: >It's a micro-USB powered light with a cause.
column22: >Billions of people around the world are without light.
column29: >Each one deserves something as simple as light. Don't they?
column36: >For each BULBH sold we donate one.
column43: >You have the power to give that ray of light.
column50: >Existing USB lights are very impractical. Almost all we tested had either extremely low brightness or unergonomic design. On the other hand, BULBH is a well-designed and complete product. With its ability to flexibly transform, you can now take BULBH everywhere (bicycle, camps, laptop, windows, walls, anywhere). BULBH will be a part of your everyday life and someone else's.
column57: >Our design has been inspired from a very popular sweet in India called
column71: >. The product that has resulted, has been worth all the effort and time we have put into it. This is what we have been waiting for.
column78: >We wanted to create a device that can withstand the stresses of everyday use, and at the same time is also something that looks and feels really good.

column1: Our aim is to make things that people need. We want to make things which everyone can use. Profit is not the motive, it's a by-product. Not all investors bear the same thought.

BULBH is now in progress and we're are almost there. We are continually developing to increase it's efficiency in terms of light output and reduced power consumption. 
Bulbh uses six 0.2 watt LEDs, each with a capacity of emitting 24 lumens of light. All LEDs have been placed in a series on an aluminum-core printed circuit board that maintains the circuit temperature uniformly.
The circuit comprises a dedicated high-frequency DC-DC converter that operates as a constant-current source. There is provision for high switching frequency that regulates the amount of inrush current and prepares the circuit for a soft start. This also prevents the circuit from over-voltage, short-circuit and over-temperature incidents.
On the outside, each Bulbh is fitted with a neodymium magnetic base so that the users can stick it on any metal surface. We also plan to provide two extra magnetic stickers with the product, so users can stick it to metal, stone wall, wood, ceramic or glass.
With its coin-sized smooth form factor, Bulbh looks sleek. The tiny lamp, with a rounded shape similar to that of an Indian sweet called ‘batasha’, is just 0.6 inches in height and 1.3 inches in width, and weighs between 30-35 grams.
We also plan to focus on promoting developments by alternatively powering it with batteries, solar, wind, dynamo, etc for the next generation BULBH.
BULBH will run for over 24 hours on a single charge with 10400mAH power-bank (not-supplied). In addition to this, we're integrating various functions and use cases, so you can attach it anywhere. It will be possible to stick it on walls and tiles apart from iron objects with the help of supplied magnetic stickers. It can be used as a emergency light, photography light, night/wall light, wardrobe light, cycle light, camp light, key chain, torch.
The biggest hurdle would be to keep the cost per piece in check. As we have tried to minimize the total cost and keep a very narrow cut. We now face the final major task of bringing all the elements together - tooling, testing, compliance and production.
We will keep you notified with up-to-date information.

column9: >BULBH uses top of the line components to get you 24hrs! of light on a 10400mAh battery bank.

column5: >Why is it so cheap?
column9: >Our aim is to make things which people need. We are keeping a very thin margin to help achieve this milestone. Also, huge scale of production is needed to meet our costs. This lets us push the price so low. We dream of improving the lives of more than a billion people through light, one at a time.

column5: >Can I power this from my phone?
column9: >If your phone supports OTG cable it will be able to drive BULBH. Great for photographs and selfies. Acts like a front-flash!

>What is the donate thing exactly?
You will help bring light to 550 million people in India living on less than 20$/month!!

column5:
>Micro-USB cable included?
Due to our price model we have not planned to include a micro-USB cable. But there is slight possibility that we include one if things go smoothly.

column10: >How do I select BULBH color, temperature
column11:
>, t-shirt?
After the project is funded, we'll contact each contributor to verify their preference.

column1: The Bulbh: The ‘Brighter’ LED For A ‘Brighter’ India""  -   GIZMODO
BULBH is ultra-portable. Just 35 grams and no bigger than a almond. Literally!
BULBH is very very bright. For the size, people are amazed by its power.

BULBH is your truly tinkerable light, the no.of uses is only constrained to our thoughts. It's like your go-to light for any of your projects, from a highly efficient solar panel light to a auto-on garden light.
Choose your own combination of body colour and the emitted light temperature colour. BULBH is extremely personal.

It’s an extension of you, that integrates with all aspects of your daily life. It's a micro-USB powered light with a cause. Billions of people around the world are without light. Each one deserves something as simple as light. Don't they?For each BULBH sold we donate one. You have the power to give that ray of light.Existing USB lights are very impractical. Almost all we tested had either extremely low brightness or unergonomic design. On the other hand, BULBH is a well-designed and complete product. With its ability to flexibly transform, you can now take BULBH everywhere (bicycle, camps, laptop, windows, walls, anywhere). BULBH will be a part of your everyday life and someone else's.Our design has been inspired from a very popular sweet in India called batasha. The product that has resulted, has been worth all the effort and time we have put into it. This is what we have been waiting for.We wanted to create a device that can withstand the stresses of everyday use, and at the same time is also something that looks and feels really good.
Our aim is to make things that people need. We want to make things which everyone can use. Profit is not the motive, it's a by-product. Not all investors bear the same thought.

BULBH is now in progress and we're are almost there. We are continually developing to increase it's efficiency in terms of light output and reduced power consumption. Bulbh uses six 0.2 watt LEDs, each with a capacity of emitting 24 lumens of light. All LEDs have been placed in a series on an aluminum-core printed circuit board that maintains the circuit temperature uniformly.The circuit comprises a dedicated high-frequency DC-DC converter that operates as a constant-current source. There is provision for high switching frequency that regulates the amount of inrush current and prepares the circuit for a soft start. This also prevents the circuit from over-voltage, short-circuit and over-temperature incidents.On the outside, each Bulbh is fitted with a neodymium magnetic base so that the users can stick it on any metal surface. We also plan to provide two extra magnetic stickers with the product, so users can stick it to metal, stone wall, wood, ceramic or glass.With its coin-sized smooth form factor, Bulbh looks sleek. The tiny lamp, with a rounded shape similar to that of an Indian sweet called ‘batasha’, is just 0.6 inches in height and 1.3 inches in width, and weighs between 30-35 grams.We also plan to focus on promoting developments by alternatively powering it with batteries, solar, wind, dynamo, etc for the next generation BULBH.BULBH will run for over 24 hours on a single charge with 10400mAH power-bank (not-supplied). In addition to this, we're integrating various functions and use cases, so you can attach it anywhere. It will be possible to stick it on walls and tiles apart from iron objects with the help of supplied magnetic stickers. It can be used as a emergency light, photography light, night/wall light, wardrobe light, cycle light, camp light, key chain, torch.The biggest hurdle would be to keep the cost per piece in check. As we have tried to minimize the total cost and keep a very narrow cut. We now face the final major task of bringing all the elements together - tooling, testing, compliance and production.We will keep you notified with up-to-date information.
How efficient is BULBH?BULBH uses top of the line components to get you 24hrs! of light on a 10400mAh battery bank.

Why is it so cheap?Our aim is to make things which people need. We are keeping a very thin margin to help achieve this milestone. Also, huge scale of production is needed to meet our costs. This lets us push the price so low. We dream of improving the lives of more than a billion people through light, one at a time.
Can I power this from my phone?If your phone supports OTG cable it will be able to drive BULBH. Great for photographs and selfies. Acts like a front-flash!
What is the donate thing exactly?You will help bring light to 550 million people in India living on less than 20$/month!!
Micro-USB cable included?Due to our price model we have not planned to include a micro-USB cable. But there is slight possibility that we include one if things go smoothly.
How do I select BULBH color, temperature, t-shirt?After the project is funded, we'll contact each contributor to verify their preference.

Hello, we are four friends who decided to create a new bike place in Barcelona.
Although none of us was born here we treat it like ours. Barcelona became our home, more precisely - Poble Sec area. Here we start the day with friends, here we finish it. And here our dream comes true - we decided to open a magic place for everyone who loves bikes like we do.

LA REPUBLIKA is a place that grew from love to bicycles, from need of freedom that they give. Our workshop is already running - we
opened it month ago, thanks to joint efforts we renovated and rebuilt
all interiors, set up our work space and we bought small business

license.

We want to create a place for everyone, no matter why and how one loves bikes. Place which is open, friendly, local.
We begin with renovating and restoring old and vintage bicycles. During renovation to aim to keep its original character but we don't forget about modern needs and aesthetics. We remember that every singe of our bikes has its own story behind. What we try is just to be part of this story.

https://www.facebook.com/larepublikabcn

Witajcie, jesteśmy czworgiem przyjaciół, którzy zdecydowali się otworzyć nowe rowerowe miejsce w Barcelonie. Chociaż nikt z nas się tutaj nie urodził, traktujemy je jak nasze. Od wielu lat mieszkamy w Barcelonie, a dokładniej - na naszej dzielnicy Poble Sec. To właśnie tutaj zdecydowaliśmy się spełnić nasze marzenie i otworzyć miejsce, dla wszystkich tych, którzy tak jak my kochają rowery.

La Republika to miejsce, które powstało z wielkiej pasji, z miłości do wolności, którą daje rower. Nasze miejsce już działa - udało nam się je otworzyć miesiąc temu dzięki kilkumiesięcznej pracy nad lokalem i papierami oraz dzięki wsparciu naszych przyjaciół i naszych rodzin.

Chcemy wykreować miejsce, do którego będzie mógł przyjść każdy - niezależnie od tego jak bardzo i dlaczego kocha rowery. Miejsce otwarte, przyjazne, lokalne. Od samego początku zajmujemy się renowacją starych i zabytkowych rowerów - dążymy do tego, aby pozostawić ich unikatowy charakter, od siebie dodajemy niezbędną funkcjonalność. Pamiętamy o tym, że każdy z tych rowerów ma swoją własną historię - to czego pragniemy to być jej częścią.

https://www.facebook.com/larepublikabcn

Despite we have a lot of knowledge, plenty of enthusiasm and ideas, we can't fully spread our wings. Your help could give us opportunity to become independent.
What we really need is:
• buy simple and more advanced tools we lack in our workshop
• expand our license - se we could be more flexible in what we do!
• course of welding frames - to repair broken vintage frames and parts!
• buy some bikes for rent - to invite you for bike trip through beautiful Barcelona!
• build our own serigrafia workstation - to preapare for you our unique t-shirts!
• renovate our patio and build a roof over there - to create green space for rest!

Chociaż posiadamy sporo wiedzy, wielki entuzjazm i przepełnieni jesteśmy pięknymi ideami, wciąż nie możemy do końca rozwinąć naszych skrzydeł. Wasza pomoc da nam szansę stania się niezależnymi.
To czego naprawdę potrzebujemy to:
• dokupić brakujące narzędzia do warsztatu zarówno te podstawowe i bardziej zaawansowane
• rozszerzyć naszą licencję - aby powiększyć zakres naszych usług!
• kurs spawania ram - aby naprawiać zniszczone ramy i części już nieprodukowane!
• kupić kilka rowerów na wynajem - aby zaprosić was na rowerową wycieczkę po pięknej Barcelonie!
• zbudować stanowisko do sitodruku - aby przygotować unikatowe t-shirty!
• remont naszego patio - aby przedłużyć lokal i stworzyć kolejną, zieloną przestrzeń!
We are offering you some really awesome perks (WORLD WIDE SHIPPING!):
1$ - Thanks! Really, every dolar counts! We are right now smiling towards you!
10$ - You will get our postcard with greetings from Barcelona. Thank you!
25$ - A small gift. You will get our La Republika's BAG and card with greetings.
35$ - Our La Repubika's T-SHIRT and one day free bike rent. Of course postcard goes with it. Thanks for help!
55$ - Warm and trendy La Republika's JUMPER with our print and one day free bike rent or one free bike service. Looks that you like us, thank you!
70$ - La Republika's JUMPER + T-SHIRT along with notebook with our print! You are someone special for us!
100$ - La Republika's JUMPER + T-SHIRT and bike inspired JEWELLERY made by our friends. You are our friend as well - we will thank you with your full name on our site.

300$ - You won TWO NIGHTS in cosy apartament in Barcelona (for 2 persons) nearby our shop. More of that... two days of free bike rent and small bike tour to show you around. You are our great supporter! We wil thank you with your full name on our site. HERE: https://pl.airbnb.com/rooms/10114530

500$ - Welcome in Barcelona! We have for you THREE NIGHTS in sunny and cosy apartament in Barcelona for 2-4 persons + three days of free bike rent and small bike tour to show you around. We wil thank you with your full name on our site. You became our official supporter! HERE: https://pl.airbnb.com/rooms/10114530

550 $ - You get unique vintage BIKE renovated and made in LA REPUBLIKA + T-SHIRT with our logo. We will help you to fit the size and choose design! Example here: http://larepublika.tumblr.com/post/133869189487

600 $ - We have for you unique single speed BIKE made in LA REPUBLIKA + T-SHIRT. Bike size: 60. Beautiful combination of vintage, old parts from 60' with modern elements. Special bike for special person: http://larepublika.tumblr.com/post/133869019712 

750 $ - Welcome in Barcelona! We have for you and your Friends 7 DAYS in sunny
and cosy apartament in Barcelona + 3days of free bike rent and small
bike tour to show you around. We wil thank you with your full name on
our site. You became our official supporter! You can come here during 1year from the end of campaing.
1$ - Dzięki! Naprawdę, każda pomoc się liczy!
10$ - Prezent: nasza pocztówka z podziękowaniami. Dziękujemy!
25$ - Mały podarunek: naturalna TORBA La Republika z pozdrowieniami!
35$ - T-SHIRT z logo La Republika i 1 dzień darmowego wynajmu roweru. Pocztówka oczywiście idzie razem z koszulką! Dziękujemy za pomoc!
55$ - Ciepła i modna BLUZA z naszą grafiką i 1 dzień darmowego wynajmu roweru lub 1 darmowy serwis rowerowy. Wygląda na to, że nas lubisz, dzięki!
70$ - BLUZA La Republika + T-SHIRT La Republika + mały rowerowy notes naszej produkcji! Jesteś dla nas kimś wyjątkowym!
100$ - BLUZA La Republika + T-SHIRT + rowerowa biżuteria stworzona przez naszych przyjaciół. Ty również jesteś naszym przyjacielem - podziękujemy Ci imiennie na naszej stronie.

300$ - Wygrałeś DWIE NOCE w miłym apartamencie w Barcelonie (dla 2 OSÓB), niedaleko naszego sklepu. Co więcej.. dwa dni darmowego wynajmu rowerów, w tym przejazd z przewodnikiem! Twoje wsparcie jest nieocenione! Podziękujemy Ci imiennie na naszej stronie! Tutaj: https://pl.airbnb.com/rooms/10114530

500$ - Witajcie w Barcelonie! Mamy dla Was TRZY NOCE w słonecznym i uroczym apartamencie w Barcelonie dla 2-4 OSÓB  + trzy dni darmowego wynajmu rowerów, w tym przejazd z przewodnikiem! Podziękujemy Ci imiennie na naszej stronie. Stałeś się naszym oficjalnym sponsorem!  Tutaj: https://pl.airbnb.com/rooms/10114530

550$ - Mamy dla Ciebie unikatowy ROWER w stylu vintage, całkowicie
odrestaurowany i zrobiony w La Republika + T-SHIRT z naszym logo i
naszej produkcji. Pomożemy Ci dobrać rozmiar i design Twojego roweru!

Przykładowy rower: http://larepublika.tumblr.com/post/133869189487

600 $ - Mamy dla Ciebie unikatowy ROWER stworzony w LA REPUBLIKA + T-SHIRT.
Rozmiar roweru: 60. Piękna kombinacja odnowionych części z lat 60 z
nowoczesnymi elementami. Wyjątkowy rower dla wyjątkowej osoby:

http://larepublika.tumblr.com/post/133869019712 

750$ - Witajcie w Barcelonie! Mamy dla Was i Waszych Przyjaciół 7 DNI w
słonecznym i uroczym apartamencie w Barcelonie  + 3dni darmowego wynajmu
rowerów, w tym przejazd z przewodnikiem! DO WYKORZYSTANIA PRZEZ ROK OD DATY ZAKONCZENIA KAMPANII.

We would like to share of what we will get with those kids who need them most. We decided to share 5% of what we will accumulate with foundation which helps orphan children from east Poland. We know some institutions which are focused on sport activities - they know that sports can help them in their difficult situations. Thanks this amount of money we can help finance their needs and we build and buy some bicycles for them. We know how activity is helpful and we will be very proud if we could share the cyclist passion with kids.

Oddziaływanie

Chcielibyśmy podzielić się uzyskanymi środkami, z tymi, którzy najbardziej ich potrzebują. Postanowiliśmy oddać 5% uzyskanej kwoty na fundację, która
pomaga dzieciom z domu dziecka we wschodniej Polsce. Znamy kilka instytucji, które poprzez rozwój sportowych umiejętności wśród dzieci, widzą
szansę na poprawę jakości ich życia. Dzięki pieniądzom zebranym podczas tej kampanii sfinansujemy ich niezbędne potrzeby oraz sami zrobimy i zakupimy kilka
rowerów. Wiemy jak aktywność fizyczna jest ważna - będziemy bardzo dumni i wzruszeni jeśli uda nam się wśród nich zaszczepić pasję do rowerów.

column2:
ChallengesOur workshop is already running. We are growing every day but still didn't root enough.

Our biggest challenge is to find our space on a market.

We

column1: are getting recognisable and we have our first regular customers. This
is very enjoyable and gives great satisfaction but we know that we can't
stop here. We have to work hard and constantly, don't break down with
worse months or failures. Just treat them as adventures, which are

source of experience and knowledge.

We feel not threatened  by this challenge, most opposite - it gives us strength.

Nasz lokal jest już otwarty. Zaczynamy się rozwijać, ale wciąż nie zakorzeniliśmy się na dobre.

Nasze największe wyzwanie to znaleźć swoje miejsce na rynku.

Jesteśmy coraz bardziej rozpoznawalni i zaczynamy już mieć swoich pierwszych, stałych klientów. Niezmiernie nas to cieszy i daje olbrzymią satysfakcję,
ale wiemy, że nie możemy się zatrzymywać. Musimy pracować ciężko i wytrwale, nie załamywać się gorszymi miesiącami czy porażkami, traktować je jak przygody,
które są źródłem wiedzy i nauki.

Nie przeraża nas jednak to wyzwanie, a wręcz przeciwnie - daje nam siłę!

Other Ways You Can Help
We appreciate any help you can offer!
• Piszcie do nas swoje komentarze, jesteście dla nas bardzo ważni!

Witajcie, jesteśmy czworgiem przyjaciół, którzy zdecydowali się otworzyć nowe rowerowe miejsce w Barcelonie. Chociaż nikt z nas się tutaj nie urodził, traktujemy je jak nasze. Od wielu lat mieszkamy w Barcelonie, a dokładniej - na naszej dzielnicy Poble Sec. To właśnie tutaj zdecydowaliśmy się spełnić nasze marzenie i otworzyć miejsce, dla wszystkich tych, którzy tak jak my kochają rowery. La Republika to miejsce, które powstało z wielkiej pasji, z miłości do wolności, którą daje rower. Nasze miejsce już działa - udało nam się je otworzyć miesiąc temu dzięki kilkumiesięcznej pracy nad lokalem i papierami oraz dzięki wsparciu naszych przyjaciół i naszych rodzin. Chcemy wykreować miejsce, do którego będzie mógł przyjść każdy - niezależnie od tego jak bardzo i dlaczego kocha rowery. Miejsce otwarte, przyjazne, lokalne. Od samego początku zajmujemy się renowacją starych i zabytkowych rowerów - dążymy do tego, aby pozostawić ich unikatowy charakter, od siebie dodajemy niezbędną funkcjonalność. Pamiętamy o tym, że każdy z tych rowerów ma swoją własną historię - to czego pragniemy to być jej częścią.https://www.facebook.com/larepublikabcn
Despite we have a lot of knowledge, plenty of enthusiasm and ideas, we can't fully spread our wings. Your help could give us opportunity to become independent.What we really need is:
buy simple and more advanced tools we lack in our workshop
expand our license - se we could be more flexible in what we do!
course of welding frames - to repair broken vintage frames and parts!
buy some bikes for rent - to invite you for bike trip through beautiful Barcelona!
build our own serigrafia workstation - to preapare for you our unique t-shirts!
renovate our patio and build a roof over there - to create green space for rest!

Chociaż posiadamy sporo wiedzy, wielki entuzjazm i przepełnieni jesteśmy pięknymi ideami, wciąż nie możemy do końca rozwinąć naszych skrzydeł. Wasza pomoc da nam szansę stania się niezależnymi.To czego naprawdę potrzebujemy to:
dokupić brakujące narzędzia do warsztatu zarówno te podstawowe i bardziej zaawansowane
rozszerzyć naszą licencję - aby powiększyć zakres naszych usług!
kurs spawania ram - aby naprawiać zniszczone ramy i części już nieprodukowane!
kupić kilka rowerów na wynajem - aby zaprosić was na rowerową wycieczkę po pięknej Barcelonie!
zbudować stanowisko do sitodruku - aby przygotować unikatowe t-shirty!
remont naszego patio - aby przedłużyć lokal i stworzyć kolejną, zieloną przestrzeń!
We are offering you some really awesome perks (WORLD WIDE SHIPPING!):
1$ - Thanks! Really, every dolar counts! We are right now smiling towards you!
10$ - You will get our postcard with greetings from Barcelona. Thank you!
25$ - A small gift. You will get our La Republika's BAG and card with greetings.

We would like to share of what we will get with those kids who need them most. We decided to share 5% of what we will accumulate with foundation which helps orphan children from east Poland. We know some institutions which are focused on sport activities - they know that sports can help them in their difficult situations. Thanks this amount of money we can help finance their needs and we build and buy some bicycles for them. We know how activity is helpful and we will be very proud if we could share the cyclist passion with kids.   Oddziaływanie

Chcielibyśmy podzielić się uzyskanymi środkami, z tymi, którzy najbardziej ich potrzebują. Postanowiliśmy oddać 5% uzyskanej kwoty na fundację, którapomaga dzieciom z domu dziecka we wschodniej Polsce. Znamy kilka instytucji, które poprzez rozwój sportowych umiejętności wśród dzieci, widząszansę na poprawę jakości ich życia. Dzięki pieniądzom zebranym podczas tej kampanii sfinansujemy ich niezbędne potrzeby oraz sami zrobimy i zakupimy kilka rowerów. Wiemy jak aktywność fizyczna jest ważna - będziemy bardzo dumni i wzruszeni jeśli uda nam się wśród nich zaszczepić pasję do rowerów.
Risks & ChallengesOur workshop is already running. We are growing every day but still didn't root enough.Our biggest challenge is to find our space on a market.We
are getting recognisable and we have our first regular customers. This
is very enjoyable and gives great satisfaction but we know that we can't
stop here. We have to work hard and constantly, don't break down with
worse months or failures. Just treat them as adventures, which are
source of experience and knowledge.We feel not threatened  by this challenge, most opposite - it gives us strength.

Nasz lokal jest już otwarty. Zaczynamy się rozwijać, ale wciąż nie zakorzeniliśmy się na dobre.Nasze największe wyzwanie to znaleźć swoje miejsce na rynku. Jesteśmy coraz bardziej rozpoznawalni i zaczynamy już mieć swoich pierwszych, stałych klientów. Niezmiernie nas to cieszy i daje olbrzymią satysfakcję, ale wiemy, że nie możemy się zatrzymywać. Musimy pracować ciężko i wytrwale, nie załamywać się gorszymi miesiącami czy porażkami, traktować je jak przygody,które są źródłem wiedzy i nauki. Nie przeraża nas jednak to wyzwanie, a wręcz przeciwnie - daje nam siłę!    Other Ways You Can Help
We appreciate any help you can offer!
Doceniamy każdą pomoc i dobre słowo!
Piszcie do nas swoje komentarze, jesteście dla nas bardzo ważni!
Wpadajcie nas zobaczyć w Barcelonie!",6.0,0,"1 Campaign
Graduating high school, I worked in my father's construction business for several years, I learned about the fundamentals of foundation, structure, etc.  I then attended Ringling School of Art &
column2: Design where I learned the power of color, space and scale. My creativity led me to Los Angeles where I entered the world of set decorating and art direction. This experience wasn't just about being creative, it was about time management, establishing dependable resources, budgeting and orchestrating a crew all in a short amount of time. I learned about Home Staging and how it was impacting the Realestate industry. I redirected myself and was hired as an assistant to a home stager.  My experience quickly moved me up the ladder to a lead designer position. It was in this position where I found my purpose. I was helping people and making a difference. All of the pieces began falling into place and DECOR REVAMP was created.

column1: Starting my own business has been exciting, challenging and is apart of ""the American dream""! With that dream, there is the reality that funds are a necessity to start the investment process to begin living that dream. I created my business plan, funded my plan through my savings and hit the ground running.  DECOR REVAMP has been growing steadily over the past 2 years is now my home staging division is gaining momentum at a pretty rapid rate. Its growth is a result of providing a great, affordable service and by ""word of mouth"". It is so exhilarating to get a call and hear, ""I saw your work and it is amazing! I have a project for you."" And, I haven't had to do any advertising. The service is selling itself! A fundraiser is a wonderful platform to get any business across that bridge to a business loan.  Your $1, $5, $50+ contribution will lead me and my team into our next phase which is about becoming incorporated, office and warehouse space, a down payment on a moving truck. There is quite a list and we are getting there but, your help across this bridge will open so many doors and I thank you immensely!

Hello Indiegogo Family . We are back!  

We love what we do and your ideas are our motivation, so we are back to take Platonics to the next level. Our Platonic adventure continues!  

We want to continue sharing this experience with the world. If you are new to Platonics, join us and share the magic of geometry! Hundreds of them have been distributed all over the world!  

Thank you all from the bottom of our hearts, you are the best!

30 seconds of your time could make the difference in building the Platonics community. Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend who wants to feel the power of the Elements!
column2: text=To%20those%20of%20my%20followers%20who%20want%20to%20feel%20the%20power%20of%20Elements%3A"" rel=""noopener nofollow"" target=""_blank"">
column3:
title=Platonics%20%3A%20The%20Perfect%20Totem%20In%20New%20Finishes"" rel=""noopener nofollow"" target=""_blank"">

The world we live in is moving too fast and sometimes we forget that the simplest experiences are the most authentic and beautiful. That is why we are committed to the value of handmade and unique pieces, combining the oldest techniques and a passion for detail.  

We invite you to feel a simple but unforgettable experience with our single cast solids of pure metal.

We believe that Platonics is more than just geometry. It is science, art, inspiration, a pure and real experience.  

Feel what it is to hold 2,500 years of history in the palm of your hand!

Discover what makes our solids unique. You can learn more about our finished metals and processes.

Remember that every Platonic is unique, made entirely by hand and individually just for you, using one of the most ancient techniques: smelting. We believe in the preservation of craftsmanship as a key to the enrichment of our society.  

Each piece is unique, cast and polished one by one manually, putting maximum attention to detail for it to be perfect.

QUALITY MANUFACTURING AND PROCESSING.

We work with one of the most ancient techniques, smelting. All our solids are cast in the traditional way using high-quality brass and bronze cast at over 900 degrees, then shaped and individually hand polished.  

Each figure is meticulously checked to verify its quality. Each piece is unique. We value quality work and an interest in details. In addition, each polyhedron or set has a serial number.

Thanks to Platonics you can enjoy a piece of History, from a single figure to a complete set. Two Collections: Classics and Elements. Available in 3 different sizes and 13 finishes.

Plato associated each polyhedron with an element: air, earth, water, fire and the universe. The new edition of Elements will not only offer new finishes, but also each solid has the symbol of its Element engraved.  

To represent each of the elements we have designed an elegant symbol that matches the pure and timeless design of our platonic solids.

EARTH: Antique Brass finish. The earth is the classic element that represents determination, certainty and physical power. Plato represented it with the hexahedron. Its colours are yellow, orange and brown. For the earth we have chosen an amazing antique brass finish we associate with the hues of the plain.  

FIRE: Brass with antique Copper finish. Fire is a classic element that represents energy and optimism, and is considered the most powerful of the elements, present in all the great religions and in alchemy and astrology. Orange, red and violet are its colours. The tetrahedron was the figure Plato used to represent it. The antique copper finish resembles the billowing flames of a bonfire.  

AIR: Titanium Brass finish. Air is intangible and is associated with thinking, intelligence, mental quickness and creativity. It perfectly symbolizes the scientist, the genius and the idealist. Plato related it to the octahedron and its colours are grey and white. For air we have chosen this attractive titanium finish to capture the lightness, hardness and sophistication of this element.  

UNIVERSE: Brass with rough crome and black finish. Meteor. The Universe is difficult to explain or measure. The whole, infinity, and the mystery of the unknown makes it something magical and unique, as beautiful as unattainable. Planets, stars and black holes make us dream of a fantasy world. Plato chose the dodecahedron to represent it .Inspired by the cosmos, we have given it an amazing rough finish in silver and black.  

WATER: BRASS with oxide greenish blue finish. Plato associated water with the icosahedron. Of the four elements, water is considered the most relaxing. It represents cleanliness and purity and symbolizes emotional life. Plato represented water with the icosahedron
column4:
Its colours are blue and green. We have chosen this fantastic turquoise tone to represent the oxidation of metal.  

We have also created three amazing finishes especially for Indiegogo: Mirror Chrome Brass, Metallic Blue Brass and Steell Brass.

The classics are our hallmark. Their beauty and purity makes them special and unique. Unlike new ""Elements"", our classics have no engraving. In addition, after being polished they are protected with a type of wax that eventually darkens resulting in a beautiful patina.

All our solids are available in 3 sizes: Mini, Big and Mega.

*There may be slight variations in size and weight due to the crafting process. Each piece is unique*

For those who want a complete set, we have designed an elegant base on which Platonics look like a work of Art. As it could not be otherwise, we have chosen one of the noblest materials: wood. In clear beech wood and Walnut varnish to highlight the tonality of our solids.  

Platonics Base is free for all backers that buy a set!!!

Find your combination in our perks. You can add more options to complete your selection with add-ons. For the most demanding do not hesitate to contact us, we will help you customize your perk.

Exchange Rate (03/12/2017) 1,00 USD = 0,936 EUR

Exchange Rate (03/12/2017) 1,00 USD = 0,936 EUR

Adding stuff to your reward is easy.  

The add-ons are added to the perk that you pledged for. You can add ANY, and as MANY of each available item to your current pledge.  

To add an additional item, you have to increase your pledge by the amount of the PERK at RETAIL PRICE plus additional shipping costs due the different weight of the total order.  You have to select the perk and enter in the “Additional Gift” option the amount until the total price of our offer. ( Just make sure that it adds up correctly)  

RETAIL PRICES do not include shipping. If you want an add-on on its own then you would have to pledge for the pledge tier, include shipping and finally, add the cost of your add-on and additional shipping cost.  

Additional shipping cost reference table:

For example: 

You pledge a MINI SOLID MATTE at the price of 25€ at Early Bird but want an add-on of the same or other item. 

To know the total amount you will need to do the following calculation: 25 (Early bird MINI SOLID MATTE CLASSICS) + 7 (shipping costs to USA, i.e.) + 30 (RETAIL PRICE MINI SOLID MATTE CLASSICS, i.e.) + 5 (additional shipping costs) = 67 €

Visit our website at PlatonicsLand.com for more details and some cool photographs! Feel free to follow us on our social medias for some more fun stuff as the project progresses!

We love hearing from our backers! Send us an email to platonicsland@gmail.com or message us on IndieGoGo.

 

We hope we can count on your help to make Platonics a reality and share with all of you this experience.  

Thanks for Reading!

--------------------------------------------------------------

Special thanks to Carlos, Fernando, Edgar, Cristina, Eoghan, Rubén, and our family for their support. 

Music Credits ""Black Vortex"", "" Crossing the Divide"" &

If you want an add-on on its own then you would have to pledge for the pledge tier, include shipping and finally, add the cost of your add-on and additional shipping cost.  Additional shipping cost reference table:For example: You pledge a MINI SOLID MATTE at the price of 25€ at Early Bird but want an add-on of the same or other item. To know the total amount you will need to do the following calculation: 25 (Early bird MINI SOLID MATTE CLASSICS) + 7 (shipping costs to USA, i.e.) + 30 (RETAIL PRICE MINI SOLID MATTE CLASSICS, i.e.) + 5 (additional shipping costs) = 67 €Visit our website at PlatonicsLand.com for more details and some cool photographs! Feel free to follow us on our social medias for some more fun stuff as the project progresses!We love hearing from our backers! Send us an email to platonicsland@gmail.com or message us on IndieGoGo. We hope we can count on your help to make Platonics a reality and share with all of you this experience.  Thanks for Reading!--------------------------------------------------------------Special thanks to Carlos, Fernando, Edgar, Cristina, Eoghan, Rubén, and our family for their support. Music Credits ""Black Vortex"", "" Crossing the Divide"" & “Hitman” Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/",45.0,0,"2 Campaigns

column1: Vickie Hornbuckle, ND is a Doctor of Naturopath and inventor of the Press-Dough

column3: >Evicted WWII veteran and his wife  left homeless inspired the invention of the

column1: Press-Dough to raise money for a home they could call their own. To get this
rolling they needed money (fundraising) and labor.
The idea came when Vickie and her husband, Brent volunteered to get an
elderly couple a home after they were evicted due to their landlord selling the home they were renting. He age 89 and a WWII vet his wife worked in the
mission field in South Africa for 17 years. It was on Brent and Vickie's hearts to get them
into a home they could live in for the rest of their lives.
Brent was in charge of the labor and Vickie was in charge of the fundraising. During the fundraising phase Vickie made 100’s upon 100’s of cookies searching for a faster way and one where the
cookies would be uniform she invented the Press-Dough. For those of you wondering they did get this couple into a home just before Christmas of 2015 but they did not do
this alone they had wonderful people in their community and across the nation who helped with this worthwhile project. They are thankful to all who participated.
Press-Dough is prefect for busy wives, mothers and
grandmothers. I great way to keep fresh baked cookies on hand, freeze the
cookie dough for those times you need something quick to pop in the oven. Make a batch and wrap today bake tomorrow. For
children Press-Dough helps in making their experience of learning to bake
fun. Use Press-Dough as Vickie did for fundraisers when you have 100’s of cookies to make,
the process using Press-Dough is quick and the cookies come out uniform.
A plunger that also acts as a rolling pin

column13:
s=e2535c463dda9c9a3b4126561c099f3d"" src="""" style=""""/> 

 Save money and de-clutter! Tired of losing lids, and looking for the right size in a messy cabinet? BeBox is stackable so one lid seals multiple meals. Screw to connect, one size fits all.

ADJUSTABLE
column18:
s=0d7db131a43b3e8990ce4c124716010c"" src="""" style=""""/> 

 Save time! Tired of prepping food to fit your Tupperware? BeBox is adjustable to fit your meal! Movable dividers allow meal preppers to customize portions.

COLLAPSABLE
column23:
s=e01cb1975ffcacdd5ea3cf9413f20922"" src="""" style=""""/> 

Save space! Tired of carrying dirty containers that take up room in your gym bag or purse? BeBox collapses down to less than half its original size! 

MEASURABLE

The measurement guide is still moulded inside the Bebox, but we need to hit our stretch goal to create a booklet to come with it!

PORTABLE

We no longer have the adjustable straps. Instead, it is a handle on the lid that you can attach and detach!

SUPPLEMENTAL

The supplement compartment no longer exists on the lid. We have designed a new FITBOX which is an interchangeable container that holds all your extras! If we meet our stretch goal of 100k, all pledgers of the Bebox and up GETS IT FREE!

COLORS: blue, green, white, black

column25:
s=2f12891a976354a2f5ff1004edc6a11d"" src="""" style=""""/> 

Video Produced by Vercel LLC (www.vercelllc.com)

Graphics Done by Bryan McClure (www.MomentumCreativeStudios.com)

Extra Assistance from Katrina Espiritu
column37:
s=3d22bc82f8ab3969a4d70a26bd7b78f9"" src="""" style=""""/> 

Prototype Phase

Please keep in mind the prototype used in the video and photos will not be the same material used in manufacturing. The prototype is simply to show the functionality of the features. To have the appropriate materials (plastic and silicone) to achieve all the features listed are from the molding- which is what we are raising the funds for! An advantage of being at this stage is that we can incorporate your feedback and thoughts before going into molding. We are open for suggestions and have room to make small adjustments if necessary. We will update you with the final design before going into production!

What happened to Kickstarter?

We were not allowed to have animations on Kickstarter and our project did not get approved on time. When the video was made back in March, we did not have a prototype to show the stackable and collapsable feature and due to budget we were unable to switch it out with our current prototype! We thank you for understanding and our excited to get a Bebox into your hands ASAP!

UPDATED CAD DESIGNS

column4:
>ECOSTOOL, THE ECO-FRIENDLY FURNITURE FOR KIDS

ECOSTOOL IS NOW READY FOR MASS PRODUCTION!

We put the goal to collect the best things the modern production can offer and to create the unique ideas. So, we have turned it into reality for you!

“What is that, then?” you will ask. Believe!

Here you can see a unique item that combines toy, stool, stand, seat for a picnic and attractive décor. Despite the fact that ECOSTOOL was created for kids it can bear the adult weighing up to 150 kg. It is impressive, isn’t it?
column6:
>THERE IS MORE TO COME!

We would like to draw your attention that ECOSTOOL is made of special cardboard wood fiber material with water-resistant coating. The advantages are evident:

column1: • The material is much lighter than wood. ECOSTOOL weight is only 500 grams! A kid can move the stool by himself without damaging the floor and with impunity
<li>The assembling requires several minutes. Being assembled ECOSTOOL takes up minimum place. It can be easily placed in the wardrobe or in the corner of the room
<li>There is no contamination unlike the plastic furniture. Of course, the material is eco-friendly and hypoallergenic
• Fair value (compared to similar wooden and plastic products).

column3:
>

 

And the last, but not the least: just imagine how many forests can be saved if other producers switch to wood fiber even partially. Indeed, it is equal to wood in terms of quality and strength
column4: however its consumption is one order less.
column5:
>


ECOSTOOL is developed and manufactured by PlayToyz, the company that has been developing toys in Estonia since 2015.

The goal of the project:

It is very important for us that the product is distributed throughout the world actively and attracts customers that can see other perspectives. It is also very important for us to save the forests and the environment. NOW From January 2018 ECOSTOOL is completely developed, tested, certified with EN71-1, EN71-2, EN71-3, EAC (other certification under process) and ready for the mass production. We are sure that every one of you will see the true value of our job and efforts we put into the project. Moreover, if we succeed we will expand the product range. So, you will see a lot of ECO furniture for kids and adults soon.

One of perks we offer is ECOSTOOL in combination with our PLAYHOUSE which is already popular product in our market.
column6:
>

 

Who we are?

Our company Vipline Ltd. has a 12 years’ experience in printing industry and production of illuminated signs, operating all over Europe since 2004. We registered our PlayToyz trademark in 2015 and our company is the author and manufacturer of all the products under PlayToyz brand name.

 

What we produce?

Toys and children’s products made of special high-strength ecofriendly material – whitewood fiber (birch) (ultra strong cardboard material). PlayToyz and associated trademarks, trade dress and designs are owned by our company. PlayToyz offers you to buy our products at the best price. Our European sales are very active
column7: moreover, our sales geography is increasing month-by-month.
column9:
>WE WILL NOT TALK STUFF AND NONSENSE!

When you receive your order you will see that you don’t just buy original furniture for your kid, but you invest in the future life, the life without destroying the forests and without dangerous furniture or openly boring interior solutions.

Become the part of the society that values the surrounding world and wants to save it for our children. Choose eco-friendly furniture, choose ECOSTOOL!
column10:
>

Choose 1 of 5 most popular designs 

The funds go to marketing needs and if we don't reach our entire goal, we will deliver you your order anyway, so you can enjoy our product! Ecostool is already producing now in small quantities every day.

Please help us to let more people know about our campaign, please share our campaign using Indiegogo share tools. Thank you!
column11:
>

 

VAT AND TAXES

Products backed and sold inside the EU are covered with Estonian VAT and are subject to no further costs. Please be advised that products shipped outside EU could be subject to local VAT and Taxes. You have to check up with your local regulations in order to get information.

DISTRIBUTORS AND WHOLESALERS

If you are keen to distribute or buy ECOSTOOL in bulk, please get in touch with the team at playtoyz@playtoyz.eu and we would be happy to discuss working with you.
column12:
>

FAQ

Where is ECOSTOOL produced?  

ECOSTOOL is designed and produced in Estonia.

Where can you buy a ECOSTOOL?   

You can buy ECOSTOOL here on Indiegogo. Go to the Perk of your preference in the right hand column.  

What material is it made of?  

We use special 7,5mm wood fiber (of birch) carefully selected after multiple tests and tailored for this particular product (PlayToyz OEM ultra strong cardboard with woodfiber layers). There are no other similar materials in the market in this class.

Will there be more designs in the future?  

Yes, we are planning to introduce ECOSTOOL in a variety of designs.  

I accidentally chose the wrong design on ECOSTOOL, can I change it?  

Yes, write us an email and we will change your order.

When do you ship? 

We’re starting to ship ECOSTOOL one month later after Indiego campaign end

How will ECOSTOOL be shipped?   

ECOSTOOL will be shipped in a bubble envelope or in a cardboard box with secure packaging inside to protect it (depends on perk).

Can I get a refund?  

For a refund please see following articles:

https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles... 

https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles... 

Can I be a reseller of ECOSTOOL?  

Yes, contact us on playtoyz@playtoyz.eu and let’s have a talk. 

Can I combine my purchases to save on shipping? 

Unfortunately not. The Indiegogo platform does not support this feature.  

If I have any further questions can I contact you?  

Write us an e-mail on: playtoyz@playtoyz.eu we’ll be happy to answer all your questions.  

FAQ regarding claiming perks 

https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles...

column1: Introducing OnSleep: The World’s First Smart Therapeutic Pillow
You’re not alone if you aren’t happy with your posture.
Sitting hunched over for hours using our computers &
column2: phones, causing a very unnatural position for the human body. Then, not getting the support your neck needs using standard pillows that push our head forward for hours during slumber.

column1: That’s why OnSleep is here, introducing to you the world’s first smart therapeutic pillow that’s designed with your posture, comfort, and life of ease in mind!
The OnSleep Pillow is a prime therapeutic pillow that helps restore your natural neck curvature and gently distributes pressure from your thoracic spine precisely.

Posture pillows are well known in the medical community, where they’ve been used to naturally relieve neck pain for decades. However, what we have done is truly something special, by introducing Smart Lighting and Smart Speakers into our pillow we have revolutionized the pillow. To that end, we are working on making it accessible to everyone.
Here’s how OnSleep’s patent pending design helps improve your quality of life.

Engineered perfect neck contour. Providing proper neck positioning, maintaining the natural curve of your neck. The unique design cradles your head while you sleep on your back, increasing restorative REM sleep and enabling a deeper sleep.
The problem: Ordinary pillows just aren’t working. Your spine and head are pushed forward, leaving you in a fixed slouching position for more than 8 hours on average.
The solution: But here’s good news, OnSleep restores your natural neck curvature (cervical spine) while also supporting your head, and upper thoracic spine perfectly. Get rid of unwanted neck pain.

Elevated and curved surface for side sleepers. This boosted extra height for your pillow is great for side sleepers and snorers, elevating the pillow just right allows you to sleep in a natural state keeping your spine aligned. The implemented curved surface allows comfortable sleep without the unwanted ear pressure. With 2 different raised areas this pillow is perfect for just about anyone.

The problem: Here’s why your pillow isn’t helping. While sleeping your neck just isn’t aligned properly to your body using your typical pillow, leaving your head and neck either too high or too low. This causes extreme stress on your body, pinching and irritating nerves.
The solution: With OnSleep’s proper elevation your muscles can relax, keeping your nerves unpinched. Wake up feeling like a truly new version of yourself.

Serotonin, melatonin, and cortisol levels. Studies have been shown that therapeutic pillows increase serotonin and melatonin levels, reducing stress and anxiety. While also decreasing cortisol levels, improving your mood and boosting restful deep sleep at the same time. Relax your muscles and wake up feeling refreshed, ready to take on the day.
This results in a reduced cortisol level and an increase in serotonin production, meaning it helps decreases your blood pressure and heart rate.

Type of construction. Unlike other ordinary pillows that go flat and lose shape, OnSleep® uses non-allergenic, non-toxic memory foam (50d medium density) so it remains very supportive and comfortable all night. Never again fluff up or readjust, don’t let your head sink or shift during slumber. While being breathable so you don’t sleep hot.
Advanced pillow shape: Get the support you need! With our one of a kind One Size Fits all design. Ranging from 6'5 all the way to 4'9 support.

column2: First of its kind, You Say?

column1: OnSleep’s secret weapon is the pillow's smart therapeutic shape designed for helping your posture. The smart technology in this pillow just elevate it into something truly spectacular, making this pillow the first ever “smart” therapeutic pillow. This was our mission and we couldn’t be more ecstatic about sharing with you.

Why smart RGB lighting in a pillow? Well its simple, we implemented smart lighting to improve your body’s sleep and wake hormones, saying farewell to horrible restless nights and sleepy mornings. And because sleeping is only half of the problem, waking up is equally as important. We added a sunrise simulation light to mimic nature's sunrise, 30 minutes before the alarm clock even rings the light will slowly brighten up, waking you up in a natural way helping you feel more awake and energetic.
Waking to light has been trending and getting a lot of good attention in recent years, and we wanted to accessible to everyone. Making this therapeutic an all in one affordable smart design.
Why you do NOT wake up improperly! It can negatively impact your day, even sabotages your day stealing your energy and assisting in bad choice making.

Why add built-in speakers in a pillow? We all have alarm clocks either on our phone or on our nightstand, so why try to reinvent the alarm we are so used to? Well it’s simple, with our 2 strategically placed speakers directly under your head you will surely not to miss hearing or oversleep the alarm go off. Your significant other will be sure to enjoy their sleep more as you will wake up without interrupting them.

App technology: The OnSleep App allows you to elevate the way you sleep. We have implemented a simplistic UI design for you to navigate through the app with ease. As you turn on the App you will be taken to the home screen. From there you will be able to see your pillows Battery life, Bluetooth settings, and screen options. You will easily be able to navigate to your Alarm Settings, Sound/Speaker Settings, Light Settings, And more. It doesn't stop there, we have also added a sunrise simulation feature that over time will gradually light up in an array of warm colors to mimic the Crack of dawn. This is the way nature intended for us to wake up, by light.

Here’s why waking up refreshed matters! Boosting your energy levels, you will experience a much better day and a better you. You might notice yourself making much better decisions when it comes to going to the gym, eating healthy, and even being happy.
How to get OnSleep Pillow? Your Rewards!
You might want this pillow if you care for your noggin. This pillow feels fantastic!
The typical “pillow” is no more. Sleep on OnSleep for just 45 nights and dramatically notice a change.

A good pillow is necessary for your health. The reason being is you look and feel more confident, proper positioning relaxes your muscles, and it fixes your posture while you sleep. We don’t treat good pillows as an accessory for your health, but as a need.
The body has very important sleeping needs:
The 10-pound precious head you have needs support and comfort
Proper neck support being firm yet gentle
Proper elevation and structural shape for your body
Natural awaking to smooth lighting, as if waking up to the rising sun
Falling asleep to known beautiful sounds and calming music
Waking up to peaceful alarms, setting you up for the day
We implemented every feature into this pillow making it perfect for all your needs. Making this not only an investment in a pillow, but an investment in your future health
OnSleep is the Right Choice for You!
Back us today, to get the deep sleep you've always dreamed of. Sleep on OnSleep.
Each member of our team is motivated and obsessed with bringing OnSleep to life!

If you aren't satisfied with The OnSleep Pillow, return it to us within 30 days of receiving it for a full refund. We have built an amazing relationship with our manufacturer. Not only do they support our vision, but they work hard to make our products the best quality possible, our delivery date is a very reasonable approximate guess.

The problem: Here’s why your pillow isn’t helping. While sleeping your neck just isn’t aligned properly to your body using your typical pillow, leaving your head and neck either too high or too low. This causes extreme stress on your body, pinching and irritating nerves.
The solution: With OnSleep’s proper elevation your muscles can relax, keeping your nerves unpinched. Wake up feeling like a truly new version of yourself.

Serotonin, melatonin, and cortisol levels. Studies have been shown that therapeutic pillows increase serotonin and melatonin levels, reducing stress and anxiety. While also decreasing cortisol levels, improving your mood and boosting restful deep sleep at the same time. Relax your muscles and wake up feeling refreshed, ready to take on the day.
This results in a reduced cortisol level and an increase in serotonin production, meaning it helps decreases your blood pressure and heart rate.

Type of construction. Unlike other ordinary pillows that go flat and lose shape, OnSleep® uses non-allergenic, non-toxic memory foam (50d medium density) so it remains very supportive and comfortable all night. Never again fluff up or readjust, don’t let your head sink or shift during slumber. While being breathable so you don’t sleep hot.
Advanced pillow shape: Get the support you need! With our one of a kind One Size Fits all design. Ranging from 6'5 all the way to 4'9 support.
Smart Technology & First of its kind, You Say?

OnSleep’s secret weapon is the pillow's smart therapeutic shape designed for helping your posture. The smart technology in this pillow just elevate it into something truly spectacular, making this pillow the first ever “smart” therapeutic pillow. This was our mission and we couldn’t be more ecstatic about sharing with you.

Why smart RGB lighting in a pillow? Well its simple, we implemented smart lighting to improve your body’s sleep and wake hormones, saying farewell to horrible restless nights and sleepy mornings. And because sleeping is only half of the problem, waking up is equally as important. We added a sunrise simulation light to mimic nature's sunrise, 30 minutes before the alarm clock even rings the light will slowly brighten up, waking you up in a natural way helping you feel more awake and energetic.
Waking to light has been trending and getting a lot of good attention in recent years, and we wanted to accessible to everyone. Making this therapeutic an all in one affordable smart design.
Why you do NOT wake up improperly! It can negatively impact your day, even sabotages your day stealing your energy and assisting in bad choice making.

Why add built-in speakers in a pillow? We all have alarm clocks either on our phone or on our nightstand, so why try to reinvent the alarm we are so used to? Well it’s simple, with our 2 strategically placed speakers directly under your head you will surely not to miss hearing or oversleep the alarm go off. Your significant other will be sure to enjoy their sleep more as you will wake up without interrupting them.

App technology: The OnSleep App allows you to elevate the way you sleep. We have implemented a simplistic UI design for you to navigate through the app with ease. As you turn on the App you will be taken to the home screen. From there you will be able to see your pillows Battery life, Bluetooth settings, and screen options. You will easily be able to navigate to your Alarm Settings, Sound/Speaker Settings, Light Settings, And more. It doesn't stop there, we have also added a sunrise simulation feature that over time will gradually light up in an array of warm colors to mimic the Crack of dawn. This is the way nature intended for us to wake up, by light.

Here’s why waking up refreshed matters! Boosting your energy levels, you will experience a much better day and a better you. You might notice yourself making much better decisions when it comes to going to the gym, eating healthy, and even being happy.
How to get OnSleep Pillow? Your Rewards!
You might want this pillow if you care for your noggin. This pillow feels fantastic!
The typical “pillow” is no more. Sleep on OnSleep for just 45 nights and dramatically notice a change.

A good pillow is necessary for your health. The reason being is you look and feel more confident, proper positioning relaxes your muscles, and it fixes your posture while you sleep. We don’t treat good pillows as an accessory for your health, but as a need.
The body has very important sleeping needs:
The 10-pound precious head you have needs support and comfort
Proper neck support being firm yet gentle
Shoulders needing some tension relief aid
Proper elevation and structural shape for your body
Breathable keeping you cool all night
Natural awaking to smooth lighting, as if waking up to the rising sun
Falling asleep to known beautiful sounds and calming music
Waking up to peaceful alarms, setting you up for the day
We implemented every feature into this pillow making it perfect for all your needs. Making this not only an investment in a pillow, but an investment in your future health
OnSleep is the Right Choice for You!
Back us today, to get the deep sleep you've always dreamed of. Sleep on OnSleep.
Each member of our team is motivated and obsessed with bringing OnSleep to life!

If you aren't satisfied with The OnSleep Pillow, return it to us within 30 days of receiving it for a full refund. We have built an amazing relationship with our manufacturer. Not only do they support our vision, but they work hard to make our products the best quality possible, our delivery date is a very reasonable approximate guess.",21.0,0,"0 Campaigns
