One more time...please make your next click be in support of SliceX.

column2: >""Slice your prep time in half with SliceX""

column1: Backers outside of the US are responsible for any local taxes or duties.

","SliceX - The most versatile food slicing tool since the knife and cutting board.Slicing fruits and vegetables ought to be faster, safer and more fun...so we created SliceX.Slice multiple cherry tomatoes, grapes, olives, brussels sprouts, even blueberries... in one easy motion. Make several orange, apple, grapefruit, even mushroom wedges at one time. Going from quarters to eighths has never been easier.It's also handy for chopping things like seeds and nuts that tend to fly off traditional cutting boards.
Novel 3D cutting surface automatically aligns, supports and holds food still for greater slicing efficiency, safety, and ease.
With SliceX you don't have to pick up individual items off your cutting board. Just pour the sliced items right into your bowl from the SliceX.
SliceX is durable and washable.  It is made out of the same recyclable material as professional grade cutting boards, and it is easy on your knife blades.
SliceX comes apart into two pieces for easy storage.
Buy your SliceX and very soon you'll be looking for reasons to use it and to feel the satisfaction of easily slicing numerous items at once.
The SliceX trough lines up items of different sizes so that they can all be cut right down the middle with one cut.
The SliceX backstop holds items in place as you cut across right through them in one motion.
The SliceX knife guide ensures a straight cut right down the middle.
Each SliceX offers four slicing troughs upon rotation.
SliceX's two part design makes it easy to clean and to store.
Heavy duty HDPE plastic supports years of use.
SliceX makes slicing food much safer because your fingers don't need to hold the items you are cutting.
Why bother slicing your fruit and vegetables anyway?

Slicing cherry tomatoes makes them a lot easier to eat rather than chasing them around your plate with a fork until you finally spear one and it spurts juice onto your shirt.  Besides being a more elegant way to serve cherry tomatoes, slicing them in half releases their flavor and juices into your salad dressing, pasta sauce, etc.  Grapes are also much easier to eat when cut in half. Slicing them releases their flavor into your chicken salad, fruit salad, etc.

Children's Food Safety Note: Grapes can be a choking hazard.  Sliced grapes are much safer to eat, especially for children.  Same goes for blueberries and hot dogs.  Food safety experts recommend cutting hot dogs and sausages lengthwise, particularly for children, and SliceX makes that a breeze, especially when they are hot to the touch.  SliceX makes a perfect baby shower gift.
You can slice toward or away from the backstop and knife guide groove. Try both ways and choose the method that is most comfortable to you.
Grapes: Fruit Salad, Chicken Salad, Waldorf Salad, Grape Salad, Dried Grapes, Filet of Sole Veronique, and Safe Kids Snacks.
Olives: Green Salad, Pizza, Chicken Dishes like Chicken Marabella, Pasta Sauces Like Pasta Puttanesca, Fish Dishes like Sicillian Swordfish, and Olive Relish

Nuts: Cookies (chocolate chip, oatmeal, Mexican wedding, rum balls etc.), Salads, Candied Nuts, Fruit Cakes, Carrot Cakes, Zucchini Bread, Banana Bread, and other Baked Goods (brownies, blondies, etc.).
Brussels Sprouts: Roasted with honey, maple syrup, bacon, parmesan cheese, balsamic vinegar, pine nuts, au gratin, etc.
column3: or Pan Fried in olive oil.

column1: Carrots (lengthwise slices): Stir Fry, Snacks, Julienne or Matchstick cuts
Apples, Oranges, Grapefruits, Mushrooms: Wedges, especially going from quarters to eighths.
Blueberries & Cranberries: Muffins, Pancakes, Crostini, Salads, or as Garnishes.
Gooseberries: Green Salads, Gooseberry Tarts, Gooseberry Scones, Chutney, Thokku, or as a Garnish.
Kumquats: Kumquat Marmalade, Fruit Salads, Kumquat Vodka, Green Salads, Preserved Kumquats.

THE DRINK INDUCTION CHILLER WILL CHANGE YOUR LIFE. 

Well, depending on how much you value a cold drink...

 

Patent pending, the D.I.C. is really good at what it does (making/keeping your drink cold). We meticulously designed the D.I.C. to have minimal moving parts so that it could be small, versatile, and durable. It's made of high-quality materials and has a sleek look that will leave all your friends and co-workers jealous! 

It's the product you never thought you needed but won't stop using. 

Look, we weren't the first people to attempt to make a refrigerating device for a single drink. But we far exceeded any of our competitors (and our own expectations, to be honest). The competitors offer junky USB powered devices which don't get cold (we get freezing, literally), and few offer the versatility and appeal of a coaster. In our humble opinion, nothing exists in this category of single drink refrigeration. 

We set a goal of being able to put a drop of water on top of the chiller and have it turn to ice. That didn't happen with the first prototypes, so we went back to the drawing board (over and over again...). We had to custom design every part to maximize energy efficiency, heat sync surface area, and temperature transfer performance. We finally nailed it. 

The upper cooling plate gets so cold, it can keep an exposed ice cube frozen indefinitely. This cooling potential allows the D.I.C. to refrigerate any type of glass cup, soda can, or plastic bottle. If it fits, it will get (and stay) cold.

We now have our final prototype and are beginning the first batch of manufacturing. We believe this is the right time to introduce the product to the world and help fund our initial order expense. Your support today will get the Drink Induction Chiller on the nightstand and office desk of thousands of people very soon! 

The D.I.C. will ship fully assembled with a standard 120-240V US electric cord. The product is designed with plug-and-play simplicity.

 

Risks and challenges

We have limited risk to our backers by committing to move forward with the production of the Drink Induction Chiller prior to launching on IndieGoGo. Like any hardware project, hiccups in manufacturing and distribution are possible. We have a built-in cushion to allow for some delays and will do everything we can to keep the timeline realistic. As of September 2018, tooling is well underway and samples from the manufacturer are being tested. Soon we will commence final production, and distribution shortly thereafter.

We really want you to have your hands on one of these as soon as possible! We will continue to be transparent with our mission and operations to keep you, our valued customers, happy!

 

FAQ

What is the diameter of the cooling plate?

2.85 inches (7.24cm), which should comfortably fit the base of any bottle, cup or can.

 

Is the D.I.C. temperature adjustable?

The chilling temperature is not adjustable. Within about 10 seconds of powering on the D.I.C. via the simple rocker switch, the upper cooling plate will reach freezing temps.

 

How much energy does it use?

The D.I.C. is designed to be efficient. It will use a maximum of 100 watts, although the average draw is 85 watts. This means that each hour of use is approximately equivalent to $0.01 in electricity cost (assuming the US average cost of 12 cents per kilowatt-hour). 

 

Does it make any noise?

This was a serious hurdle we had during development. The final product is whisper quiet, similar in noise output to a small Apple laptop. It's a faint white noise you would hear if nearby in a dead quiet room, otherwise the sound is generally unnoticeable. The D.I.C. also has rubber feet to eliminate any vibrations.

 

Is it portable?

The D.I.C. is definitely portable and durable, but it does need to be plugged into an outlet in order to function. A battery would have increased the size and reduced the performance of the coaster, which we decided we didn't want to do.

 

Does it leave any stains or condensation marks?

Nope, it's been tested on just about every type of surface in many different conditions and has never left any sort wetness, stains, or markings. 

 

Update - September 2018 

Final CAD's have been approved and our Injection Molding Factory has begun tooling the custom aluminium, rubber, and plastic parts of the Drink Induction Chiller. Once final samples are approved, we will commence high volume production. Some pictures of tooling are below.

Avivah and Tim - Fresh Clean Water for Mfuwe

The best way we can express and share our happiness as we get married is to give something we take for granted - fresh, clean water - to a community where even this basic necessity is lacking.  The very best way you, our friends, can express your happiness for us is to help us achieve that aim.

In 2011, shortly after we got together, we visited Mfuwe in the South Luanga Valley of Zambia.  It is a lovely place, but the community lacks basic essentials, including education, healthcare and water.  Our friend there, Lisa Gower, has set up a charity called Charity Begins at Home, which is making a steady and growing contribution to the community.  We ask all our friends, as their gift to us to celebrate our wedding, to contribute to the cost of drilling a water borehole to provide clean water to the area around Mfuwe.  This will be a wonderful gift to the whole community, but especially to women and girls, who so often have the role of collecting water.
The cost of a borehole and pump is $5,000-7,000 US.  Anything you can contribute will help and will give us, as well as the community of Mfuwe, much lasting happiness.

Reduce The Cost of Gas And Improve The Environment!

We'd all like to do something about the cost of gas, and we'd all like to use our resources more efficiently. And if we could cut down pollutants and reduce dependence on foreign oil in the process, so much the better. Well, we at StewardTech believe we may have found a way to help do all of these things. And you are invited to join us in the process of bringing this dream to life.

We have a unique design (Patent Pending) for a turbine that we believe could replace piston engines in everything from lawnmowers to locomotives. And we believe these turbines will be more efficient, lower maintenance, easier to produce and more durable than their internal combustion counterparts. We think this idea has the potential to revolutionize the transportation industry, and this is your chance to be a proud part of the revolution.


The Impact
• Your contribution helps advance technology, while helping the environment. The high efficiency turbine will use less gasoline than an equivalent piston engine.

• It costs less to build than a comparable piston engine, and has fewer moving parts, so there's less to break down. You make things cheaper, cleaner and more reliable. That's a pretty big win for everyone.
• By helping people use less gas, you also take away dependence on foreign oil. By doing this, in many cases, you take money away from terrorists.
<li>Your contribution will help create jobs. Maybe a few
• You help create something really new that has the potential to make life better for a lot of people. That's a good legacy to have.

About The Company

In many ways, StewardTech is a different kind of company. It's a company founded with its primary goal of creating a legacy. One of the things that we will be doing is instead of paying out dividends, when we meet our operational needs, any profits will be used to support charities and social programs that are important to us. Programs like food banks, family crisis centers and missions, first in our own communities, then hopefully reaching out nationally and even internationally. 

Another difference in StewardTech is that we want to be so much more than just a place to build a career. We want to be a place where we help our people to build rewarding lives, both inside and outside the company. Toward that end, we want work to be as much an experience in corporate worship as it is in producing products. We believe that if we invite God into our work lives, that helps us make better products, and makes us a better company. It also helps us make better decisions along the way. We also want to create an environment of family. We firmly believe we were put here to serve one another, and to help one another along the road of life. Our unity is one of our greatest strengths.

We want to build products that make life better. We want our products to use resources more wisely, both in the production of the product, and in its lifetime. We want to create for you not just products that do the job, but that do the job better with less waste along the way.

What We Need &

• Let's be honest here: we're just getting started, so what we need is basically everything. Hardware, software, facilities, you name it. And this venture is not without risk. But we believe the basic design is solid, and we think the potential value of our product far outweighs the risk. We think this turbine is a real winner, and when it goes into wide production, it will make people's lives better by reducing their fuel usage, and creating less pollution in the process.

• The most important perk is not on our list. The most important perk is the knowledge that you worked to make life a little better for yourself, your children and your fellow man. Isn't that what makes life worthwhile? But do take a look at the perks offered. Some of them are quite valuable (a turbine-powered sports car, for example). But if you add up the total contributions that can be made, every single perk carries the potential to be worth more than the total goal for this campaign. Why is that? Well, this is a marathon, not a sprint. The total project will cost on the order of 14,000,000 USD to get from concept to final production. We want to prove to you that we can do this, and the best way to do it (for us and for you) is to do it in stages. For the first stage of the project, we wanted to make it small enough so that it could reasonably be done by a first-timer, but big enough so that it would still be a real accomplishment. So the first real need is a first rate CAD system, and a pair of commercial 3D printers so we can do prototyping in plastic. Once we get a successful plastic prototype, we will use the plastic parts to create a sand cast, which can then be used to create an aluminum prototype.

• So what happens if we don't get to our goal for this phase? Well, from a financial standpoint, we buy what we can with the funds from this campaign, and try to get funding for the rest of this phase elsewhere. Failure to get funding in this phase does NOT mean the project is dead. It only means we failed to do what was needed to make this phase successful in this forum. We'll take a hard look at what we did, and how we could do better. And we will do better. We will make this happen, one way or the other. And we want you at the finish line with us when that first series of turbines comes rolling off the line.

• What happens if we completely overshoot the goal for this phase? We'll use the extra to fund the next phase of the project. Whatever happens, everything donated will go toward funding this project alone. If we don't get enough, we seek additional means of funding. If we get more than we need, we'll use the extra to build extra capacity on the manufacturing floor, and hire more people to get the turbine into production faster.

Other Ways You Can Help

So what if you cannot contribute financially? Well, whether you can contribute financially or not, you can still help out, and maybe in the process, take away a little bit of history for yourself:

• Tell people about the turbine and about StewardTech. Talk to friends, relatives, coworkers and other associates about what we are doing here. Be a valuable part of the team by using your network to get us on the radar. Hit every social media outlet you can think of, and get the word out about us.
• Find people who you think can be investors and let them know what's going on here.

• So, what's in it for you? We're SO glad you asked (no, really, we are). When you use the Indiegogo sharing tools to refer others to the project, 10% of all new contributions you refer go towards getting YOU the perks we offer. For example, if the total contributions of everyone you refer exceeds $1000, you get a StewardTech T-Shirt and a copy of the CD Pearls. If the total contributions of your referrals exceeds $10,000, you get an aluminum air powered turbine (execution of notarized non-disclosure agreement required). Who knows? You might even wind up with a brand new, turbine-powered sports car, just for using your network to refer contributors to us!

• Also, for every new person you refer to the project, we will enter your name into a drawing. If the person you refer becomes a financial supporter, we'll enter your name into the drawing nine more times. And every perk level that that person ascends gets you ten more entries into the drawing. The drawing will be held the day the first production turbine rolls off the line, and first prize is Production Turbine #1, signed by the heads of the Management, Design and Production teams and installed in a new, custom motorcycle, plus a tour of the production facility (round trip economy air fare for two to DFW or DAL from any major airport in the US included), $1500.00 spending cash, and your name and photo recorded as a founding investor on a laser etched plaque placed proudly on permanent display at StewardTech. Second prize is a signed book of engineering drawings used to create one of our turbine prototypes. Third prize is one of 100 limited edition StewardTech I Helped Create a Revolution T-Shirts. The usual legal mumbo jumbo applies (Void where restricted or prohibited by law. Employees, suppliers and board members of StewardTech and their families are not eligible, and StewardTech reserves the right to interpret the rules of the contest. Winners are responsible for taxes assessed on prizes. Judges' selections are final, and limit 1 prize per person).

And we want you at the finish line with us when that first series of turbines comes rolling off the line.

What happens if we completely overshoot the goal for this phase? We'll use the extra to fund the next phase of the project. Whatever happens, everything donated will go toward funding this project alone. If we don't get enough, we seek additional means of funding. If we get more than we need, we'll use the extra to build extra capacity on the manufacturing floor, and hire more people to get the turbine into production faster.

Other Ways You Can HelpSo what if you cannot contribute financially? Well, whether you can contribute financially or not, you can still help out, and maybe in the process, take away a little bit of history for yourself:

Tell people about the turbine and about StewardTech. Talk to friends, relatives, coworkers and other associates about what we are doing here. Be a valuable part of the team by using your network to get us on the radar. Hit every social media outlet you can think of, and get the word out about us.
Find people who you think can be investors and let them know what's going on here.

So, what's in it for you? We're SO glad you asked (no, really, we are). When you use the Indiegogo sharing tools to refer others to the project, 10% of all new contributions you refer go towards getting YOU the perks we offer. For example, if the total contributions of everyone you refer exceeds $1000, you get a StewardTech T-Shirt and a copy of the CD Pearls. If the total contributions of your referrals exceeds $10,000, you get an aluminum air powered turbine (execution of notarized non-disclosure agreement required). Who knows? You might even wind up with a brand new, turbine-powered sports car, just for using your network to refer contributors to us!

Also, for every new person you refer to the project, we will enter your name into a drawing. If the person you refer becomes a financial supporter, we'll enter your name into the drawing nine more times. And every perk level that that person ascends gets you ten more entries into the drawing. The drawing will be held the day the first production turbine rolls off the line, and first prize is Production Turbine #1, signed by the heads of the Management, Design and Production teams and installed in a new, custom motorcycle, plus a tour of the production facility (round trip economy air fare for two to DFW or DAL from any major airport in the US included), $1500.00 spending cash, and your name and photo recorded as a founding investor on a laser etched plaque placed proudly on permanent display at StewardTech. Second prize is a signed book of engineering drawings used to create one of our turbine prototypes. Third prize is one of 100 limited edition StewardTech I Helped Create a Revolution T-Shirts. The usual legal mumbo jumbo applies (Void where restricted or prohibited by law. Employees, suppliers and board members of StewardTech and their families are not eligible, and StewardTech reserves the right to interpret the rules of the contest. Winners are responsible for taxes assessed on prizes. Judges' selections are final, and limit 1 prize per person).",1.0,0,"3 Campaigns

0,"

ION light rail is coming to Waterloo Region
You’ve seen the construction, the tracks getting put in the ground, the stations falling into place.

At TriTAG, we’re excited to soon be able to get around town with rapid, frequent transit service. For the last six years, we’ve been advocating for more transit, protected bikeways, and better walking conditions in our cities to make our communities great places to work and live.
We want you to share your excitement for the transformation happening in our Region, while helping us to take our efforts to the next level.

We’re creating buttons for each stop along the ION light rail route. Inspired by the anchor wall designs, these buttons will feature a unique pattern for each ION station, letting you show off your neighbourhood pride. We’re giving these buttons as ‘perks’ for your support of our Indiegogo campaign. You can get the whole set, or special collections featuring different neighbourhoods and places along ION.
After the campaign is complete, you'll be invited to a special TriTAG social event where you'll be able to collect your buttons and swag. (We'll ship to those who can't make it, but then you'll miss out on the snacks.)

column4: />Before we had settled on the anchor wall patterns, we tried out other designs, including pairing the University of Waterloo stop with the school's unofficial mascot, the Canada goose. While you will (hopefully) not find it on ION platforms, you can find it as a special limited-edition UW button in this campaign.

column1:
So what will your support help us to do?

Over the next year, we’re looking to formally incorporate TriTAG as a not-for-profit organization, which will bring greater transparency and long-term stability to the work that we do. We also want to better engage with the community by becoming a more visible presence at public events and festivals. Finally, we also have ongoing needs to keep our website online and help raise public awareness of local transportation issues as they arise. All these activities have costs, and your support will go a long way towards helping us meet these needs.
Here's a breakdown of how we plan on using the money raised:
• Legal stuff for incorporation as a not-for-profit - $1,000
• Online engagement, public awareness, and special events - $2,500

Other ways you can help

There are other ways you can get involved:

  • Spread the word about our campaign with friends on social media
Sign up for the TriTAG mailing list
Follow us on Twitter or like us on Facebook
• Continue to support local businesses affected by ION construction

The Tri-Cities Transport Action Group (TriTAG) is a local grassroots organization advocating for better infrastructure and policy to enable people to walk, bike, and take transit in Waterloo Region. We're made up of volunteers who believe that by prioritizing these modes, our communities can become better places to live, work and play.
Here are a few examples of work that we've done:
• We were pivotal in the support for building ION light rail, organizing two ""Rally for Rails"" events, creating an infographic, and producing a video of the route
• We advocated successfully for protected bike lanes on Uptown King Street
• We surveyed candidates in the municipal elections about their positions on transportation issues
• We raise awareness of local public consultations and upcoming council decisions on an ongoing basis
We hope you’ll join us in making Waterloo Region a place where everyone can easily walk, bike, and take transit for their daily needs. Thanks for your support.

Hi , 

My name is Wesley , i'm working as a technician on cnc operated machines. It's my work to prevent problems , it's in my nature to foresee them i'm always thinking 3 steps ahead...

I'm playing airsoft for 8 years now , i never wanted a helmet because ( for me ) i saw to much disadvantage.

The biggest problem was/is heat build up ( in the summer) AND fogging of your glasses.

Last summer i was hit( 3 rounds burst) at very close range on my head , immediatly i had tears in my eyes . It hurts so much that i stopped playing that day ...

The week after i bought a Emerson Fast helmet , i immediatly started brainstorming .... I wanted  better cooling  !!!!

At this moment i already have a working ""prototype"" , it only needs a little fine tuning but in this state it already works verry good. I hope with your help to make my cooling system available for every one .

To use this system it is NECESARRY to DRILL holes in the helmet.

It has 2 air circiulation systems . 

The first is  to create a forced air circulation inside the helmet . 

The second one and most imported is an air system that creates a draught right above your forehead. This is a anti-fogging system that WORKS !!!

The system is build off various parts  , there  are 2 3D printed parts , electronics (various parts) , different fans , and a battery of cours...

I will not provide a battery i suggest a 7.4 Lipo 1500mAh ( Somewhere between 1100mAh and 1500mAh works fine) . I also NOT provide a battery case , there are way to much possibilities for this.

 My battery is mounted in a Emerson Rear Weight Counter Pouch.

The complete system itself is going to made by me , cut the middle man to keep it as cheap as possible.

This is where the problem starts , to keep it cheap i must buy all the stuff i need X10 , X20 , X50 then i can get great (quantity) discounts. 

The other problem is the case itself  , when i let the production of this part to someone else the  cost rises again ..... 

To make the part myself i need a 3D-Printer , i'm not going to buy the most expensive printer  but also not a cheap one . I want quality NOT quantity.

I hope ( with your help ) that i can obtain enough funds to make this project become alive.

column2: >     REBOX is an innovative recycable eco-furniture where products are made of pure corrugated cardboard. The ""RE"" in REBOX carries the meaning of recycle - this material is 100% disposable and recyclable. It's great for us to create and sustain a brighter environment. REBOX products comes with the assurance that no chemical or glue was used to construct its innovative furniture, furthermore they are fully functional and have the capability to withstand a certain amount of weight. Without a doubt REBOX furniture are artlessly Cool, Simple, Innovative and Impressive.

As parents our job is to protect our loved ones from potential threats.  When a disaster occurs, we often find ourselves saying “If I only knew I could have….”  MAX is the first device that is Smart Enough to Save your life.  MAX not only monitors your home for Security Threats, it connects to and monitors Homeland Security, FEMA and NOAA for advance warnings that might be life threatening.  No matter if you're sleeping or away MAX keeps an eye out for you and within seconds gives you Early Warnings to possible Home Intrusions or disasters, such as Hurricanes, Fires, Tornadoes, Flooding, and even potential terrorist threats.
column2: >MAX SMART ALARM
column5:
>Protecting your Life !

MAX Smart Alarm is the first Smart Home Device that protects lives with Safety and Security technology that is constantly monitoring your home and evaluating all major threats with NO Monthly Fees. MAX is smart enough to detect Fire Alarms, Carbon Monoxide Alarms, Hurricanes, Tornadoes, Flash Flooding and even a terrorist threat. MAX's warning system will alert you in multiple ways within seconds of determining a threat. MAX sends an audible alert in 520Hz, 3200Hz and Voice. In addition to the three audible alerts, MAX also provides a strobe light and path light to help you find your way to safety. Remote Notification Alerts of any threat of danger are sent automatically to authorized smartphones, or an outside monitoring service.
column10: >""If only I knew...""  Now you can with MAX!
column11:

Peace of Mind and all you have to do is Simply Plug it in.  Now that is Smart!

column15:
>""Being too late....""  not an option when its family !

Two Minutes is the average amount of time you have to get your family awake and out of the house.  With MAX you can receive an Early Warning of a Tornado as much as 15 minutes before you see it.  The advanced technologies that we designed into MAX are smart enough to give you the most advanced warning of any Home Safety and Security Product on the market.   

More Time..... that's what MAX gives you!   More time to get you and your family to safety.
column17: >Smoke Alarm detects a fire....
column18: >MAX provides the Alerts to make sure wake up and get out!  It's that simple.
column21: >92% of children and most Seniors will sleep through the sound of a standard smoke alarm.
column24:
>""You bought smoke alarms because you thought they would protect your family ""

This is the common mistake that many people make, they think because a smoke alarm is loud, that everyone will wake up.   A smoke alarm is around 100 decibels load.   That's not the problem.  The problem is the frequency is too high at 3200 Hz for children and adults with hearing lose to hear it in their sleep.  That's why most fire related deaths occur while people are sleeping. 

We developed the MAX Smart Alarm technology based on the Safety Research that resulted in the  requirement for Hotels and Assisted Living facilities to install alternative alarms that broadcast a lower frequency of 520Hz in every room.  

The MAX Smart Alarm not only broadcasts 3200Hz and 520Hz  but announces an Alert with Human Voice and gives visual alerts including a Strobe Light and Escape Path Light.   

Helping you Escape Danger with Alerts that wake everyone in your family is our goal.  You made the right decision by installing smoke detectors, but now you need MAX Smart Alarm to remove the unnecessary risks to you and your family.  

Smoke Alarm detects a fire....MAX provides the Escape Alerts to make sure you get out!  It's that simple.
column29:
>Waking effectiveness of Alarms

In April of 2006, The Fire Protection Research Foundation was awarded a Fire Prevention and Safety Grant by the US Fire Administration to study the effectiveness of alarms for emergency notification.   Below are some excerpts from this 100 page research document.  The full document can be download or sent to by email.
column30:
>Standard Smoke Alarms are based on 3200Hz

“ Under the testing conditions a 520 Hz square wave T-3 sounds was the single most effective signal, awakening 92%...significantly more effective than the 3200Hz pure tone T-3 sound , which awoke 56%.” page 9

“In some cases a smoke alarm may not arouse the sleeping occupants in time to escape and a lack of response, or a delayed response clearly increases the chances of dying in a fire” (Thomas and Brennan, 2004) Page 14

“Interesting the same 520 Hz square wave signal has also been found to be more effective at waking sleeping children (Bruck, Reid, Kouzma and Ball 2004) page 18

column2: >Security could put you at risk from video hackers!

>With MAX you don't need a video camera to be protected. 

We have all seen the headlines of countless accounts of ""hackers"" tapping into the homes of innocent families through their WiFi enabled Video Cameras.  Knowing that this is a major concern for families, MAX designed our MAX Smart Alarm to work with or without a home video monitor.
column5: > need to feel insecure about you
column9:
>Everyday Life

We believe that Safety and Security should be integrated into your everyday life.   That is why we designed our Life Saving Technology into a product that everyone uses around the house everyday... a light.   Not only does MAX Smart Alarm light your way in an emergency it provides an everyday path light and Nightlight for your family.   It even comes with a Sleep Application that allows you to select Nature sounds to listen to while you fall asleep.  

Sleep well... knowing MAX is watching over you and your family.
column14: >
column16: >After decades of time working on high tech solutions to solve business problems or everyday tasks, we were driven to take that experience and product development expertise to develop something that had the potential to really make a difference - potentially save someone's life.
column17:
>

We took our personal real-life experiences as parents with young children
column19:
and home owners/ renters and we researched the market to identify ways to make people feel safer, more secure and more comfortable in their homes.

MAX Smart Home was founded to comfort, enlighten and protect families with simple home technologies that foresee dangers, predict needs, react to behavior and deliver peace of mind. So we set out to identify areas within the home where lives could be saved like the dangers presented by fire, carbon monoxide leaks, and external threats like tornadoes, hurricanes, earthquakes, wild fires and localized terrorist threats.

Our first products were quickly picked by The Home Depot and we wanted to build on that success and find ways to expand the alert capabilities of MAX, so we developed MAX Smart Alarm. We enhanced earlier versions with two tone alerts and voice alerts, Wi-Fi connectivity and the addition of Early Warning Alerts from NOAA and Homeland Security.

We are very excited about this new addition to the MAX Family of products as we continue pushing the boundaries in home intelligence, comfort and control technology to help everyone shine a light on harm, protect their families, and make home a personal sanctuary.
column22:
Challenges

MAX Smart Home has already established engineering and manufacturing partnerships around the world and MAX has already started production in China. We also already have worldwide distribution partnerships setup for the sale and distribution of the product. But there are always challenges that could potentially arise.

Economic Challenges in Asia – with the economic difficulties being faced by China we need to take steps to ensure our engineering and manufacturing capabilities are not disrupted. MAX Smart Home has identified alternate resources for engineering, manufacturing and support of all our products. We are establishing agreements with partners in the United States and Europe to minimize these risks. We do not foresee any immediate impact to the MAX Smart Alarm or our current products.

Disruptions to Ocean traffic caused by weather or labor strikes – our years of experience in this area have caused us to never under estimate the power of mother nature and/or the importance of those that support the delivery of our products. Our products are usually shipped via ocean freight from China to our distribution facility in the United States. While delays sometimes occur, they usually never result in a delay longer than 30 days or so. Also, with the relative small size of this product we have the option of utilizing other means of transport.

Tremendous demand exceeding our production capabilities – once again our years of experience in this area have caused us to never overestimate the acceptance of a new product or to UNDER estimate demand when consumers get as excited about a new idea as we are. That is why MAX Smart Home has identified additional manufacturing partners in both China and the United States to enhance our production capabilities if needed.
column25:
>With the success of our first products launched in 2015 – why Crowdfund you ask?

It is simple, “we want a direct dialog with our clients – the consumer.” What better way to engage the people we want to provide safety, security and comfort for than to bring you in to the family. It is our sincere hope that you will be as excited about the prospect of having a product that could potentially save you or your loved one’s life simply by plugging it in. And who knows, there are probably many of you out there who have unique ways of using the product, new and innovative ideas on how to enhance the product or to expand the product line throughout the
home and potentially outside the home.
column26: >Please join us. If we can save just one life, it will be worth it!

MAX is smart enough to detect Fire Alarms, Carbon Monoxide Alarms, Hurricanes, Tornadoes, Flash Flooding and even a terrorist threat. MAX's warning system will alert you in multiple ways within seconds of determining a threat. MAX sends an audible alert in 520Hz, 3200Hz and Voice. In addition to the three audible alerts, MAX also provides a strobe light and path light to help you find your way to safety. column3:

Expanse Speakers will come in 2 versions: small and large. Both can be mounted to a TV or Monitor or setup free-standing. Both versions will deliver high-quality, distortion-free sound that electrostatic speakers are known for. We have already tested and developed the prototype. It looks great, works great, and SOUNDS even better. Setup Expanse with your favorite console or PC, and hear a new dimension in sound performance from your favorite games. All that’s needed to make this project a reality is to get funding for the initial manufacturing run. With your help, we can make that dream a reality.
column4:
>GAMERS: Your All-in-One Audio System
When you’re playing your favorite shooter, RPG or MMO, you don’t want to listen through a set of cheap headphones or proprietary desktop speakers, You want every sound to ring out in booming hi-def audio, making all the music action sounds and dialogue ring out just like they’re there in the room with you.

In the Media
column5: >
column7: >“I’m seriously impressed with what I’ve listened to so far”  - Daniel Wilks, Editor, PC PowerPlay
column8:
>""The Expanse Speakers are a truly impressive set. The electrostatic speakers make it aesthetically unique and will catch the eyes of whoever sees them plus allow for a very natural and enveloping sound that is sure to impress.""  4.5 / 5.0 Stars - Kevin Fenix, Fan boy Nation

We’re IC One Two. We’re a boutique innovation company that specializes in bringing ideas to life. Our products include a range of premium lighting, lensing and sound products for commercial and home use. We are veteran Crowdfunders with 3 successful Kickstarter campaigns under our belt: The Surround Master, the LED Light Cube, and The Qubie personal flashlight. We have rock-solid track record of consistently delivering the high quality products our backers expect, and delivering on our promises.

We’re proud to announce our crowdfunding campaign for our latest product, Expanse Speakers. Expanse is a home speaker system built with electrostatic speakers that’s perfect for gamers audiophiles alike. After extensive research, testing and development, we’ve built a prototype for an affordable yet fully-featured electrostatic speaker system. And now, with the help of the IndieGogo community, we’re ready to get it into production.

One group we’re particularly eager to serve is the gaming market. We’ve found that gamers LOVE having the best home audio setup for their rig. And expanse delivers just that, with crystal clear audio and deep bass to boot.
column10:
>Expanse Speakers - Halo - XboxOne - Game play experience
 

2 Models: The Beat &
column11:
The Kick

Expanse Speakers come in 2 models: small and large. They are functionally identical
column12:
however, the small is meant for use with smaller TVs while the large is meant for larger models. Both deliver impeccable sound quality in a gorgeous, compact package. Perfect for connection your XboxOne or PS4 with crystal clear life like audio.
 

The small version of Expanse Speakers connects to your TV or monitor through the external digital-to-analogue converter OR your computer’s “line out” or headphone ports. Perfect for listening to music on your computer, watching TV, or enjoying a movie with the family.

The Beat is designed for PC gamers in mind. The speakers can mount to your monitor freeing up desk space and the amplifier has been designed to have a minimal footprint.

Both the small and large systems can be mounted or set up freestanding.
column13:
/>

 

The large model is mainly intended for use with a larger screen TV. The large model takes full advantage of the large diaphragm design, providing big, full sound, easily capable of filling an entire room. Can also be connected to Bluetooth audio for a wireless listening experience.

When mounted on a TV the Kick is designed to focus the sound at the optimal angle and distance to give you an immersive wrap around sound experience whether playing your favourite game or watching a movie.

column2:
/>

 

Both systems come with a compact active woofer designed in-house by our audio engineers. The SLAM woofer, as we’ve affectionately named it, is separate from the main electrostatic speaker set, but can be installed in a matter of seconds, supplying a complementary sound at the same volume level. The electrostatic speakers supply the crisp mid and high-range frequencies while the SLAM underlines this with rich bass.

The Slam active subwoofer is perfectly tuned to supply the bottom end bass in your movies, music and games, giving a deep, soulful sound in addition to the crisp, clear audio of the main electrostatic speakers. You also have the option of connecting your own active woofer to get the exact bass sound you want. The Slam has been designed to be used laying down or standing up.

 

200 Watt Stereo amplifier

The built-in stereo amplifier is capable of delivering 200 Watts RMS total output. Enough sound for large rooms, lounges, and even noisy or crowded areas. Designed for a minimal footprint the amplifier can tuck away and not dominate your space.

Flat Electrostatic Panels

Expanse features electrostatic panels capable of filling an entire room with big, crisp, clear sound. Designed to deliver the clearest sound in an ultra-compact package, even at high volumes.

Super Thin Surface Area Diaphragm

The surface area diaphragm covers a wide area, with sound exiting from two sides instead of one. Results in “3d” sound projection that fills the entire room.

 

The Slam Active Compact Woofer

The dual woofer drivers driven by their own dedicated amplifier are tuned to cross over with the speakers, delivering the deep bass tones in the background.

Frequency Range of 55Hz - 20,000Hz

The main electrostatic speakers support a frequency range of between 250Hz and 20,000Hz while the active subwoofer delivers deep bass at the bottom end from 55Hz – 350Hz. The speakers deliver virtually the entire spectrum of audio detectable by the human ear. Every single note of audio in your music, movies and TV show will ring out with perfect clarity.

3 input modes. Line In, Bluetooth, FM Tuner

Expanse Speakers accepts input from corded connections, Bluetooth audio and built-in FM tuner. With these audio connections, nearly all of your devices will be compatible with Expanse Speakers.

Mounted or stand alone

Speakers come with two mounting options: removable mounting clips to connect to your TV or monitor, and foot stands for standalone mounting. Both options are easy to setup, with minimal assembly required.

 

High-Quality Sound Performance

Expanse delivers crisp, clear, full sound. Audio has minimal distortion, while reaching high volume levels, thanks to the 2 x 100 watt built-in amplifiers. With a frequency range of 55Hz to 20,000Hz, you’ll hear every single note.

Minimal Distortion

Expanse Speakers feature a level of distortion one order of magnitude lower than conventional cone drivers in a box. This is achieved through the unique electrostatic speaker design, which delivers sound output ‘as recorded,’ with minimal noise.

Impossibly Compact

Expanse Speakers deliver ‘expansive’ sound in a compact package. Featuring an impressively small form factor of 12mm (0.4""), you get 95 decibels of sound in a set of speakers that can fit comfortably in any room and be transported with ease.

Easy-to-Use

Our speakers are incredibly easy to unbox, setup and assemble. Once you’ve removed the speakers from the box, it’s just a matter of mounting them on your TV with the mounting clips, or on their own with the provided foot stands. Then, you can connect to an input device via corded connection, Bluetooth, or built-in FM Tuner. And if you want to add rich bass and deep tones to your listening experience, it’s easy to add on our compact woofer 'The Slam' or even connect your own active subwoofer.

Gorgeous Design

Expanse Speakers have a gorgeous design. Super thin, compact and lightweight, they take up as little space as possible, fitting into the background while delivering powerful sound.

Ultra-Affordable

Priced from just $299, Expanse Speakers are as affordable as the advanced technologies we’ve built into it will allow. Electrostatic speakers are a high-end technology that had previously only been available in expensive sound systems.

 

About Founder

We’re IC One Two. We’re a company made up of technologists and designers who love bringing new and exciting projects to life.
 

The idea for Expanse Speakers was born from wanting to make an affordable high performance sound system, The technology has been in large part due to Charlie Van Dongen and his lifelong passion for electrostatic speakers and audiophile technologies. For the past 20 years, he has been obsessed with making electrostatic tech viable for the consumer market. Until now, this dream has been out of sight. But now, with new developments in commercial and technological processes, it is possible to deliver electrostatic speakers in an affordable and compelling package.
 

The vision behind Expanse Speakers is to do just that. And with your help, we can bring our vision to all the audiophiles of the world.

Funding Will Help With

Taking a product from prototype to manufacture is expensive. Manufacturing, producing and marketing the speakers will take time and money, as well as a significant amount of effort. Your pledge will help bridge this gap, aiding with the pre-sale of units, initiation of the tooling and filling of production orders. Another critical element your funding will help with is opening the product to a global market and inviting discussion with international distributors who may otherwise have been hard to contact.


 

 

 

Risks And Challenges

The main challenge associated with developing this product--engineering a high quality electrostatic sound system at an affordable price--has already been overcome. Most remaining challenges stem from production, distribution and networking.

 

Mass-manufacturing any high-tech product entails significant costs. This is doubly the case with electrostatic speakers, which will require the help of a manufacturing partner with specialized skills. Finding a manufacturer who can reliably produce our speakers at the price points we demand may be a challenge when taking the product to market.

 

A second challenge pertains to distribution. Getting the word out about Expanse Speakers will require significant marketing and PR efforts. We’ll need to run extensive PPC campaigns, generate publicity, and get in touch with retail partners. Without adequate funding, these challenges may prove insurmountable.

 

A final challenge involves getting in touch with the right contacts within international distributors. For our products to be sold internationally, we’ll need to have a distribution network in place. Getting the attention of distributors will take significant amounts of time and money. Your donation can help us get the attention of the distributors we need to speak with.


 

Q&
column3:
A

What makes Expanse Speakers different?

Expanse Speakers feature an electrostatic design--as contrasted with the cone-base design of conventional features. This speaker design delivers clearer sound quality with lower distortion.

Aren’t electrostatic speakers expensive?

Until now, electrostatic speakers have been costly, and only available in very high-end sound systems. But new innovations have made it possible to deliver electrostatic technology in a more affordable package. Expanse Speakers are among the first projects to capitalize on these innovations.

How much will Expanse Speakers cost?

When they go to market, Expanse Speakers will cost $499. This is a highly competitive price point for electrostatic speakers, which often retail for $2000 or more.

As an audiophile, I demand only the very best sound quality. How will Expanse Speakers deliver?

Expansive Speakers deliver impeccable sound quality along 3 vectors: clarity, frequency range and volume. The electrostatic design ensures clear audio, with distortion one order of magnitude less than conventional speakers. The frequency range is from 250 to 20,000Hz extendable down to 55Hz with our compact sub --covering the vast majority of the spectrum of sounds detectable by the human ear. The volume is also capable of reaching high levels of over 95 decibels thanks to the 2 x 100 watt amplifiers.

Do Expanse Speakers work with wireless audio sources?

Yes. Expanse Speakers can be connected to an audios source wirelessly via Bluetooth audio.

Can I use my own subwoofer with the Expanse Speakers?

Yes, you can connect your own subwoofer to the subwoofer out on the Expanse Speakers amplifier.

What size TV will my Expanse Speakers fit onto?

Expanse Speakers come in two sizes, medium and large, allowing you to pick the right model for your TV. The Large Expanse Speakers are designed to fit onto a standard 55” inch TV or bigger. For smaller TV’s and computer monitors we suggest the Medium Expanse speakers.

We’re a boutique innovation company that specializes in bringing ideas to life. Our products include a range of premium lighting, lensing and sound products for commercial and home use. We are veteran Crowdfunders with 3 successful Kickstarter campaigns under our belt: The Surround Master, the LED Light Cube, and The Qubie personal flashlight. We have rock-solid track record of consistently delivering the high quality products our backers expect, and delivering on our promises.We’re proud to announce our crowdfunding campaign for our latest product, Expanse Speakers. Expanse is a home speaker system built with electrostatic speakers that’s perfect for gamers audiophiles alike. After extensive research, testing and development, we’ve built a prototype for an affordable yet fully-featured electrostatic speaker system. And now, with the help of the IndieGogo community, we’re ready to get it into production.One group we’re particularly eager to serve is the gaming market. We’ve found that gamers LOVE having the best home audio setup for their rig. And expanse delivers just that, with crystal clear audio and deep bass to boot.Expanse Speakers - Halo - XboxOne - Game play experience 2 Models: The Beat & The KickExpanse Speakers come in 2 models: small and large. They are functionally identical
column4: however, the small is meant for use with smaller TVs while the large is meant for larger models. Both deliver impeccable sound quality in a gorgeous, compact package. Perfect for connection your XboxOne or PS4 with crystal clear life like audio. The small version of Expanse Speakers connects to your TV or monitor through the external digital-to-analogue converter OR your computer’s “line out” or headphone ports. Perfect for listening to music on your computer, watching TV, or enjoying a movie with the family.The Beat is designed for PC gamers in mind. The speakers can mount to your monitor freeing up desk space and the amplifier has been designed to have a minimal footprint.Both the small and large systems can be mounted or set up freestanding.   The large model is mainly intended for use with a larger screen TV. The large model takes full advantage of the large diaphragm design, providing big, full sound, easily capable of filling an entire room. Can also be connected to Bluetooth audio for a wireless listening experience.When mounted on a TV the Kick is designed to focus the sound at the optimal angle and distance to give you an immersive wrap around sound experience whether playing your favourite game or watching a movie.

column1: Both systems come with a compact active woofer designed in-house by our audio engineers. The SLAM woofer, as we’ve affectionately named it, is separate from the main electrostatic speaker set, but can be installed in a matter of seconds, supplying a complementary sound at the same volume level. The electrostatic speakers supply the crisp mid and high-range frequencies while the SLAM underlines this with rich bass.The Slam active subwoofer is perfectly tuned to supply the bottom end bass in your movies, music and games, giving a deep, soulful sound in addition to the crisp, clear audio of the main electrostatic speakers. You also have the option of connecting your own active woofer to get the exact bass sound you want. The Slam has been designed to be used laying down or standing up. 200 Watt Stereo amplifierThe built-in stereo amplifier is capable of delivering 200 Watts RMS total output. Enough sound for large rooms, lounges, and even noisy or crowded areas. Designed for a minimal footprint the amplifier can tuck away and not dominate your space.Flat Electrostatic PanelsExpanse features electrostatic panels capable of filling an entire room with big, crisp, clear sound. Designed to deliver the clearest sound in an ultra-compact package, even at high volumes.Super Thin Surface Area DiaphragmThe surface area diaphragm covers a wide area, with sound exiting from two sides instead of one. Results in “3d” sound projection that fills the entire room. The Slam Active Compact WooferThe dual woofer drivers driven by their own dedicated amplifier are tuned to cross over with the speakers, delivering the deep bass tones in the background.Frequency Range of 55Hz - 20,000HzThe main electrostatic speakers support a frequency range of between 250Hz and 20,000Hz while the active subwoofer delivers deep bass at the bottom end from 55Hz – 350Hz. The speakers deliver virtually the entire spectrum of audio detectable by the human ear. Every single note of audio in your music, movies and TV show will ring out with perfect clarity.3 input modes. Line In, Bluetooth, FM TunerExpanse Speakers accepts input from corded connections, Bluetooth audio and built-in FM tuner. With these audio connections, nearly all of your devices will be compatible with Expanse Speakers.Mounted or stand aloneSpeakers come with two mounting options: removable mounting clips to connect to your TV or monitor, and foot stands for standalone mounting. Both options are easy to setup, with minimal assembly required. High-Quality Sound PerformanceExpanse delivers crisp, clear, full sound. Audio has minimal distortion, while reaching high volume levels, thanks to the 2 x 100 watt built-in amplifiers. With a frequency range of 55Hz to 20,000Hz, you’ll hear every single note.Minimal DistortionExpanse Speakers feature a level of distortion one order of magnitude lower than conventional cone drivers in a box. This is achieved through the unique electrostatic speaker design, which delivers sound output ‘as recorded,’ with minimal noise.Impossibly CompactExpanse Speakers deliver ‘expansive’ sound in a compact package. Featuring an impressively small form factor of 12mm (0.4""), you get 95 decibels of sound in a set of speakers that can fit comfortably in any room and be transported with ease.Easy-to-UseOur speakers are incredibly easy to unbox, setup and assemble. Once you’ve removed the speakers from the box, it’s just a matter of mounting them on your TV with the mounting clips, or on their own with the provided foot stands. Then, you can connect to an input device via corded connection, Bluetooth, or built-in FM Tuner. And if you want to add rich bass and deep tones to your listening experience, it’s easy to add on our compact woofer 'The Slam' or even connect your own active subwoofer.Gorgeous DesignExpanse Speakers have a gorgeous design. Super thin, compact and lightweight, they take up as little space as possible, fitting into the background while delivering powerful sound.Ultra-AffordablePriced from just $299, Expanse Speakers are as affordable as the advanced technologies we’ve built into it will allow. Electrostatic speakers are a high-end technology that had previously only been available in expensive sound systems. About FounderWe’re IC One Two. We’re a company made up of technologists and designers who love bringing new and exciting projects to life. The idea for Expanse Speakers was born from wanting to make an affordable high performance sound system, The technology has been in large part due to Charlie Van Dongen and his lifelong passion for electrostatic speakers and audiophile technologies. For the past 20 years, he has been obsessed with making electrostatic tech viable for the consumer market. Until now, this dream has been out of sight. But now, with new developments in commercial and technological processes, it is possible to deliver electrostatic speakers in an affordable and compelling package. The vision behind Expanse Speakers is to do just that. And with your help, we can bring our vision to all the audiophiles of the world.Funding Will Help WithTaking a product from prototype to manufacture is expensive. Manufacturing, producing and marketing the speakers will take time and money, as well as a significant amount of effort. Your pledge will help bridge this gap, aiding with the pre-sale of units, initiation of the tooling and filling of production orders. Another critical element your funding will help with is opening the product to a global market and inviting discussion with international distributors who may otherwise have been hard to contact.   Risks And ChallengesThe main challenge associated with developing this product--engineering a high quality electrostatic sound system at an affordable price--has already been overcome. Most remaining challenges stem from production, distribution and networking. Mass-manufacturing any high-tech product entails significant costs. This is doubly the case with electrostatic speakers, which will require the help of a manufacturing partner with specialized skills. Finding a manufacturer who can reliably produce our speakers at the price points we demand may be a challenge when taking the product to market. A second challenge pertains to distribution. Getting the word out about Expanse Speakers will require significant marketing and PR efforts. We’ll need to run extensive PPC campaigns, generate publicity, and get in touch with retail partners. Without adequate funding, these challenges may prove insurmountable. A final challenge involves getting in touch with the right contacts within international distributors. For our products to be sold internationally, we’ll need to have a distribution network in place. Getting the attention of distributors will take significant amounts of time and money. Your donation can help us get the attention of the distributors we need to speak with. Q&AWhat makes Expanse Speakers different?Expanse Speakers feature an electrostatic design--as contrasted with the cone-base design of conventional features. This speaker design delivers clearer sound quality with lower distortion.Aren’t electrostatic speakers expensive?Until now, electrostatic speakers have been costly, and only available in very high-end sound systems. But new innovations have made it possible to deliver electrostatic technology in a more affordable package. Expanse Speakers are among the first projects to capitalize on these innovations.How much will Expanse Speakers cost?When they go to market, Expanse Speakers will cost $499. This is a highly competitive price point for electrostatic speakers, which often retail for $2000 or more.As an audiophile, I demand only the very best sound quality. How will Expanse Speakers deliver?Expansive Speakers deliver impeccable sound quality along 3 vectors: clarity, frequency range and volume. The electrostatic design ensures clear audio, with distortion one order of magnitude less than conventional speakers. The frequency range is from 250 to 20,000Hz extendable down to 55Hz with our compact sub --covering the vast majority of the spectrum of sounds detectable by the human ear. The volume is also capable of reaching high levels of over 95 decibels thanks to the 2 x 100 watt amplifiers.Do Expanse Speakers work with wireless audio sources?Yes. Expanse Speakers can be connected to an audios source wirelessly via Bluetooth audio.Can I use my own subwoofer with the Expanse Speakers?Yes, you can connect your own subwoofer to the subwoofer out on the Expanse Speakers amplifier.What size TV will my Expanse Speakers fit onto?Expanse Speakers come in two sizes, medium and large, allowing you to pick the right model for your TV. The Large Expanse Speakers are designed to fit onto a standard 55” inch TV or bigger. For smaller TV’s and computer monitors we suggest the Medium Expanse speakers.",51.0,1,"3 Campaigns
• Hi I am Krishna a design enthusiast, striving to make every day life simple.

• MAG Stickers make wonderful gifts to friends and family. The package comes with two stickers. Each sticker (6.5x18.5cm). They are also only 0.1 cm thick and can hold a knife up to the weight of 50g/cm2. However, before everyone can enjoy this new, innovative knife holder, MAG Stickers need help. That's why we launched this campaign. The goal of this project is to raise $5,000 by October 20th, 2016. The funds raised will go towards production and manufacturing.
We're seeking funding to help with the production tooling and process. Once that is established, funds will be used to build and deliver the product.
Don't miss out on this great opportunity to own these space saving stickers!
Know others that would love this? Spread the word about MAG Stickers by sharing this on Facebook, Twitter, and other social networks.
We offer lifetime warranty on our product and that said would want the magnetic strength to last a life time we are working with multiple manufacturers to accomplish the goal.

column1: The versEcard is a digital or plastic gift card, that lets recipients choose where they want to shop. Gone are the days of being stuck with a gift card you will never use. With mix and match options on our e-marketplace, you can pick several retailers, restaurants, and service providers to meet all your shopping needs.

Our mission has always been to empower consumers. We are obsessed with taking complex technology and putting it in the hands of the public, in an impactful way that is easy to use. That was the formula behind our latest brainchild – the versEcard.

We want to give people the best tools to buy the best gift – as simple as that. As software engineers, we knew this product would need to align with the way people want to shop today – with ease, versatility, and digital efficiency. That is why we need to build an entire e-market and mobile app that lets people redeem their versEcards easily and intuitively online, from an entire gallery of local, regional, and national retailers, restaurants and service providers, with the ability to mix and match where they want to spend their gift. Wherever you are, and whatever you're doing, this extensive gallery will always be as close as your fingertips. Best yet, unlike other prepaid cash cards, there are never any fees. What you pay is what they get.

But wait, there's more. What makes us truly unique, is versEcard's compatibility with our GiftWise Kiosks - a revolutionary self-service gift card vending system. This benefits both end-consumers and retail locations.

versEcard offers a special  rewards program to give back to our loyal customers. When purchasing versEcards, customers will acquire versEpoints which they can redeem for various photos and video greetings to accompany their versEcards and to unlock our VIP offers. The reward program works as follows:

column5: >Get 1 versEpoint for every $1 you spend on versEcards

column1: 50 versEpoints = unlock a photo greeting to accompany your versEcard
100 versEpoints = unlock a video greeting to accompany your versEcard
150 versEpoints = unlock a DELUXE video greeting to accompany your versEcard
An examples of our photo greetings that may accompany your versEcard gifts.
An example of our video greetings that may accompany your versEcard gifts:

column14:
s=98cae4df3b97c3249ac7ad500c918ed7"" src="""" style=""""/>

There are countless restaurants, service providers, and retailers participating in our versEcard program, all of which will be accessible on our e-market. Below is just a small glimpse at those participating.
column26: s=bbf9f37f869eac49c563e0fd06b3fb7b"" src="""" style=""""/>
column29:
>Hi, I'm Tom, the President and Founder of Self-Service Networks. I am a self-diagnosed tech geek with entrepreneurial tendencies, which has brought me here, Self-Service Networks just recently celebrating its 20 year anniversary. I am proud to say, we have been the leaders in interactive kiosks and self-service technology, providing secure unattended transaction solutions used in complex automated retail systems. I and my team of dedicated professionals developed the first unattended gift card vending solution, GiftWise, and have deployed over 150 GiftWise self-service gift card delivery systems in 3 countries. We are obsessed with creating software solutions that help consumers adopt new, innovative technologies, which is exactly what led us to creating the versEcard.  

It has been one heck of a ride, but I could never have done it without my team, family, friends, business associates, and supporters. I deeply thank all of you from the bottom of my heart. With the launch of our new product, the versEcard, we are hopeful to gain the same kind of fandom and funding to give this concept legs. I am excited to have all of you on this journey.
column35:
s=272720946ffd93960b91e42f9f4ee836"" src="""" style=""""/>

From the day we founded the company to this day, 20 years later, we are in many ways an indie company. Big time technology in a small time business, allows us to adapt quickly to the needs, wants and demands of the public. Our deep connection to consumers made crowdfunding an easy choice. We hope to empower the public, by the public empowering our project. Help us help you!

Your contributions will go toward developing software to integrate our kiosks with the versEcard and to build the digital gift card e-market and mobile app. Your dollars will never will be wasted because the versEcard WILL come to life one way or another. However, your funding will determine how quickly the necessary software development will be completed.

column12:
s=876ff04eb2c83738f895dc80a2c86a2d"" src="""" style=""""/>

With existing partnerships with the world’s leading physical and electronic gift card processing companies, Self-Service Networks is poised to hit the ground running with the best mix of national and local gift card retailers available. Our versEcard will offer recipients choices between such favorite brands such as Target, iTunes, Amazon, GameStop, Nordstrom, and more. 

Now it’s time to capitalize on these relationships to build the best in class user interface for web, mobile, and kiosk applications. We can’t emphasize enough the impact that a fast and easy to use interface will have on the success of versEcard. As with any project involving transforming consumer’s shopping behavior, customer adoption and education is critical to our success. The majority of the funds raised will be spent in evaluating, prototyping, and completing the user interface development with a keen eye focused on simplifying the entire buying and redemption process via our website, our mobile app, and our touch screen kiosks.
column18:
s=81052bc28dde82264117b87b4730e584"" src="""" style=""""/>

We believe that in addition to our online sales outlets, offering our versEcard through a wide network of self-service kiosks in retail stores, shopping malls, and grocery stores will greatly increase the prominence and visibility of the versEcard as America’s perfect gift. With additional funding, we would have the resources necessary to deploy a pilot of self-service kiosks used to increase distribution of our versEcard product and create a bridge from plastic cards to electronic cards.
column50:
s=ea786842609927c4ceb34ba33e4af36b"" src="""" style=""""/>

Risks and challenges

Being optimists, we like to believe that there is nothing that will go wrong! However, everything in life has risks, and we have certainly identified and calculated all of them. One major obstacle could be having limited retailers on our e-market. However, with our local and national partnerships and alliances, this risk is rather small.

Other challenges could involve the quirks and kinks of any software development, but with in-house tech geniuses and a constant ear to the ground, we should be apt and nimble enough to blast through any bugs quickly and efficiently.

column2: production phase and once IndieGoGo has successfully ended, we can ship our mosquito boxes out and the estimated arrival at your doorstep is on early/mid september!

column1: Why did we Develop the Mosquito Box?
The main reason for developing the mosquito box has been started from a tragic story. A story that turned into a dream to being able to protect the people from mosquito.

The increasing population on earth and urbanization all over the world is causing problems everywhere around the world. The current indoor mosquito traps have been based on technology from the past. We had to re-invent.

So we went back to the drawing board, adding in research and innovations from the last few years to develop a new generation of smart mosquito traps that are suitable for the current society. Efficient and effective.

column2:
>A Short Story from Brian Lamsee
From an Innocent Family Trip to a Nightmare

column1: We will continue the fight! We need Help!

Our mission is to protect people from mosquito and help people that have caught these terrible insects. We cannot fight this alone and we need your help. Time is ticking and nobody knows when the next deadly mosquito disease is going to appear.

QM Limited has a long history of fighting against mosquitoes in Hong Kong. QM has developed many traps in cooperation with public instances in Hong Kong. But this is was only our first step, we have technology to create even more efficient mosquito traps and we want to be able to give everyone a chance to use it to fight against mosquitoes at home. Mosquito borne disease keep mutating and who knows when a new one will appear. Mosquitoes are already the world deadliest animal that kills over 750.000 people a year(Gates Notes). Even though we can continue the road we have walked in the past, but time is something we cannot fight and only with your help we can accomplish this fight and give our children a safer world.

The Mosquito Box uses a combination of different methods to specifically lure female mosquitoes (the ones that bite) into our traps. Below you can find the list of technology and links to their workings.

- Co2/H2o from the Tio2 coated surface  
- Dark color design  
- Heat &
column2:
Spectral Wavelengths from the CCFL/UV Light  
- (optional) Attractants from Biogents (Germany)

column1: Female mosquitoes track humans by tracing Co2 and H2o. They can track Co2 up to 50 meters and follow it back to the place of origin.
The UV light of the Mosquito Box irradiates a surface coated with Titanium Dioxide to enable the photo catalysis effect (see below) to lure mosquitoes.
This effect is discovered by Dr. Akira Fujishima from Tokyo University of Science and it helps simulate the human breath of Co2 and moisture that mosquitoes use to track their prey.
Mosquitoes have 2 compound eyes. The compound eyes are made up of many hundreds if not, thousands of lenses called ommatidia.

Testing with different colors we noticed that mosquitoes prefer the color black over any other. Another interesting fact is that mosquitoes stay in groups. With our Mirroring surface it will give the feeling to the mosquito that she is not flying alone to the prey and increase the chances of the mosquito nearing our Mosquito Box.

We have incorporated a USB 3.0 to easily recharge your Phone. We have thought of many ways in increasing the heat generation of the Mosquito Box to attract mosquito's but many would incorporate wasting energy to generate heat.

By adding the USB Charger to charge your phone, the Mosquito Box and your Phone produces extra heat to attract mosquitoes, This way it will not waste any energy and produce our desired extra heat attraction.

The light that a CCFL light produces attracts mosquitoes since it has been adjusted to give off the same body heat of human body’s. The light itself also emits a special spectrum that attracts mosquitoes and other flying insects.

A CCFL light can last up to 40.000+ hours in comparison to the traditional UV lights that people still use from decades ago, there is no need to exchange the light bulbs anymore. Another interesting thing is that a CCFL light uses 60% less energy than the traditional UV bulbs.
Researchers of Biogents (University of Regensburg / Germany) have over 16 years of research regarding the olfactory system of mosquitoes.
We have implemented their sweet scent attractants into our traps. With the following results as seen below.
Our Mosquito Box can function without the optional attractants. If you include the attractants into your trap, you can increase the trapping efficacy.
The Mosquito Box has a fan for two purposes. The fan acts as a suction device to suck in mosquitoes that are attracted to the Mosquito Box.
The second function is to make sure that the Co2/H2o that is generated can be spread out.
The Mosquito Box is designed for indoor usage but is also capable functioning outdoors like for your garden/patio or balcony.

The MBOX is a specialized device that lures in mosquitoes by offering an alternative for the mosquito, when there are no options available for the mosquito to bite like in your living room or bed room it will be attracted to the trap and captured.
The most important aspect is that you have to keep the trap on when there are no alternatives for mosquitoes to guarantee a 100% capture rate.
A lot of work has already been finished after our first generation of the Mosquito Box. And the Production for the second generation can be started once everything is successfully funded.
Since this is a relaunch on the project and we know we can achieve the funding, we have already put a lot of effort in the production and also reduced the shipping costs. from 250 ->
We are looking to expand globally to give everyone a chance to buy a Mosquito Box and protect their family &
column2: friends from mosquito borne diseases. Once our finance have been rounded up, we can immediately start producing and shipping our first products after carefully testing them

column1: We will be shipping at the end of August and you should be able to receive it within 3-5 days of shipment.
On the testing bank for reliability, power consumption testing!
The first few boxes that we were able to receive! little bit dusty, but we will clean dust it off before we send it off to you guys!
As we do our own assembly, we have produced all the parts separately to decrease the costs of our product and guarantee that we can give you all the quality that you can expect from us.
Of course we also need a lot of foam to pack all the boxes for you guys!

And last here is some more mosquito boxes in our big export cartons :)! If everything is going according to plan and IndieGoGo is successful, you will be receiving our mosquito box early/mid September!
Our mission is to develop even better traps in the future that we can provide to the world. We will keep dedicating in research &
column2: development to improve our understanding of the mosquito and create even better traps for you in the future.

column1: We believe that when you are backing us, it is not only helping you to get rid of mosquitoes, but you will also be helping humanity getting rid of mosquitoes.
We really have to reduce the amount of deaths by mosquitoes, it is one of the biggest killers of the world and to achieve this we need your help!

column2:
Development: 
After the first generation of the Mosquito Box we have kept on thinking up idea's to increase the efficacy on catching mosquito's. Our biggest challenge has always been to keep adapting innovative technology into our traps and keep up with the ever evolving mosquito and mosquito diseases.

column1: To keep this Risk as minimum as possible we keep contact with lead researchers like Biogents (Germany) and with our history of cooperation with public instances in Hong Kong we have developed many ways of testing our devices. We have the knowledge and materials, but we need more supporters for us to show that we can be one of the leading fighters against mosquitoes.

Production Risk: 
As we have produced mosquito traps for over 8 years and have experienced many kinds of problems, we have the confidence that we can deliver this product in time. Most of the research &
column2: development of the MBOX has been done before we went on kickstarter and as for the production, most of the initial stages have been produced before as the first generation of the MBOX and we have made a few adjustments to the MBOX and added a USB 3.0 to increase the efficacy of the MBOX.
