column1: ","#Update on Production & Testing (Scroll down a little bit)
We are already in the testing & production phase and once IndieGoGo has successfully ended, we can ship our mosquito boxes out and the estimated arrival at your doorstep is on early/mid september!
Why did we Develop the Mosquito Box?
The main reason for developing the mosquito box has been started from a tragic story. A story that turned into a dream to being able to protect the people from mosquito.

The increasing population on earth and urbanization all over the world is causing problems everywhere around the world. The current indoor mosquito traps have been based on technology from the past. We had to re-invent.

So we went back to the drawing board, adding in research and innovations from the last few years to develop a new generation of smart mosquito traps that are suitable for the current society. Efficient and effective.
A Short Story from Brian LamseeFrom an Innocent Family Trip to a Nightmare
We will continue the fight! We need Help!

Our mission is to protect people from mosquito and help people that have caught these terrible insects. We cannot fight this alone and we need your help. Time is ticking and nobody knows when the next deadly mosquito disease is going to appear.

QM Limited has a long history of fighting against mosquitoes in Hong Kong. QM has developed many traps in cooperation with public instances in Hong Kong. But this is was only our first step, we have technology to create even more efficient mosquito traps and we want to be able to give everyone a chance to use it to fight against mosquitoes at home. Mosquito borne disease keep mutating and who knows when a new one will appear. Mosquitoes are already the world deadliest animal that kills over 750.000 people a year(Gates Notes). Even though we can continue the road we have walked in the past, but time is something we cannot fight and only with your help we can accomplish this fight and give our children a safer world.

The Mosquito Box uses a combination of different methods to specifically lure female mosquitoes (the ones that bite) into our traps. Below you can find the list of technology and links to their workings.
- Co2/H2o from the Tio2 coated surface  - Dark color design  - Heat & Spectral Wavelengths from the CCFL/UV Light  - (optional) Attractants from Biogents (Germany)
Female mosquitoes track humans by tracing Co2 and H2o. They can track Co2 up to 50 meters and follow it back to the place of origin.
The UV light of the Mosquito Box irradiates a surface coated with Titanium Dioxide to enable the photo catalysis effect (see below) to lure mosquitoes.
This effect is discovered by Dr. Akira Fujishima from Tokyo University of Science and it helps simulate the human breath of Co2 and moisture that mosquitoes use to track their prey.
Mosquitoes have 2 compound eyes. The compound eyes are made up of many hundreds if not, thousands of lenses called ommatidia.

Testing with different colors we noticed that mosquitoes prefer the color black over any other. Another interesting fact is that mosquitoes stay in groups. With our Mirroring surface it will give the feeling to the mosquito that she is not flying alone to the prey and increase the chances of the mosquito nearing our Mosquito Box.

We have incorporated a USB 3.0 to easily recharge your Phone. We have thought of many ways in increasing the heat generation of the Mosquito Box to attract mosquito's but many would incorporate wasting energy to generate heat.

By adding the USB Charger to charge your phone, the Mosquito Box and your Phone produces extra heat to attract mosquitoes, This way it will not waste any energy and produce our desired extra heat attraction.

The light that a CCFL light produces attracts mosquitoes since it has been adjusted to give off the same body heat of human body’s. The light itself also emits a special spectrum that attracts mosquitoes and other flying insects.

A CCFL light can last up to 40.000+ hours in comparison to the traditional UV lights that people still use from decades ago, there is no need to exchange the light bulbs anymore. Another interesting thing is that a CCFL light uses 60% less energy than the traditional UV bulbs.
Researchers of Biogents (University of Regensburg / Germany) have over 16 years of research regarding the olfactory system of mosquitoes.
We have implemented their sweet scent attractants into our traps. With the following results as seen below.
Our Mosquito Box can function without the optional attractants. If you include the attractants into your trap, you can increase the trapping efficacy.
The Mosquito Box has a fan for two purposes. The fan acts as a suction device to suck in mosquitoes that are attracted to the Mosquito Box.
The second function is to make sure that the Co2/H2o that is generated can be spread out.
The Mosquito Box is designed for indoor usage but is also capable functioning outdoors like for your garden/patio or balcony.

The MBOX is a specialized device that lures in mosquitoes by offering an alternative for the mosquito, when there are no options available for the mosquito to bite like in your living room or bed room it will be attracted to the trap and captured.
The most important aspect is that you have to keep the trap on when there are no alternatives for mosquitoes to guarantee a 100% capture rate.
A lot of work has already been finished after our first generation of the Mosquito Box. And the Production for the second generation can be started once everything is successfully funded.
Since this is a relaunch on the project and we know we can achieve the funding, we have already put a lot of effort in the production and also reduced the shipping costs. from 250 -> 215 hkd (DHL)

We are looking to expand globally to give everyone a chance to buy a Mosquito Box and protect their family & friends from mosquito borne diseases. Once our finance have been rounded up, we can immediately start producing and shipping our first products after carefully testing them
We will be shipping at the end of August and you should be able to receive it within 3-5 days of shipment.
We are in Production & Testing & Assembling!
On the testing bank for reliability, power consumption testing!
The first few boxes that we were able to receive! little bit dusty, but we will clean dust it off before we send it off to you guys!
As we do our own assembly, we have produced all the parts separately to decrease the costs of our product and guarantee that we can give you all the quality that you can expect from us.
Of course we also need a lot of foam to pack all the boxes for you guys!

And last here is some more mosquito boxes in our big export cartons :)! If everything is going according to plan and IndieGoGo is successful, you will be receiving our mosquito box early/mid September!
How the funds will be used.

Our mission is to develop even better traps in the future that we can provide to the world. We will keep dedicating in research & development to improve our understanding of the mosquito and create even better traps for you in the future.
We believe that when you are backing us, it is not only helping you to get rid of mosquitoes, but you will also be helping humanity getting rid of mosquitoes.
We really have to reduce the amount of deaths by mosquitoes, it is one of the biggest killers of the world and to achieve this we need your help!

Mosquito Research & Development: After the first generation of the Mosquito Box we have kept on thinking up idea's to increase the efficacy on catching mosquito's. Our biggest challenge has always been to keep adapting innovative technology into our traps and keep up with the ever evolving mosquito and mosquito diseases.

To keep this Risk as minimum as possible we keep contact with lead researchers like Biogents (Germany) and with our history of cooperation with public instances in Hong Kong we have developed many ways of testing our devices. We have the knowledge and materials, but we need more supporters for us to show that we can be one of the leading fighters against mosquitoes.

Production Risk: As we have produced mosquito traps for over 8 years and have experienced many kinds of problems, we have the confidence that we can deliver this product in time. Most of the research & development of the MBOX has been done before we went on kickstarter and as for the production, most of the initial stages have been produced before as the first generation of the MBOX and we have made a few adjustments to the MBOX and added a USB 3.0 to increase the efficacy of the MBOX. As this is something we have done before, we do not expect any problems this time around. I promise if there is something going on we will be clear and honest to our backers. As we have reached our Goal before, i am sure we can do it again.

Shipping Risks: As we are still looking for better ways of shipping our products to our backers. We have looked at the best and safest ways to get our MBOX to you in one piece. One of the most important aspects is that our packaging is sturdy and able to protect the MBOX.

For the shipping we are looking to cooperate with UPS/DHL/FEDEX (they gave us a estimate price). At this moment we are also looking for other shipment methods to get our MBOX to our backers in case there is something wrong with our current couriers (UPS/DHL/FEDEX).

We have already reduced the shipping from 250 -> 215 HKD as we have done a lot of research and with our backers from our previous project we were able to get a better deal. the current shipping will be done by DHL

We had an incredible launch few weeks ago and we had reached over 150% of our target within 20 days. But suddenly due to circumstances Kickstarter has suspended us. Our production is already halfway and our estimate is to ship out at the end of August. (See our Update#2 for some testing pictures :)! )

After working on solutions with our backers & supporters as to why we suddenly were suspended. We were not able to come to any conclusion as where the mishaps are. We have been looking for solutions on how to give our backers and supporters to attain our Mosquito Box. Kickstarter has been ignoring our requests ever since.

Many have wondered what we are going to do now. The Fight against mosquito is not something we can easily give up on, we cannot be stopped by a minor setback. So that is why we are back again, we are not willing to give up and this is a fight that we once again need your support.
If you feel like i have missed any information, just send me a message or comment on the project and i will help you further.

Thanks once again, and let us succeed this time! IndieGoGo is known to be fair & honest. As we put our hopes here to continue our fight! This time with the flexible funding we can guarantee that our backers can receive our product.

The great American tradition of sitting around a fire hearkens back to the days of yore, when people connected over a meal, a story, or a song. While it’s not as common these days to sit fireside in the great outdoors, we firmly believe that this tradition makes any gathering a bit more magical. We know we are not the only ones who love bonding around a fire, telling stories, laughing, roasting marshmallows, and making new memories, but what exactly is so magical about those moments? For us, it’s the whole experience. Whether it be a family gathering, a planned event with guests, or a party with friends, we want to help you recreate this warm and unforgettable tradition. So how do you safely create that experience with ANYONE, ANYTIME, ANYWHERE?


That’s where we come in. To help you take this tradition on the go, we’ve created the ultimate urban s’more bar… the S’moltimate!

With a combination of your stories &
column2: games, bonded with the ultimate s'more bar, S'moltimate makes quality time warmer, sweeter, and unforgettable.
column4: >Tailgates | Sporting Events | Urban Outdoor Adventures | Holidays | Community Events  | Weddings | Gifts |  Entertaining | Corporate Events | Picnics | Road Trips | Outdoor Movie Nights | Indoor Movie Nights | Festivals | Date Night | Family Gatherings

column1: We took an eclectic approach when designing the look of the S'moltimate. We wanted something new, but with nostalgic elements that resonate with urban culture.  We also allowed for a little variety with the dark walnut and natural stain choices .

column2: comfortable and requires only one hand, using the flexible strap handle.

column1: Each S'moltimate is hand painted and consists of a beautiful, uncommonly engineered wood billet incorporated with carved storage pockets, food-safe burner, heat shields and a twist lock lid that doubles as a turntable.

The S'moltimate fire pit reaches approximately 200 degrees with the lit burner, but the specialty coating resists heat of 2,000 degrees. The heat shields have the same specialty coating, creating a barrier of protection from the open flame. Each can of food grade fuel (Ethanol) will burn for 45 minutes, leaving no smell or taste during consumption.

The separate magnetic handgrip attaches to the burner's lid, creating a safe flame snuffer to put out the flame once finished before easily storing within the S'moltimate.The complimentary burner opener makes for easily opening the fuel container  and storing away once finished. Small holes on the outer rim provide temporary storage for skewers and matches - allowing quick access for roasting marshmallows.

The S'moltimate travel tote is made of solid Baltic Birch hardwood and sealed with food-grade sealer, the same used on butchers blocks and the cutting boards you probably have in your kitchen. Considering each person's taste preference, the individual pockets can be filled and mix matched with various ingredients of choice and the smokeless fire can roast the marshmallows, all packaged neatly within the S'moltimate.

With an approximate diameter of 12"" and height of 2.75"" , the slim design makes for easy storage, standing upright or laying down. Easily stack atop one another or side by side for tight spaces. One S'moltimate will make eight s'mores- Having more than one S'moltimate is perfect for larger group settings.

The typical S'more recipe consists of graham crackers, chocolates and roasted marshmallows over fire. This three ingredient system is why the three storage pockets and built-in smokeless fire pit are essential to the S'moltimate's purpose. After multiple prototypes, testing and continually tweaking, we have well-thought-out every practical and visual detail of S'moltimate.

Use the S'moltimate over and over. It's made in-house by us, right here in America. Since each S'moltimate is made in our workshop, we have full control over quality, design, and customer satisfaction.  We're not relying on an overseas manufacturer to preserve our American traditions.  Bridging old-world craftsmanship with new era technology, you can take comfort that it will withstand the test of time. You'll consider it an heirloom in the years to come and a key part of those wonderful memories, especially with the option to personalize. For a unique personalization, you can have each of your family members or friends sign it on the back. Years down the road, you'll be saying ""Oh, wow, this brings back memories!"" Then you turn it over and see everyone's signatures on the bottom, along with dates.
*All designs seen on this campaign are prototypes and are subject to change*

column2: tasty recipes will list all of the calories and nutritional information so you can snack within your dietary needs. Our vast collection of e-recipes make creating your s'mores effortless and fun.  We're partnering with chocolatiers, bakers, nutritionists and (hopefully) you to make a list of the yummiest s'more recipes to fit your taste and diet. Of course, pre-packaged goodies are always a great go-to option. Our goal is to measure the recipes to fill the storage pockets perfectly, keeping your experience fun and effortless by creating less waste and cleanup. You're not in this alone – from our Twitter feed, to Facebook, to our website, we will be there for you with recipes, suggestions, game ideas and more, creating a memorable experience for you and your loved ones or guests. We'll do the bummer work so you can do s'more of the fun stuff!

column1: Becoming friends with S'moltimate's social community allows you to connect and share ideas with like-minded, fun people - an internet neighborhood hangout of sorts, to just drop by and borrow a cup of sweetness. Unannounced at that! After stopping by, feel free to browse the pantry of recipes, supplies, games and more to go along with those fun memories you will be making.

column2: daughter co-founders and a team of  award winning product designers, patent holders, makers and strategic planners with a like-minded focus to make gatherings more fun, enjoyable and easy by applying uncommon design.

column1: Interested in writing about us? Our press kit is available for download here. Also, please feel free to email us directly at smoltimate@uncommonmaker.com or leave a message if you have any questions.

Greetings ALL - from Asheville, NC,

Have you heard ""Sitting is the new smoking"" well, rocking is actually healthy sitting. It keeps blood circulating around the lower part of the body. The Rokher is the world's most ergonomically correct rocker, providing stellar lumbar support, butt-drop into gentle [circulation enhancing] knee roll, relaxed, bucket seat chair angle (103 degrees) to the mid-back bowl right up to the slightest neck return.
 

Please OPEN a new browser to hear from the physicians on why rocking is healthy sitting - for home and office:
http://www.livestrong.com/article/146843-what-a...

http://www.bodyandsoul.com.au/health/health-new...

https://www.amoils.com/health-blog/10-robust-re...

http://www.utilitydesign.co.uk/blog/health-bene...

Over the last 25+ years of being a musician &
column2: producer (RhythmTryst.com) and advertising agency executive (PrescientINC.com), I've endured chronic back/neck pain from long hours in the wrong chairs. So, in early 2014 I decided I would design and build the ultimate rocker. First I began studying ergonomic chair designs, interviewing chiropractors &amp
column3: physical therapists and literally ""Frankensteining"" components together until I had the perfect rocker radius and rocking distance, lumbar support, chair height and angle of repose (relaxed balance). Then I took my concept rocker to a renowned furniture designer (RJ Harper) - who immediately loved the concept and the feel of the rocker. From there we worked together for 18 months designing and refining 6 levels of prototyping. Then I presented our chairs at NAMM (National Assoc. of Music Merchandisers), became Sponsors of music festivals (Merle Fest, LEAF, Grey Fox, IBMA), went to two High Point Furniture Markets to begin securing music stores &amp
column4:
boutique retailers.

Then we took all this invaluable market intelligence to develop the final chair and all of the engineering specs, templates, jigs and molds to bring the Rokher to market. Not to mention months of interviews to
column5: select the right craftsmen and furniture builders to partner with to press the 17 layers of hardwood to make the one-piece chair, articulate the long smooth rocker runs with precision mortise &amp
column6:
tenon joinery of the all Ash rocker legs and cleats and to have the right hard-shell finishing. In March 2016 my vision is realized in the Rokher: a Patent Pending, all American made heirloom rocker that's timeless in its Euro-minimalist aesthetics and ergonomically correct.

UTILIZATION OF FUNDS:
# 1 - Increase Production Runs:
This will dramatically reduce our wholesale cost so we can offer a basic Rokher to select music stores &
column7:
boutiques that they can retail at $880 - which will literally quadruple our market size. Currently we're selling a mid-line Rokher at $1280 and the Sunburst at $1480. We will still be offering a high-end Rokher with new color schemes at $1480 - but we want to appeal to the mid-market, which is 4 times larger than the high-end category. Additionally, with increased production throughput we will actually increase our quality and color finishing refinements.

# 2 - R&
column8:
D + Product Line Extensions:
- Ottoman Dual-Tone Cajon where you can tap your foot to make bass and woodblock tones 
- Advanced acoustical refinements where the Rokher becomes an extension of your instrument
- Branded Rokher Cushions (seat, back and neck - these help shorter folks adjust their height)
- New Rokher Chair Mold for people 5' - 5'10""
- On-Stage, fold-able traveling unit  

# 3 - Own the Category
- Drive our online Sales through aggressive Direct Marketing, Social &
column9:
PR campaigns
- Launch a 12 month marketing intensive in Nashville where we're featured in publications, at salons, at high-end retail boutiques, music stores, and premiering at music venues, insider parties and studios
- Select 3 other major music cities to partner with key publications, retailers and interior designers

# 4  Celebrity Endorsements:
To expand national recognition, the Rokher will sponsor 10 major musicians for their endorsement. Giving theses artists a Rokher they can brand with their signature, color scheme and the back of the chair will be shaped like their guitar head stock type.  From there they can promote and sell their signature Rokher through online sales.
- This is the precursor to setting up an Affiliate Marketing Program for up-n-coming working musicians. Whereby by promoting the Rokher they can earn monies, so they can stay focused on their craft - not working some dead-end job

# 5 Increase Festival Participation:
Last year, as Sponsors over half of our Rokhers we sold through festivals. We were Merle Fest Sponsors again this year (selling 9 chairs) and we're negotiating with 14 other Festivals to be Sponsor/Vendors (average Sponsor Vendor cost is $2k). So, we are upgrading our Booth, Banners, Brochures and hiring support teams. 

{Drum roll please}

We’d like you to become a Rokher ambassador and help us fund the Rokher’s 2017 national roll-out. With your invaluable financial and social media marketing support (sharing this campaign and the Rokher website), the Rokher will become the preeminent brand in the category and we will sell over 300 Rokhers this year. And through our Affiliate programs - help so many other artists realize their creativity.

Thank you for your interest and investment in the Rokher.

“kick back and rock on,”

Timothy J. Martin
- Inventor, Investor, Rah-rah guy, QA guy, Ad guy, Product Innovation, Pack &
column10:
Shipper

PS:  Please OPEN this link in a separate TAB: https://www.capitalatplay.com/rock-on/

column2: select the right craftsmen and furniture builders to partner with to press the 17 layers of hardwood to make the one-piece chair, articulate the long smooth rocker runs with precision mortise & tenon joinery of the all Ash rocker legs and cleats and to have the right hard-shell finishing. In March 2016 my vision is realized in the Rokher: a Patent Pending, all American made heirloom rocker that's timeless in its Euro-minimalist aesthetics and ergonomically correct.UTILIZATION OF FUNDS:# 1 - Increase Production Runs:This will dramatically reduce our wholesale cost so we can offer a basic Rokher to select music stores & boutiques that they can retail at $880 - which will literally quadruple our market size. Currently we're selling a mid-line Rokher at $1280 and the Sunburst at $1480. We will still be offering a high-end Rokher with new color schemes at $1480 - but we want to appeal to the mid-market, which is 4 times larger than the high-end category. Additionally, with increased production throughput we will actually increase our quality and color finishing refinements.# 2 - R&D + Product Line Extensions:- Ottoman Dual-Tone Cajon where you can tap your foot to make bass and woodblock tones - Advanced acoustical refinements where the Rokher becomes an extension of your instrument- Branded Rokher Cushions (seat, back and neck - these help shorter folks adjust their height)- New Rokher Chair Mold for people 5' - 5'10""- On-Stage, fold-able traveling unit  # 3 - Own the Category- Drive our online Sales through aggressive Direct Marketing, Social & PR campaigns- Launch a 12 month marketing intensive in Nashville where we're featured in publications, at salons, at high-end retail boutiques, music stores, and premiering at music venues, insider parties and studios- Select 3 other major music cities to partner with key publications, retailers and interior designers# 4  Celebrity Endorsements:To expand national recognition, the Rokher will sponsor 10 major musicians for their endorsement. Giving theses artists a Rokher they can brand with their signature, color scheme and the back of the chair will be shaped like their guitar head stock type.  From there they can promote and sell their signature Rokher through online sales.- This is the precursor to setting up an Affiliate Marketing Program for up-n-coming working musicians. Whereby by promoting the Rokher they can earn monies, so they can stay focused on their craft - not working some dead-end job# 5 Increase Festival Participation:Last year, as Sponsors over half of our Rokhers we sold through festivals. We were Merle Fest Sponsors again this year (selling 9 chairs) and we're negotiating with 14 other Festivals to be Sponsor/Vendors (average Sponsor Vendor cost is $2k). So, we are upgrading our Booth, Banners, Brochures and hiring support teams. {Drum roll please}We’d like you to become a Rokher ambassador and help us fund the Rokher’s 2017 national roll-out. With your invaluable financial and social media marketing support (sharing this campaign and the Rokher website), the Rokher will become the preeminent brand in the category and we will sell over 300 Rokhers this year. And through our Affiliate programs - help so many other artists realize their creativity.Thank you for your interest and investment in the Rokher.“kick back and rock on,”Timothy J. Martin- Inventor, Investor, Rah-rah guy, QA guy, Ad guy, Product Innovation, Pack & ShipperPS:  Please OPEN this link in a separate TAB: https://www.capitalatplay.com/rock-on/",2.0,0,"1 Campaign

I am JDavid ""The People's Barber"" and I first want to thank you all for taking the time to view my campaign. My sole purpose in launching this campaign is to raise the necessary funds to open my own Barbershop/Suite, in which I am calling Groomed.  This would not be a place to just get a haircut, thats what average barbershops provide. This will be a place to recieve a service, a place to come have an experience, the J David experience.

I am a decorated Army Combat Veteran, in which i take alot of pride in. I am still transitioning from the grunt, rugged, lifestyle of the infantrymen, to civilian. Its been a long road traveled. As per the video provided above, I have given you a quick overview of where my life is now. From barber school, to clientele, to the car accident. I am a solider so I always bounce back. 

 In this campaign I am trying to raise $12,000 which will cover majority of my start up cost. I'm not asking for big donations $1, $2, $3...it all adds up. I may have a limited time but I know I'll reach my goal with your help.  With each donation or backer, I will to keep track of every name and with those names I will have a wall of contributors made. Because I never want to forget who helped me along my journey.

Now guys and ladies, I could sit here and write out a whole list of why I need your help and why you should believe in me. But, I would rather let God speak to your hearts and lead you to contribute or not. Either way, I thank you for just taking the time out of your day to view my campaign. 

-JDavid ""The People's Barber""

Groomed

Hello. Nice to meet you through indigogo.

ZEZO is a craft / design studio located in Republic of Korea.

We discover the values ​​that we miss in everyday life and deliver them through various products.

 

 

‘gram’

The first project, 'gram', is about weight.

In general, people perceive objects as shapes, colors, sizes, and so on.

But ‘gram' maximizes the characteristics of the material by showing how different products of the same size have different weights depending on the material.

 

‘All in one'

 

'gram' is a minimal office supply that includes various functions in a simple form.

By maximizing the functions of a minimal metal chunk, it becomes a complete product by itself.

'gram' can be used for various purposes such as paper holder, clip holder, pen holder, tea light holder and paperweight according to user's needs.

Each part is simply disassembled, combined, and easy to use and clean as needed.

 

‘play’
column3:
'/>

'gram' consists of a set of three pieces.

You can play with it by fidgeting through disassembling and combining those pieces.
column5:
'>Find the joy of small changes on your desk.

 

 

 

180g (cool silver / warm black)

 

Lightweight '180 grams' giving a chic feel. (aluminum)

The light and solid material is used for furniture, automobile engine, wheel and so on.

It is a metal that is well matched wherever it is placed.

 

500g (brass)

 

'500 grams' that adds charm and sensibility with its heaviness. (brass)

As time goes by, it gets aged and adds depth.

It is a metal with traces of the user.

 

 

CNC machining

 

'gram' has been precisely manufactured through an excellent manufacturing base in Korea. 

Precision processing with CNC ensures that the three pieces of 'gram' are assembled as one. 

Since the material is carved out of the whole metal, you can feel the sense of volume.

 

specifications

column1: We are a father and daughter team who also happen to be landscape professionals and are passionate about gardening. We realized some time ago that there is no non-intimidating, homeowner friendly website to help gardeners select and care for their gardens. We want to help people get excited about gardening because it is good for people mentally and physically, great for the environment, and a fantastic way to get off the couch .

RightPlantz.com has been up and running since the beginning of 2018. Every month brings more and more users. We are getting great feedback and are fully confident there is a real need for our site. All plant photographs and content are original.

But we need your help. We are currently working on RightPlantz Phase 2 which will include directories of the suppliers and professionals who our users can turn to for help and supplies. Phase 2 will be a dynamic addition to RightPlants and will greatly improve users experience both on the site and in the garden.
We are seeking to raise $10,000 to help develop RightPlantz Phase 2 and get the word out.
35% of the funds raised will go to actually developing the changes to rightplantz.com. The remaining 65% will go towards attracting the vendors who can help our users.
Gardening is good for people and good for the environment. We want to get people outside breathing fresh air, touching the dirt, and improving their surroundings.

As landscape architects and designers, we have long realized the value that landscaping and gardening brings to the world. Producing one's own healthy food, increasing plant populations for pollinators or even getting one's children excited to be outside, the benefits of gardening are simply too many to mention.

We want RightPlantz to be a catalyst for people to dig (another pun intended) into the gardening world. We have done so in our other professional lives, now we want to extend our reach even further with rightplantz.com.
Even if you cannot help by donating money, we hope you will visit www.rightplantz.com and join as a member (it is free).

Four years ago I was forced to reevaluate my life.  In the past I owned and operated successful businesses.  Being an entrepreneur was and is my forte.

I began taking note of my own environment.  The most striking observation was people’s awareness of germs and viruses.  Often people were asked to remove their shoes before entering someone’s home and hand sanitizer was a staple before holding a baby.  With these thoughts in mind I asked myself some serious questions, “What do people need?” and “What are people doing to take care of themselves against germs and viruses?”

With sanitizing on my mind I started to review my daily activities.  I walk around our local lake every day.  There are hundreds of Canada geese living and defecating in this park.  Adding to this, I thought of the public restrooms I use.  They are dirty and the floors are always wet.  I realized that when I take my shoes off I am touching the bottom of my shoe.  The amount of germs and viruses my shoes come in contact with is incomprehensible.  I am literally walking these germs directly into my home.  This is when the idea of sanitizing the bottom of my shoe came into being.

Pro Mat 99 was born but not without many trials and tribulations.  My first idea was to make a doormat that housed a sanitizing mat.  I thought you could wipe your feet as you would wipe your hands.  I met with one of the largest wet wipe companies in the world.  I showed them my prototype but was told it would not work.  Air was my enemy.  The big wipe would dry up too quickly.

When I described my disappointment to my son he told me how his dentist used UV light to sterilize his instruments.  This was an idea I could work with!  UVC light is specifically designed to kill germs, viruses, bacteria, E Coli, and can be used to kill the coronavirus.  I immediately began to sketch a UVC doormat.  I gave my rough illustration to a mechanical engineer to move forward with my second prototype.
After dozens of obstacles and several more prototypes PRO MAT 99 was completed.  The PRO MAT 99 is made solid, durable material including steel.

The PRO MAT 99 will provide a cleaner, healthier environment for all.  I truly believe every home and business should own a PRO MAT 99. I have spent a fortune creating this highly effective quality product.  I am now in need of financial help.  Your funds will be used for injection molds and production.  I am ready to deliver PRO MAT 99 to the world. I hope you will join me in this effort and get the word out to family and friends. Plus, please check out the unique perks!  Let’s do this together!

When Comedian Brett Eidman goes on stage his goal is to “kill” the audience. In comedy lingo, “kill” means to make the audience laugh hysterically. However, Eidman’s new goal is no laughing matter. Now, he wants to kill germs, viruses, and bacteria that we unwittingly walk right into our home. “We carry germs, viruses, bacteria, E.coli, Coronavirus, and MERSA on the bottom of our shoes. These pathogens can become airborne. Even if we remove our shoes, the germs and viruses have already invaded our home and can make us ill,” says Eidman.

For these reasons, this comedian turned inventor created Pro Mat 99. The Pro Mat 99 is a portable, battery-operated, UVC sole sanitizing device. Pro Mat 99 is an inch and a half thick platform modeled after a doormat. The left section is a rubber scrape mat. The right section is an open design steel platform that is housed directly above the UVC lamps. It’s simple, you step onto the rubber mat, wipe your feet, then step to the right onto the steel platform and in seconds your shoes are sanitized.

Eidman goes on to say, “Over the past four years, I’ve worked with electrical and mechanical engineers, lawyers, and a top product designer. I finally got Pro Mat 99 to be of the quality people deserve and I demanded. The entire process has been extremely expensive, and we still need to make molds and go into production, therefore I put up an Indiegogo campaign to help raise the funds. I’m very excited to bring Pro Mat 99 to the world.”
If you would like to join him on his mission, please check out Pro Mat 99 on Indiegogo https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/pro-mat-99-k... visit www.promat99.com.

Related Links
Pro Mat 99
Indiegogo

column3: >The GoSun Flow is
column5: >small enough to fit into a backpack
column7: >, uses solar energy to filter
column9: >99.99% of pathogens
column11: > from water,
column13: >pumps 1 liter of clean water per minute
column15:
>, and can function as a portable handwashing station, hot shower, source of clean drinking water, and much more.

 

 

 

 

Place the intake hose into any water source (except saltwater), plug in the pump, and automatically filter water. When using the faucet or shower, clamp the faucet over the sink basin, flip on the pump and enjoy.

 

 

 

 

Instead of manual pumping, our USB-powered pump does the work for you and enables delivery of water wherever it is needed. With the powerful pump, GoSun Flow purifies one liter of water per minute! Get clean water extra fast anywhere you need.

The pump is powered by an included powerbank and can pump over 100 gallons of water on a single charge. When you’re done, easily recharge it with the sun. The integrated solar panel plugs right into the powerbank to charge it up.

 

 

 

Our cutting-edge 3-stage cartridge filter removes 99.99% of pathogens. First, a polypropylene filter disc removes large particles like dirt, rust, and sand. Second, a high-efficiency carbon filter absorbs hazardous chemicals and heavy metals. Finally, a nano aluminum fiber filter creates an electropositive charge in a labyrinth of fibers to trap and kill the tiniest particles and organisms in your water. 

Best of all, the filter lasts for 1,000 liters of filtration and can be easily replaced.

 

 

 

GoSun is leading the fuel-free frontier, utilizing the best in clean tech to help you USE MORE SUN.  We love being outdoors, sharing food and drinks, but we don't love the mess and distance to clean, running water.  Now, you can make fresh water and have a mobile hand washing station, anywhere.

 

 

 

 

Current water filters require you to suck or pump water out of the source manually.  If you've ever actually used one, you know, sucking is sucky.  Purifying water is complex and traditional filters require lots of diligence to maintain. That's why GoSun developed a 3-stage filter with a super efficient pump to do the job.

 

 

 

The Flow has your water needs covered.  Use the filter alone to purify water, or use the pump to 1) purify water 2) setup a sink, or 3) setup a shower.  Through years of development, GoSun has designed the Flow to make your outdoor water needs as easy as possible.  There is no comparison for both water purification and delivery in a mobile package.

column1: • Wait 30 minutes for it to be fully heated up

column3:
showinfo=0"">
There are a lot of slow 'solar showers' that can take all day to heat up, and it better be a warm, sunny day or your shower will be frigid.  Thanks to the GoSun Fusion's vacuum insulation and optimized reflectors, a five minute long warm shower can be solar heated in just 30 minutes.  At night or indoors, the submersible 12Volt heater does the job in about one hour.
 
 
 
 

The Flex Faucet's integrated clamp can open to over two and a quarter inches (58mm) so it attaches anywhere: branches, tables, tailgates, fences, etc.  The flexible head can twist, bend and point water to wherever you need it.

 

 

Need to hydrate now? Flow gives you a variety of options to access clean water. Fill up the included water bag and drink on the go, attach a bottle to the filter and drink through it, or drink directly from the source through the filter like a straw.

column1:
Using USB On The Go (USB OTG) you can also plug the pump directly to your phone's battery to create or deliver fresh water.  A typical phone can it run for hours since the pump is super efficient. This feature works with most Android phones using an USB OTG Adapter, but not easily with iPhones.

 

 

 

Hand washing is key to staying healthy.  Now, you can wash whenever and wherever you want.  Today, it's hard to know all the places where washing would be helpful and you cannot be too careful. Rubbing alcohol based cleaners, while effective, smear around dirt and leave your hands dry, cracked, and oddly fragrant.

 

Stay clean while you are away from home. Flow is great for camping, international travel, backyard BBQs, boating, outdoor events, jobsites, beaches, RVs, cookouts, and being generally prepared. During these times, it is very helpful to have a sanitation system with you at all times.

 

 

 

The durable, EVA pump station contains all the critical parts in one place: 3-stage filter, USB pump, powerbank, and hoses.  Plus, the integrated solar panel keeps it charged up.

 

 



We all want to live more independent, healthy and resilient lives. GoSun has developed breakthrough solar technologies that can cook, cool, light, power electronics and now, purify and deliver water. These affordable products are all portable, highly efficient and free of harmful emissions.

 

Indiegogo pricing is the lowest possible at over 40% off retail, because backers are pre-ordering. We've structured the rewards so they build off of one another, with each package including the base Flow.  In other words, every reward includes the items from the lower priced tiers, with new accessories added into each reward tier.

For a closer look at bundled GoSun accessories, follow these links: GoSun Fusion,  GoSun Chill, GoSun Thermo, 144wh PowerBank.

 

This is our eighth crowdfunded product, and we've always delivered.   The GoSun Flow has been in development for years, so we are ready for production.  Your pledge and this campaign will push the Flow forward.

 

 

GoSun is committed to making the highest quality and most accessible solar powered products.  We build products to be relied on day in and day out, so you can get the most from them.  Take a deep look at the Specs or FAQ's and then send us a message if you don't find your answer. We are happy to help.

Collapsible Sink

Collapsible sink fills with up to nine liters, folds down to just two inches and the integrated basket handles make it easy to carry a full load.

Filter 

The unique three-stage filter removes 99.99% of pathogens, including viruses, thanks to a powerful, electropositive charge generated by nanoalumina fibers. It does not require backflushing or rinsing, yet it lasts for up to 1,000 liters.

Pump 

Drawing only two watts, this diaphragm pump can move about one liter per minute while running on any USB source. No regular maintenance, plus the pump is fully serviceable for years of water delivery.

Flex Faucet w/ Clamp and Switch

A faucet, showerhead, clamp and switch assembly in one, this highly flexible element sets up anywhere in seconds. The clamp can fit up to two inches and the flexible hose can be directed in any direction.

Powerbank

Lithium ion is a game changer. This 18.5wh powerbank can run the Flow for hours, but just in case, you can keep it charged with the integrated solar panel.  Of course,  you can also charge your phone with the powerbank.

 

  

GoSun is composed of designers, engineers, and change-makers, intent on serving the world with unparalleled clean energy solutions.

GoSun has become known as one of the world’s top manufacturers of innovative solar products that can cook, cool, power and light -- and now with the GoSun Flow, you can purify water and carry the kitchen sink.

This is our 8th crowdfunding project, and we always deliver. GoSun has become a leader in  breakthrough solar technologies that make outdoor, healthy and clean living a reality through innovation and thoughtful design.
column8: %20store%20solar%20energy%20"" rel=""noopener nofollow"" target=""_blank"">
column12:
%20store%20solar%20energy%20"" rel=""noopener nofollow"" target=""_blank"">

 

GoSun is a young company that benefits tremendously from people who share our mission with their network. Please take a minute to let your friends and family know about this innovation.

 

We never worked, we flowed.  ""A Flow State"" or ""The Zone"" is what happens when you reach ""the mental state in which a person (or team) performing an activity is fully immersed in a feeling of energized focus, full involvement, and enjoyment...,"" and that's what happened.

For a closer look at bundled GoSun accessories, follow these links: GoSun Fusion,  GoSun Chill, GoSun Thermo, 144wh PowerBank.


 

Based on the new need of sanitation, we have worked hard and fast to make this product ready for production. Here are a few risks and challenges along with our management plan:

Manufacturing. We have our own final assembly plant, but the sub-manufacturing suppliers are going to need our quality assurance people on site during production.  There are a lot of parts that come together for one Flow, so this will require a lot of coordination.

Delays. Given the global situation, disruptions could occur with various suppliers or deliveries, but we have been working with all our relationships since the beginning of 2020 and we are confident that delays will be minimal, if at all.


Fulfillment. Sometimes things happen that can’t be planned for - a supplier misses a deadline or a shipment gets lost. These unknowns could cause a delay. We are using an experienced logistics team to get our products to you and we’ll maintain open communication with you throughout our process.

","The GoSun Flow is small enough to fit into a backpack, uses solar energy to filter 99.99% of pathogens from water, pumps 1 liter of clean water per minute, and can function as a portable handwashing station, hot shower, source of clean drinking water, and much more.    Place the intake hose into any water source (except saltwater), plug in the pump, and automatically filter water. When using the faucet or shower, clamp the faucet over the sink basin, flip on the pump and enjoy.    Instead of manual pumping, our USB-powered pump does the work for you and enables delivery of water wherever it is needed. With the powerful pump, GoSun Flow purifies one liter of water per minute! Get clean water extra fast anywhere you need.The pump is powered by an included powerbank and can pump over 100 gallons of water on a single charge. When you’re done, easily recharge it with the sun. The integrated solar panel plugs right into the powerbank to charge it up.   Our cutting-edge 3-stage cartridge filter removes 99.99% of pathogens. First, a polypropylene filter disc removes large particles like dirt, rust, and sand. Second, a high-efficiency carbon filter absorbs hazardous chemicals and heavy metals. Finally, a nano aluminum fiber filter creates an electropositive charge in a labyrinth of fibers to trap and kill the tiniest particles and organisms in your water. Best of all, the filter lasts for 1,000 liters of filtration and can be easily replaced.   GoSun is leading the fuel-free frontier, utilizing the best in clean tech to help you USE MORE SUN.  We love being outdoors, sharing food and drinks, but we don't love the mess and distance to clean, running water.  Now, you can make fresh water and have a mobile hand washing station, anywhere.    Current water filters require you to suck or pump water out of the source manually.  If you've ever actually used one, you know, sucking is sucky.  Purifying water is complex and traditional filters require lots of diligence to maintain. That's why GoSun developed a 3-stage filter with a super efficient pump to do the job.   The Flow has your water needs covered.  Use the filter alone to purify water, or use the pump to 1) purify water 2) setup a sink, or 3) setup a shower.  Through years of development, GoSun has designed the Flow to make your outdoor water needs as easy as possible.  There is no comparison for both water purification and delivery in a mobile package.

column1: Wait 30 minutes for it to be fully heated up

No Patience, No ProblemThere are a lot of slow 'solar showers' that can take all day to heat up, and it better be a warm, sunny day or your shower will be frigid.  Thanks to the GoSun Fusion's vacuum insulation and optimized reflectors, a five minute long warm shower can be solar heated in just 30 minutes.  At night or indoors, the submersible 12Volt heater does the job in about one hour.    The Flex Faucet's integrated clamp can open to over two and a quarter inches (58mm) so it attaches anywhere: branches, tables, tailgates, fences, etc.  The flexible head can twist, bend and point water to wherever you need it.  Need to hydrate now? Flow gives you a variety of options to access clean water. Fill up the included water bag and drink on the go, attach a bottle to the filter and drink through it, or drink directly from the source through the filter like a straw.

Using USB On The Go (USB OTG) you can also plug the pump directly to your phone's battery to create or deliver fresh water.  A typical phone can it run for hours since the pump is super efficient. This feature works with most Android phones using an USB OTG Adapter, but not easily with iPhones.   Hand washing is key to staying healthy.  Now, you can wash whenever and wherever you want.  Today, it's hard to know all the places where washing would be helpful and you cannot be too careful. Rubbing alcohol based cleaners, while effective, smear around dirt and leave your hands dry, cracked, and oddly fragrant. Stay clean while you are away from home. Flow is great for camping, international travel, backyard BBQs, boating, outdoor events, jobsites, beaches, RVs, cookouts, and being generally prepared. During these times, it is very helpful to have a sanitation system with you at all times.   The durable, EVA pump station contains all the critical parts in one place: 3-stage filter, USB pump, powerbank, and hoses.  Plus, the integrated solar panel keeps it charged up.  We all want to live more independent, healthy and resilient lives. GoSun has developed breakthrough solar technologies that can cook, cool, light, power electronics and now, purify and deliver water. These affordable products are all portable, highly efficient and free of harmful emissions. Indiegogo pricing is the lowest possible at over 40% off retail, because backers are pre-ordering. We've structured the rewards so they build off of one another, with each package including the base Flow.  In other words, every reward includes the items from the lower priced tiers, with new accessories added into each reward tier.For a closer look at bundled GoSun accessories, follow these links: GoSun Fusion,  GoSun Chill, GoSun Thermo, 144wh PowerBank. This is our eighth crowdfunded product, and we've always delivered.   The GoSun Flow has been in development for years, so we are ready for production.  Your pledge and this campaign will push the Flow forward.  GoSun is committed to making the highest quality and most accessible solar powered products.  We build products to be relied on day in and day out, so you can get the most from them.  Take a deep look at the Specs or FAQ's and then send us a message if you don't find your answer. We are happy to help.Collapsible SinkCollapsible sink fills with up to nine liters, folds down to just two inches and the integrated basket handles make it easy to carry a full load.Filter The unique three-stage filter removes 99.99% of pathogens, including viruses, thanks to a powerful, electropositive charge generated by nanoalumina fibers. It does not require backflushing or rinsing, yet it lasts for up to 1,000 liters.Pump Drawing only two watts, this diaphragm pump can move about one liter per minute while running on any USB source. No regular maintenance, plus the pump is fully serviceable for years of water delivery.Flex Faucet w/ Clamp and SwitchA faucet, showerhead, clamp and switch assembly in one, this highly flexible element sets up anywhere in seconds. The clamp can fit up to two inches and the flexible hose can be directed in any direction.PowerbankLithium ion is a game changer. This 18.5wh powerbank can run the Flow for hours, but just in case, you can keep it charged with the integrated solar panel.  Of course,  you can also charge your phone with the powerbank.   GoSun is composed of designers, engineers, and change-makers, intent on serving the world with unparalleled clean energy solutions.GoSun has become known as one of the world’s top manufacturers of innovative solar products that can cook, cool, power and light -- and now with the GoSun Flow, you can purify water and carry the kitchen sink.This is our 8th crowdfunding project, and we always deliver. GoSun has become a leader in  breakthrough solar technologies that make outdoor, healthy and clean living a reality through innovation and thoughtful design.   GoSun is a young company that benefits tremendously from people who share our mission with their network. Please take a minute to let your friends and family know about this innovation. We never worked, we flowed.  ""A Flow State"" or ""The Zone"" is what happens when you reach ""the mental state in which a person (or team) performing an activity is fully immersed in a feeling of energized focus, full involvement, and enjoyment...,"" and that's what happened.For a closer look at bundled GoSun accessories, follow these links: GoSun Fusion,  GoSun Chill, GoSun Thermo, 144wh PowerBank. Based on the new need of sanitation, we have worked hard and fast to make this product ready for production. Here are a few risks and challenges along with our management plan:Manufacturing. We have our own final assembly plant, but the sub-manufacturing suppliers are going to need our quality assurance people on site during production.  There are a lot of parts that come together for one Flow, so this will require a lot of coordination.Delays. Given the global situation, disruptions could occur with various suppliers or deliveries, but we have been working with all our relationships since the beginning of 2020 and we are confident that delays will be minimal, if at all.Fulfillment. Sometimes things happen that can’t be planned for - a supplier misses a deadline or a shipment gets lost. These unknowns could cause a delay. We are using an experienced logistics team to get our products to you and we’ll maintain open communication with you throughout our process.A global team of Certified Kickstarter & Indiegogo Experts. About 

 

What is a Bomfy Blanket?

Bomfy Blankets are an ultra-plush blanket that features a deep foot pocket to envelop cold feet in a soft and comfortable cocoon. Made with soft coral fleece, the six-foot-long blanket easily covers a user from shoulder to toe and is perfect for napping, lounging on the couch, or even in bed. Previously available in two colors made on a very small scale, we are hoping to manufacture at scale with better material, new colors, patterns, and designs to bring our blankets to new markets and people around the world!

 

About Bomfy Blankets

In 2017, San Diego-natives and college friends Carlos and Cooper took on a new entrepreneurial adventure and introduced Bomfy B. The blanket’s ultra-deep 26” foot pocket won consumers over and the test run sold out. On a cold day, it’s incredibly satisfying to bundle up in a cozy blanket and enjoy some relaxing warmth. But, the typical throw blanket doesn’t always support getting bundled up. Many of them are too short and require some tricky maneuvering to get feet fully covered. Bomfy B. solves the dilemma to keep you toasty warm. With this Kickstarter campaign we're looking to raise funding to complete our Bomfy B order with the additional foot pocket and color designs, no money raised through this Kickstarter campaign will be donated to charity.

How it Works

Bomfy B. is the coziest solution available, with an ultra-deep 26” pocket to keep feet toasty warm. The blanket is longer than a typical throw, meaning that there will be no sacrificing shoulders and arms to the cold air in an effort to bundle one’s feet up. The pocket includes a soft elastic band that runs along the pocket opening to ensure feet stay comfortably enwrapped in the pocket. The 100% polyester coral fleece offers a warm and soft layer that stays plush through years of use. Caring for Bomfy B. is easy, meaning these blankets can go anywhere and enjoy frequent use. Simply throw in the washer and tumble dry to refresh. 

 

Who Created Bomfy Blankets

 

Cooper: 

● Age 24, San Diego born and raised

● Graduated from SDSU with a degree in Business Management, Specialization in Entrepreneurship

● Originally went into the family business of real estate after college and hated it. Fell in love with social media marketing while starting Bomfy and now works full time and an Instagram marketing Agency in San Diego to pay the bills

● Co-founder of Bomfy B.

Carlos:

Age 24, San Diego born and raised

● Graduated from SDSU with a degree in Business Management, Specialization in Entrepreneurship

● Began interning at a digital marketing agency sophomore year of college, specifically in their Paid Search department. Currently working at a digital agency with nearly 3 years of experience in Downtown San Diego to pay the bills while growing Bomfy on the side.

● Co-founder of Bomfy B.

Short Summary

The Autrey House was built in 1849 by Absalom Autrey and his family in beautiful Dubach, Louisiana.  He migrated from Perry, Alabama seeking available land for farming, timber and to raise his family.  Several generations of Autrey's lived in the home from the mid 1800's to the 20th century.  The home was actually occupied until the 1970's as a rental property.  In the 1980's, ownership of the Autrey House was transferred to the Lincoln Parish Museum, a non-profit historical society located in Ruston, Louisiana near Dubach.  The home was also designated as an official historic landmark and stands today as one of the few remaining examples of the ""dog trot"" style home from the 1800's.

A little about me, Gary Gray:  My great grandmother was Mary Pearl Autrey Tubbs and she was raised in the Autrey Home.  Her father and my great-great grandfather, Charles Henry Autrey was actually born in the house and lived there his entire life.  Today, I proudly serve in a promotions and fundraising role with the Lincoln Parish Museum to raise money for the house related to needed repairs and ongoing maintenance.

Contributed funds go directly to the Lincoln Parish Museum for the sole purpose of repairing and maintaining the Autrey House Museum.   The Lincoln Parish Museum is an official 501(c)(3) non-profit entity with the sole purpose of preserving historically significant landmarks, buildings and structures in Lincoln Parish and even surrounding Parishes.

What We Need &
column2:
What You Get

The Autrey House underwent repairs and restorations over 20 years ago.  Time and exposure to the elements over this period of time has naturally caused the need to repair, restore and maintain the home.  We need to fund a professional inspection of the house, along with a restoration plan that is funded to complete in a timely manner.  The home needs critical repairs to the foundation, structural support beams and other routine maintenance.

column1: What you get by helping us restore and preserve this beautiful historic landmark is a sense of historic preservation and knowing that you helped make a difference.

The Impact

Not only is this project important to Autrey descendant's living today, but it is also an important historic treasure of not only Louisiana, but our nation.  America was built by people just like the Autrey's, hard working, honest people who farmed, hunted and fished their land, building our nation to the country it is today.

column2:
Challenges

The primary risk is the risk of doing nothing.  The Autrey House has stood since the mid 1800's and is open to the public today as a rare example of what life was like once upon a time.  Our goal is to continue maintaining the home for future generations so that our children and their children can enjoy this historic landmark into the future.

column1:
Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute, visit our Facebook page and like and follow us on Facebook.  Let your Facebook friends know about the Autrey House and the important mission to once again restore and maintain the home.  You can visit us on Facebook at www.Facebook.com/AutreyHouse.  In short, share the word about Autrey House!

column2:

Ruston, LA 71270
318-251-0018

Malaysia is ahead of most countries in South East Asia when it comes to the basic human needs and right of rural communities. Yet, still there are approximately 150,000 people living without any access to electricity, and no street light or lamps to light up their streets, villages, and even inside their homes.
This causes more crime, more safety hazards, more wild animal attacks, and fewer opportunities for the villagers to socialize at night, or to grab a book and read while it's dark.
This project is not some idea, crazy dream, or brain fart. We have done this project multiple times in the past year in Malaysia, and have seen incredible impact:
• Installed 210 lights in 4 villages, with a total of 143 households
• 3 schools can now teach at night

The Impact

With your support we will be able to 'light up' 2 entire villages in rural Malaysia, and give them a Christmas like never before.
Here's what we can do with your financial support:

column5: > underprivileged people will have access to this basic need.

column1: 200 student volunteers will participate and experience what it is like to participate in meaningful projects
Safety hazards in the village will be significantly reduced (e.g. no more need for campfires inside the house)
• Children will be able to study at night, there will be better education opportunities
The environment will become safer and the villagers will be less at risk to e.g. snake bites, and wild animal attacks.
Watch the video below to see the impact create so far, we're looking to double with this campaign.

column10: >Besides 4 years of light for the village and its inhabitants, Incitement focuses on instilling a sense of social responsibility into the mindset of the volunteers who partake in this project. It is important to get youths actively involved in volunteering initiatives like these, which is why we put a lot of focus on the experience as a volunteer as well.

column1: Watch the video below to listen to what volunteers had to say about this project:

First an Incitement event is organized. This is a free event available to all. During this event there will be renowned speakers (local and international speakers) sharing their stories, and also more information about Liter of Light will be provided. Attendees can then sign up as volunteers for this project.
Once you are accepted as a volunteer, o
column5: >n the first day (Saturday) there will be 'The Build'. All volunteers meet at Makespace (our venue partner) to literally build and assemble the solar powered lights. This is a fantastic learning experience.

column1: On the second day (Sunday) is 'The Installation'. We will drive up to Cameron Highlands in West-Malaysia, and drive into the jungle on 4-wheel-drives to reach to the villages. There we'll plant the light into the ground together with the villagers, and witness the lights lighting up when it gets dark. And best of all, witness the response of the villagers when the see light in their village for the first time.
We will do this 2 weekends between Thanksgiving and Christmas:
You might be wondering, why are the total cost of 1 solar light $325? It's because we fous on delivering a lasting, sustainable solution that will last for years to come.

The solar powered lights that Liter of Light builds and provides last up to 4 years, and comes with an extra supply of batteries, circuits, and LED lights, so that the villagers themselves can replace the lights after  the 1st 4 year cycles.

During the installation the villagers are trained how they can replace the vital parts of the lights themselves. For most of them it is the first time they see light without power lines and cables, and it is vital that they receive interactive, comprehensive training on how to maintain and replace certain parts of the lights. 

The end-goal is to one day have the villagers build their own solar light, and teach other villages to do it, too.

Then, of course, there's logistics. It take over 5 hours to reach these remote villages by 4WD, and often there are not even roads leading to them, and we'll literally have to build an impromptu bridge to reach the village to begin with.

Incitement is a global movement with establishments in over 40 countries, and aims to promote volunteerism and social impact amongst youth. Incitement organizes TEDx-like events. But rather than sharing ideas, we encourage taking action upon those ideas for the betterment of humanity.

During Incitement events we provide attendees ways to find  meaningful projects and NGO's to put their inspiration into assertive action. At the same time we help NGO's raise funds and do better marketing to amplify and expedite the impact they create in society. We have worked with 1000's of refugees in Malaysia, youths, and done social business development projects, humanitarian relief work, worked with the homeless, and much more.
Below are some photos of Incitement events and our work with the less privileged:
Since this year we have joined forces with Liter of Light.

Liter of Light is a global NGO and official UNESCO partner 2015 for the theme 'Lighting up Lives.' Liter of Light provides a sustainable and affordable way to provide rural communities with light at night.

Behind the Liter of Light project is the MyShelterFoundation, founded by Illac Diaz in 2006. Similar to Incitement, the MyShelterFoundation has numerous social projects around the world, creating sustainable solutions to the world's biggest challenges. Liter of Light has grown rapidly around the world thanks to its open-source concept, allowing anyone to take the technology and produce the lighting solutions for empovered, underprivileged areas in their country.
Below are some photos of Liter of Light and its work with the less privileged:

column4: Learn more about Liter of Light here

column2:
Challenges

Since we have done this project 4 times before, we have already identified and addressed the most common risks and challenges, which were mainly of logistical nature. We have a created a playbook for the build and installation, and can anticipate the most common pitfalls.

column1:
Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Help  us get the word out about this campaign by using the sharing buttons on this page
  • Send this page to a friend who you think will want to contribute to this project

1. Since it's Christmas, any excess funds will be used to give these families with a Christmas like never before. For us it is normal to have a Christmas tree at home, find presents under the tree, and have a family dinner. But for these families it isn't. With any excess funds we will bring these things to their village.
<div>2. Any remaining funds after that<span style=""background-color: initial
column2: > will be added to the 2016 budget. In 2016 we will be collaborating with Pepsico Malaysia to visit another 10 villages in Malaysia and disburden them by providing them with lights in the villages.

With any excess funds we will bring these things to their village.

2. Any remaining funds after that will be added to the 2016 budget. In 2016 we will be collaborating with Pepsico Malaysia to visit another 10 villages in Malaysia and disburden them by providing them with lights in the villages.

Help us make something very special happen!!
Let me introduce myself, my name is Mike Carroll, I have an extensive background in renovations and home improvements. 5 years ago I completed a bathroom renovation, during the renovation, my wife, Shelley, wanted a tile back splash. We went to our local Home Depot and picked up all the supplies needed and away we went. This was costly and time consuming and she was disappointed to learn once it's up, it's up! That's when I went to the drawing board, there has to be an easier, more cost effective way to doing tile.

We have designed the patent pending polymer rail and molding system. This system eases installation, no lengthy kitchen or bathroom downtime (takes approx. 1 hour to install in a basic kitchen/bathroom), Is less costly than traditional tile application, is recyclable, and it now becomes an easy home improvement rather than an extensive renovation.
This campaign is going to help us get our products to manufacturing. With YOUR help we can start manufacturing and distributing the product.
All manufacturing and distribution is done in Alberta, Canada!

column2:
what you get

We currently have a goal (flexible) of $30,000.00, this will get our molds and dyes completed so we can manufacture the molding and rail. The molding and rail are manufactured with extrusion.

column1: The Alberta government, Alberta innovates, has recently invested in our idea and helped us get our Patent and Industrial Design patent pending, with a $10,000 grant. We have had our prototypes completed and have bettered the design to ensure the product that gets shipped to you is the best one possible.

We have campaign perks to allow everyone that's interested invest. Everything from a $10 perk to a $1000.00 meet the team and get your install done by us perk! We have partnered with Iron Jet Promotions here in Lloydminster, Alberta to assist us in getting quality merchandise for our campaign &
The funds for this campaign are going to help us get the manufacturing completed and to our customers, and help them do a beautiful home improvement!

Our design helps keeps costs low, while the average home owner does a home improvement. The home renovation business is a 25 million dollar market and if you are not knowledgeable about tile installation, our design cuts out a costly contractor and allows you to change it up as much as you wish, with a simple snap on, snap off rail design, you can take the tiles out and replace them with a new tile whenever you wish!!

column2: >There is no damage to the wall behind (from gluing the tiles down), you have a few screw holes in your drywall if you wish to take the entire system out at a later time.

>Of course there are risks to bringing an idea to life, but we have overcome every challenge brought forth to date. We are very passionate about our designs and business and have a great group of mentors helping us overcome the challenges as they have been laid down, we have recently obtained funding to assist us with campaign perks and helping to ease the cost of manufacturing and obtain a building to get this product distributed!
>Folks, we ask, if you can, contribute AND share the heck out of this so as many people can see it, and have the opportunity to participate.
>If you can't contribute at this time, please SHARE this and help us make some noise about our campaign! You can use the Indiegogo share tools at the bottom of this page!!

column1: Thanks for taking the time out to read our story, watch our video and help us reach our goals!
